1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所(本國生)、學士後、跨校。
2.加退選第二階段開放全校。
courseAbstract: 依據ASTA（American Society of Travel Agents）對遊程的解釋是「遊程是事先計劃完善的旅行節目，包括了交通工具、住宿、遊覽及其它有關之服務」，為旅行業銷售的主要「產品」。本課程教導內容包括遊程規劃及成本分析，冀望學生在學習課程後，未來進入職場能分類剖析市場旅遊產品並設計出與業界優質行程相當的遊程。
courseEngAbstract: According to the definition of ASTA（American Society of Travel Agents）, a tour is a planned program of travel, normally for pleasure, usually including transportation, hotel, sightseeing and other services. In fact, a tour plan is a travel product. The aim of the course is to help students to design cost effective and good quality tour products as what travel industry provides in the market nowadays.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所(本國生)、學士後、跨校。
2.加退選第二階段開放全校。
courseAbstract:
本課程介紹學生對觀光資源規劃相關議題的概念及對觀光資源供給與需求面的認識。
觀光資源規劃是一門實務操作的課程，舉凡生活上的食、住、行、遊、購、樂、健、美與旅遊目的地；天文、地理、歷史、人文、環境等各方面的知識都需要涉獵。因為是綜合性的社會科學，理論和實務並重。
本課程期盼養成學生對觀光資源敏銳的觀察力與休閒遊憩區規劃的基本邏輯思維及規劃能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide a broad overview of the tourism industry and an understanding on tourism resource planning including the issues affiliated with tourism planning and development process. This course provides the background necessary to understand how the tourism industry functions. This course also provide an understanding of various tourism planning approaches and strategies for the development of tourism by applying knowledge of tourism planning and development issues for one particular destination that enable students to obtain basic logical and planning ability, and professional knowledge on leisure and recreational planning.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、本所。
2.先修課程：休閒遊憩概論。
courseAbstract: 休閒治療是一門探討身、心、靈及追求自身生活型態的新興理論，本課程將透過課堂講述、主題影片、案例分析、團體討論、實務操作及分組報告等教學方式，協助學生利用休閒治療幫助自己也幫助那些健康受到威脅的人們能充分利用休閒治療模式享受生活，使個人恢復生理及心理機能，並藉由休閒活動達到自我實現以及預防健康問題的發生。教學內容包含：休閒治療導論、休閒治療模式、休閒治療介入、休閒治療方案設計及個別關心方案評估設計等。
courseEngAbstract: Therapeutic recreation comes from a recent theory on the physical, mental, and spiritual state of oneself and related lifestyles. Through lectures, video clips, case studies, group discussions and presentations, and practices, students will be able to use therapeutic recreation to provide self-help and help for people whose health is at risk. Students will understand that therapeutic recreation can help people return to a better physical and mental state. In addition, leisure activities can help prevent health problems. The contents of this course include therapeutic recreation theory and models, intervention of therapeutic recreation, design of therapeutic recreation for individual cases, and e

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程設計旨在協助學生培養服務的精神，藉由至服務機構提供服務，落實課堂所學之服務知識與理念，並進而從服務中學習、瞭解服務於社區之重要性與體驗服務之意義，培養正向的服務態度，以期自我省思、瞭解自我進而促進自我成長與肯定生命價值。
courseEngAbstract: This is a zero-credit course for students to do volunteer work at different organizations out of the campus. The students are required to present the proof of completing at least ten hours of service, to share their experiences with the class and lastly, to write a report at the end of the semester.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在闡明旅遊與安全、健康相關之管理及議題，俾使學習者對其有所了解與體認。學習者將透過課程講授、實務操作、作業、報告、測驗與交互討論，研討旅遊安全、健康相關管理之概念、原則與方法。本課程也輔導學生在進行旅遊規畫時，對旅遊者身、心及旅遊目的地有關之食、醫、住、行、樂之管理，期能結合理論與實務，培養相關核心能力，以為爾後進入觀光旅遊與安全、健康有關職場之經營管理、指導及教育訓練等之準備。
courseEngAbstract: This gateway course globally highlights the overall figure of assessment and management on travel safety. Through the lectures and practices, the students would approach the concepts, principles and practices on safety assessment in tourism and travel The scope of this course will cover the scope of food and beverage, lodging, transportation, entertainment, and other factors like political situation, climate change, and destination safety.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在從旅遊醫學之角度闡明廣泛性之旅遊與健康相關之總體概念，俾使學習者對其有所了解與體認。學習者將透過課程講授、分組報告與交互討論，研討旅遊休閒與健康相關之理念、模式、價值、原則與方法，以及了解旅遊休閒對健康之正負面效應。本課程也輔導學生就現行旅遊健康議題加以討論，以為爾後進入旅遊休閒與健康有關職場之經營管理、指導、教育訓練以及研究等預作準備。
courseEngAbstract: This This course will be focusing on the overall and general figure of travel medicine and the impact on health. Through facilitating lectures and discussions, the students could approach the concepts, values, principles and methods of topics related to travel medicine, and increasingly understand the effects of travel and leisure toward health, and prevent and avoid damage. The course also introduces the traveling health management of special groups. Alongside, this course which is helpful for the students in future provides the students with a discussion on the current popular topics of health and tourism, and thus fulfills the one of the objectives of integrating theory and practice.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程讓學生瞭解健康促進的意義，並且養成對各種衛生知識的正確認知。並從生活型態及各層面分析影響健康之因素及對健康之影響程度，將其套用至各種健康促進模式中，以理論及實務探討健康促進模式之相關應用
courseEngAbstract: This course allows students to understand the significance of health promotion, and to develop correct understanding of abundant health knowledge. The course provides a general and fundamental understanding to the topics on lifestyle factors in health and various levels of analysis from the impact on health. This knowledge will be applied to a variety of health promotion models in order to explore the theory and practice of health promotion models of related applications

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
multipleTeacherName: 林俐吟, 翁仕彥, 黃琡雅, 陳冠仰, 吳承翰, 陳巧珊
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生一年級，如有特殊加退選需求請洽健科學院。
courseAbstract: 本課程先介紹有關休閒產業、健康事業、健康科技照護以及語言治療與聽力障礙的發展趨勢，並了解目前各領域科技應用的現況及跨領域之可能性，內容包括保健旅遊之跨域整合、管理方法應用、資訊科技與長照領域之結合，以及聽語治療的應用等。藉由各領域發展趨勢的了解，進一步透過企劃案構思，讓學生能充分了解跨領域應用的精隨。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the development trends of leisure and health industry, healthcare technology, and speech language pathology and audiology. The course also briefs the current state of technology applications, and identifies the possibility of cross-domain integration that includes the domains on health tourism, management, information technology, the long-term care, and speech language pathology and audiology. Based on the understanding of cross-domain background, students can propose business plan to fulfill the requirement of cross-domain applications on healthcare domain.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
1.第二階段加退選僅由人康、健科學院四技生一年級生互相跨班選課及人康、健科學院重修生選課。
2.第三階段加退選開放系外選課。
3.主題:思辨與討論。
courseAbstract: 本課程就文言文（50％文言文－諸子散文、詩詞韻文）與白話文（50％白話文－現代散文、現代小說）兩方面，編選古典文學名篇及現代經典文本。內容安排除兼顧古典與現代的文學價值外，亦涵蓋文學的通俗性與藝術性。
courseEngAbstract: This course is based on two textbooks, compiled with famous classical and modern literature each. Apart from valuable literature sources and the balance between classical and modern materials, its contents also include the popularity and artistic quality of each.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2. 全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
courseEngAbstract:
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「藝術文化史/世界文明史」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 透過藝術文化的類型與不同的表現形式及中西方藝術的演進與賞析，瞭解藝術的理念、內涵與歷史演變，深入探討藝術與生命、美感與生活、藝術與文化等重要議題之意義。培養學生對藝術文化有基本的認識與高度的敏感度，提升審美素養，持續自主學習的興趣。
courseEngAbstract: Through the exploration of various types and form of art and culture, as well as the evolution and appreciation of Eastern and Western art, this course provides an understanding of the concepts, meaning and historical transformations of arts. It further delves deeply into significant topics such as art and life, aesthetics and everyday life, and art and culture. Students will acquire a foundational comprehension and heightened sensitivity of art and culture, enhance their aesthetic literacy, and foster a sustained commitment to self-directed education.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、本所本國生、外所本國生、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）。
2.第二階段加退選全校可選。
3.40人上限。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生熟悉台灣休閒農業與鄉村旅遊的發展，因此本課程將解析休閒農業與鄉村旅遊意義與實踐方式、規劃方法、發展案例與發展議題，以期修課同學能建立專業且實用的知識。
courseEngAbstract: The aim of this course is to familiarize students with the development of leisure farming and rural tourism in Taiwan. By discussing about the definition, the planning, issues and cases of leisure farming and rural tourism, students will understand how to include leisure farming and rural tourism into travel planning.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部。
2.修課20人上限，部分咖啡豆及鮮奶需自費購買。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要使學生學習各項咖啡基本調製實務操作技能，課程涵蓋從咖啡演進、特性、烘培及各式相關創意咖啡健康飲品設計，透過實務操作，使同學能具備咖啡調製實務操作技能，期能使學生未來能勝任咖啡場域實務操作工作。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides students with a complete path that begins by explaining the differences between the various tools and techniques used in coffee brewing. It offers a historical background of the development of coffee, their operations and skills, such as product, production, and equipping. It is a stepping stone for being a coffee brewer while at a leisure or professional stage.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseEngName: Tour Guide and Interpreter Training and Practice
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、本所本國生、外所本國生、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校。
2.第二階段加退選全校可選。
3.EMI全英語授課。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要整合導覽解說實務技巧，期望學生透過導覽解說，在課堂及現場教學，導覽遊客參觀景點，以提昇學生導覽解說之專業能力。
courseEngAbstract: This is an advanced training course for students to become tour guides and interpreters. Students will be trained to cover a variety of tourism resources such as natural resources, ecotourism, and various aspects of local culture, including history, religious beliefs, and etc.. At the end of the course, students will be encouraged to earn the certificates of tour guides and managers.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseEngName: Laws and Ethics of Daily Life
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「法律倫理與生活/經濟與生活」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程之介紹，在於使學生對法律常識、法律理念、倫理概念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知。從生活與倫理及正義概念出發，就常見的法律問題，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代人正確的法律觀及倫理觀。
courseEngAbstract: This course helps students to develop the following concepts: law, ethic, legal perspective, and legal system of Taiwan. From the aspects of ethics and justice, this course introduces common legal issues, in order to develop the knowledge of law and ethic for students.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「應用科學導論/科技與生活」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 以學生現有的數理、生物背景為基礎，引導學生進入科技應用的領域。現代科技進步快速，世界日新月異，學生需具備有敏銳之觀察力與學習能力，始能跟上時代之潮流。本課程將目前先進之科技作一概念性的介紹；涵蓋有太空科技、能源應用、材料科技、生物技術、資訊科技等內容，期能一窺世界之奧妙，進而引發學習新知之動機與興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
At the dawn of the twenty-first century today, as every citizen of the world should have a basic scientific concept and knowledge which can serve people to make the decisions, participate in civic and cultural affairs, and join economic production activities. Also, beside the professional expertise and technology, the most important thing for the citizens is to care about humanities, develop themselves actively, and benefit the people and serve the community.
The major purpose of this course is from the new technology of modern life to induced the students knowing the basic applied science and technique concept. From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「哲學與人生/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
courseEngAbstract:
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在以觀光旅遊主軸，主題內容包含出國旅行會遇到的情境，學員們將學習如何用英語訂機票、機場Check-in、兌換外幣、投宿旅館、點餐、問路及獲得觀光資訊等。藉由模擬對話環境課程、角色扮演、電腦多媒體影音互動敎學及螺旋式的複習以訓練學員在最短的時間內提高英語聽說之能力。課程亦涵蓋多國文化及習俗，適合有意成為導遊或相關業者學習。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to equip students with basic English ability they need in tourism. At the end of this semester, students will have a basic understanding of English usage within the tourism industry. They’ll also develop the ability to express their own ideas and present travel information in English clearly and effectively.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseName: 健康休閒活動企劃實務
courseEngName: Practice for health and leisure activity planning
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在幫助學生瞭解休閒活動設計內涵與增進休閒活動設計知識、改善學生休閒專業態度、培養學生健康休閒活動企劃實務能力，以期修課同學能建立專業且實用的知識。
courseEngAbstract: From this course, students will have a better understanding on the design of leisure activities and related knowledge. They will learn to make plans and proposals on holding health and leisure activities. They will also have the opportunity to get involved in actual planning of health and leisure activities.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程的教學目標是要讓學生了解健康風險評估與管理的概念與方法，並且瞭解人體暴露在環境中的健康風險。如能經由健康風險評估，以系統化的評估，在現今有限的資源下，尋求最適化的管理與控制，減少風險並延長健康的生活，並以健康的行為變為社會的指引。教學內容包括環境健康風險及個人健康風險兩大部份，使學生了解環境及個人健康的危險因素，認定自己的健康問題，並且學習、控制及管理自我健康。
courseEngAbstract: The objective of this course is to enable students to understand the concepts and methods of health risk assessment and management and health risks in the environment. Through systematic assessment of health risk, the health risks we face nowadays can be dealt with and controlled, even with limited resources. The contents of the course include health risks in the environment and personal health risks. Students will be able to understand the risk factors in the environment and personal health and learn to control and manage their health.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「資訊素養與網路運用」課程之學生互相跨班選課。2.重修生請自第二階段開放選課。全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程為電腦之基礎課程，主要培育學生資訊素養，以具備適當資訊應用能力。課程內容除強化電腦基本概念、作業系統與文書處理軟體應用能力外，並包含網路觀念、網路應用、網路安全、資訊倫理，與智慧財產權。
courseEngAbstract: This course is a basic course to educate students to have enough knowledge about information literacy and network application. The course will include the basic concept of computers, operating systems, office application software, network applications, information security, and intellectual property concepts.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解樂活健康之重點。從預防心血管疾病相關的代謝症候群到常見的高血壓、中風、糖尿病等生活習慣病之認識與保健；進而學習現代人常見身心困擾之睡眠障礙、憂鬱症、與壓力舒緩等相關問題。期盼能使學生具備較完整之健康養生觀念與技能。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to enable students to understand the concept of LOHAS and health care. Students will be exposed to a wide variety of related issues, from the metabolic syndrome related to the prevention of cardiovascular disease to the understanding and health care for common illnesses such as hypertension, stroke, diabetes and other lifestyle-related diseases. Students will also learn the common physical and psychological problems such as sleep disorders, depression, pressure relief and other related issues. Students are expected to have a better understanding of how to apply LOHAS to daily life.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部。
2.加退選第二階段開放全校選課。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在透過使學生了解人際溝通本質與情緒管理內涵，藉由理論與案例討論，學習如何與人相互回應及人際溝通技巧，並透過自我情緒覺察，培養自我情緒控制能力，並經由溝通的行為與歷程，建立接納及共識，進而將此學習經驗延伸到未來實習與職場應用。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to make students understand the nature of interpersonal communication and the meaning of emotional management. In the course, learn how to interact with others and interpersonal communication skills through theory and case discussions. During teaching, students learn self-emotional awareness, develop self-emotional control skills, and establish acceptance and consensus through communication behaviors and processes, and then extend this learning experience to future internships and workplace applications.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所本國生、外所本國生、學士後、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校。
2.加退選第二階段開放全校選課。
courseAbstract: 此課程將透過旅遊糾紛個案研究，讓學生了解糾紛發生的原因及旅遊業者與客人糾紛調處經驗，學習減少糾紛發生以提高旅遊品質，培養學生日後危機處理能力並避免相同事件的發生。
courseEngAbstract: By the discussion on case study, students learn the mediation experience on travel disputes both from agencies and clients who file heavy complaints. Students will develop the ability for crisis management, know how to avoid the same mistakes and how to improve quality on travel business.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseName: 特殊族群健康休閒規劃
courseEngName: Recreation plans for people with specific needs
note:
修課限制：
1.跨域課程。
2.本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所本國生、外所本國生、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、學士後、跨校。
3.加退選第二階段開放全校選課。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生從健康與休閒活動之理論探討延伸到特殊族群之心生理需求和健康之影響，進而學習活動之設計與規劃。
courseEngAbstract: The aim of this course is to enable students to explore the theory of health and leisure activities and learn how to design and plan learning activities for people with specific needs. The students will be trained to: 1. Understand the relevance of people with specific needs and recreation, 2. Understand the industries related to people with specific needs in Taiwan, 3. Learn new patterns of leisure and entertainment industry development for people with specific needs, 4. Understand the planning of the six-oriented recreational resources, including: market demand, supply resources, mechanisms for the government, investment management, research and development, and implementation.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生三年級以上。
2.本課程涉及實習相關事宜，如113學年度要實習之同學，請務必選修。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要在培養即將步入社會的學生們，學習各項職場倫理與溝通，藉以提昇工作技巧，使其在生活及工作上因得體的說話技巧使個人形象及氣質提升，也能因習得必要之職場倫理而在生活及工作上無往不利。
courseEngAbstract: This course is for students to learn workplace ethics and communication in order to enhance job skills. Students will be able to have a better image of themselves at work after they master the art of communication at workplace. In this course, students should understand "work values" and "professional ethics" and how they will be influenced by teamwork and work relationships. They will also learn communication skill and coordination skills.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseEngName: Policies and regulations on health and leisure
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本所
courseAbstract: 本課程藉相關法規之專題討論和介紹，使學生對健康法制、旅遊糾紛處理及旅遊中涉及的種種法律責任有一整體性的認知，以奠定有關專業法律的啟發基礎。從旅遊契約涉及的權利義務切入，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養學生正確的基本旅遊法律觀。並從旅遊健康法制實務的角度，點出常見的旅遊健康法律問題，並分析探討實務上發生的實際案例，以強化對相關旅遊健康法制的認識與處理問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the tourism and health law to let the students understand the whole outline of the construction of judicial system, the virtue of the travel law and the present law in Taiwan. It begins with the teaching of the concept of the travel contract, the duties of tour guides and the course ensures the students to know the exact concept of the tourism and health law. It also teaches the students to use the comparative study method to understand the updated development of the legal theory and practice, which can open students’ minds and help them develop academic interest.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseEngName: Analysis of Health and Leisure Industries
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生大三以上、本所。
2.先修課程：休閒遊憩概論。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要介紹健康休閒產業現況與趨勢、產業研究方法與分析架構、產業個案分析報告，此外並透過各類型產業的探討，以瞭解各產業之競爭優勢、發展議題及應具備的知能，理論與案例互有呼應，以期修課同學能建立專業且實用的知識。
courseEngAbstract: This course mainly focuses on introducing the status quo, the current trends, methods of research and analysis, case studies in the health and leisure industries. Through discussions on different types of industries in this field, students can have a better understanding on the competitive edge, issues for development and the balance between theory and practice.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
1.修課限制:本系四技一般生、大三以上
2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。
3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本所
courseAbstract: 健康/療癒環境研究與設計近來成為熱門議題，同時亦被認為能增進健康與關懷環境的方向，本課程從休閒健康促進的角度介紹，主要內容包括療癒環境歷史與文化觀、健康/療癒環境設計哲學、各族群使用者健康/療癒情境等。
courseEngAbstract: Research and design on health promoting or healing environment have been popular in recent years. Following this route, the course introduces the topic from the perspective of leisure and health promotion. The contents of the course include the historical and cultural aspects of healing environment, design philosophy for health promotion or healing environment and the different groups that make use of health promotion or healing environment.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由護二一D、護二一C、休四三A互相跨班選課。 
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。 
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
學習與養成良好的各種基本技術後並加強比賽技術、戰
術的應用與結合，以期能在桌球比賽中獲得有效成果。如有優質的各種基本技術及搭配
單打戰術應用就能在比賽中直接得分與攻擊。在比賽技術中有良好優質的接發球戰術就
能先發制人，且能有效控制對方直接攻擊得分，其贏球機率高。因此在單打技術、戰術
應用桌球技術中佔有極重要性。
courseEngAbstract:
After learning and cultivating various kinds of basic skills, 
a player should reinforce the applications and combinations of singles and 
tactics, aiming to have effective results in table tennis games. If a player has 
various kinds of superior basic skills combined with the applications of singles 
tactics, he/she can score and attack directly in a game. In terms of singles, if a 
player has superior tactics for receiving and serving the ball, he/she can take 
the initiative and control his/her opponent effectively to attack and score 
directly, so that he/she will have a greater chance to win the game; therefore, 
such tactics has great importance in table tennis skills regarding singles and 
tactics applications.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseEngName: Final Project on Leisure and Health
multipleTeacherName: 方文熙, 呂淑妤, 李曉昀, 林俐吟, 張博雅, 陳冠仰, 陳建和, 陳瑋苓, 湯幸芬
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生四年級、畢業班課程。
2.未選修觀光休閒健康產業進階實習之同學，請務必選修畢業專題課程。
3.第一次上課有安排教室F1006，第二周開始由指導老師個別指導及安排指導上課時間，無安排教室。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生對專題撰述之相關議題做更深入、完備之研討。研究生所選擇的問題主題將成為課程中的討論焦點。同儕間與師生間之腦力激盪、相互研討是本課程的主要學習策略。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims at helping students to make deeper and more complete discussions on their final projects related to leisure and health. The topics of the projects will be chosen by students and will be the focus of the discussions in the class. The purpose of this course is to stimulate intellectual exchanges and communications between students and professors.

department: 四年制休閒產業與健康促進系
courseName: 觀光休閒健康產業進階實習
courseEngName: Advanced Practice in leisure, tourism and health promotion industries
multipleTeacherName: 方文熙, 呂淑妤, 李曉昀, 林俐吟, 張博雅, 陳冠仰, 陳建和, 陳瑋苓, 湯幸芬
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生四年級、畢業班課程、實習課程、提前開課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進休閒旅遊健康促進之工作專業能力，輔導學生進入未來將就業的產業環境，結合理論與實務，有效考量職場環境協助設計休閒健康促進企劃方案，並進而瞭解健康休閒機構的管理策略。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to equip students with the ability to put professional knowledge on leisure, tourism and health promotion into further practice. Their on-site training can be extended to a future career in the field. Students will learn how to propose plans for leisure and health promotion tailored to their working environment. They will also be exposed to the management of health and leisure organizations.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所一般生、外所本國生、跨校
courseAbstract: 永續旅遊強調旅遊行為的生態性，即著重環境保護、利益回饋地方以及提供遊客正向體驗等理念的旅遊方式，達成旅遊者、當地民眾互蒙其利的理想，是目前旅遊發展的重要方向。課程旨在增進學生對旅遊環境系統的認識以及獲得生態旅遊相關的概念和知識，其中包含自然旅遊和生態旅遊的哲學與倫理、旅遊資源調查、遊憩衝擊與評估以及旅遊規劃管理相關理論。
courseEngAbstract: Sustainable tourism emphasizes ecological of tourism behavior that focuses on environmental protection, the benefits of local and offer visitors a positive recreation experiences, is an important direction of the current tourism development. The aims of  course is to enhance students' understanding of the tourism environment and access to eco-systems concepts and knowledge related to tourism, which includes philosophical and ethical nature tourism and ecotourism, tourism resources survey and evaluation of the impact of recreation and tourism planning and management theory.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
courseName: 休閒與健康資訊研究及應用
courseEngName: Seminar in Information Management in Tourism and Health Science
note:
修課限制：
1.程式設計課程、本所一般生、外所本國生(是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表)、跨校 。
2.為鼓勵學生修讀程式設計課程，有關「休閒與健康資訊研究及應用」2學分與「多變量解析」2學分為二擇一必選修課程，請於畢業前務必擇一修課。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在探討資訊科技與休閒健康相關議題，鼓勵學生運用資訊知識和技能，培養同學在資訊科技進步的時代裡熟悉程式語言之操作與應用，能夠瞭解前瞻資訊科技的應用。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to discuss the interdisciplinary relationships of the information technology, travel industry and travel health through theory learning about the travel and transport management. We hope graduate students will understand the process of how the information technology works, the developing trend of the travel industry in the future and the relationship among travel industry and tourism and Health etc.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
courseEngName: Seminar of Tourism, Food and Health
note:
修課限制：
本所一般碩士班、外所本國生（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）、跨校。
courseAbstract: 本課程結合旅遊、餐飲、飲食文化與營養學。旅遊時的飲食營養會影響旅遊者的健康，也會影響旅遊品質。國民健康意識抬頭，旅遊不再只是享受美食，吃得健康將也會是旅遊者的重要需求。本課程介紹（一）基礎營養學，例如五大類營養素、營養標示、飲食指南及指標、食物代換表在旅遊時的應用，（二）旅遊相關產品如保健食品、有機食品、生機飲食、減肥產品對人體健康的影響（旅遊時領隊或導遊會向民眾介紹這些產品，到底這些產品對健康有什麼影響），（三）慢性疾病（例如糖尿病、高血壓、高血脂、痛風、腎臟病）患者旅遊時之營養照顧，（四）飲食文化營養之探討。
courseEngAbstract: This nutrition course is designed for the graduate students of the Institution of Tourism and Health, which is integrated with the knowledge of nutrition, tourism, and food culture. The content of this lecture is composed of four parts. The first part is the introduction of basic nutrition concept, such as five groups of nutrients, nutrition labeling, food pyramid, dietary guideline, exchange list.  The second part covered the health effects of functional food, organic food and weight management related products. These products are always merchandized by tour guides. The third part introduced the nutritional care of the traveler who has taken diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, gout, or renal disease etc. The fourth part introduced the nutritional health effect from the view of food culture.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
courseEngName: Seminar in Recreation Planning and Management
note: 修課限制：本所一般生、外所本國生、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在傳授與遊憩與管理相關的概念、理論、方法和技術，包括遊憩資源調查、分析、規劃、節目企劃、管理與解說等，學生不僅可習得專業知識，更可獲得相關的實務經驗。課程內容主要強調以下幾個重點：（1）常見的規劃模式、因子分析、以及現在盛行的遊憩規劃理念；（2）旅遊計畫管理：旅遊節目企劃、管理、與評鑑的原則與方法；（3）遊客中心和遊憩服務設施的設計與管理；（4）遊客管理工具與技術；（5）環境解說與教育的哲學、原則與方法。
courseEngAbstract: This course presents advanced principles of recreation planning and management, including concepts, theories, skills and techniques in survey, analysis, planning, programming, management and interpretation of recreation resources through lectures and field experiences. The contents of the course emphasize: (1) the planning models, factor analysis, and modern design concepts in recreation resources planning; (2) recreation program management: principles and methods for program planning, management, and evaluation; (3) visitor center and facility design and management; (4) tools and techniques for visitor management; and (5) philosophies, principles, and methods of environmental interpretation and education.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
courseEngName: Emergency Crisis Management in Tourism and Health Science
note:
修課限制：
1.本所一般碩士班。
2.課程內含EMT-1初級救護技術員40小時之訓練課程，全程不得缺席且通過筆試及術科考試者，可取得EMT-1初級救護技術員專業證照。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在闡明旅遊相關之健康總體概念，尤其強調旅遊時處於較為緊急或迫切之問題狀況與因應之道，包括在旅遊過程中，任何相關可能產生危機之人、事、物、以及環境或情境等所衍生之相關議題。透過教學、討論與必要之操作修習，將使學生具備旅遊相關之健康總體概念，以及能從容面對旅遊相關之健康危機，必要時亦能於特定情境場合中落實相關之危機處理理論。
courseEngAbstract: This course is tried to aim at overall ideology of health related to health, esp. focusing on coping with urgent/emergent health conditions during traveling, such as any related issue around persons, events, materials, and environments/situations…etc.. Going through this course, with mandatory lecture, in-class discussion, and some necessary practice, the student will be supposed to possess global concept of travel & health, and van take time to deal with those health and related crises, and furthermore in peculiar occasion, validating the theoretical content of crisis management.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所一般生、外所本國生、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在幫助學生瞭解統計學相關之概念，俾使學習者對其有所了解與體認。學習者將透過課程講授、交互討論、課後作業及學習報告方式，探討統計學相關之觀念、原則、模式及方法。並配合SPSS統計軟體著重於研究時之具體應用，以為爾後進行論文研究預作準備。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide an analytical technique that students will understand and then would be interested in the specialty of advanced applied statistics with SPSS, and foster their abilities of independent thinking and problem solving. The course contents include descriptive statistics, estimation, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, ANOVA, factor analysis, etc.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課，選課前請先至系辦詢問。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生獲得執行獨立研究之能力。課程中，學生須與任課老師針對碩士論文有關之議題訂正進度報告及討論以達成學習目標。以漸進的方式導引學生，使學生能了解論文計畫之撰寫方式，並朝正確之方向閱讀相關文獻。透過個別討論、團體討論、學習及報告，確立研究問題，組織文獻考查，設計研究可行之研究方法。學生藉由討論與主題相關的課題以增進研究實務能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to assist student’s independent research ability in preparing the related issue of master thesis. The students enrolling this class are expected to make progress report and have discussion with the advisor in order to reach the learning goal. Teach students how to present a well-done dissertation with systematically research approaches and related references. The purpose of this course is to promote students’ capacity to design a research proposal. Students will be able to apply research knowledge and formulate a research proposal through individual and group discussion and assignments. Students will be able to identify a research problem, organize relevant literature, and design a feasible method for their study.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
note:
修課限制：
1.程式設計課程、本所一般生二年級、外所本國生。
2.為鼓勵學生修讀程式設計課程，有關「休閒與健康資訊研究及應用」2學分與「多變量解析」2學分為二擇一必選修課程，請於畢業前務必擇一修課。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在銜接應用統計學，使進一步瞭解多變量解析之理論、內涵與技巧。課程內容聚焦在結構方程模式(SEM)之使用。課程進度從多變量之一般介紹開始，進而推進至SEM相關原理及方法，並以PRELIS, CFA及 Structural Equation Model為主要介紹內容，以為爾後進行論文中相關計量方法之使用預作準備。
courseEngAbstract: This sequential course is designed to link to the advanced applied statistics with the techniques of multivariate statistical analysis. The course contents focus on Structural Equation Modeling with the application of LISREL software. It proceeds from the introduction of basic concept and methodology to LISREL language, then to PRELIS, CFA, and Structural equation models. At the end, all students are facilitated with the ability of programming SEM problems.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
courseEngName: Seminar in Tourism and Health Science II
note: 修課限制：本所一般生二年級以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生對正在進行中的論文之撰述與架構做反思。每個研究生的論文主題將成為研討課程的討論焦點。同儕間與師生間之腦力激盪、相互研討是本課程的主要學習策略。
courseEngAbstract: The goal of this course is to assist students in making reflections on the compilation and structure of their thesis. Every graduate student’s thesis topic will become the discussion topic of the seminar. Brainstorming and mutual discussions among classmates and instructor are main learning strategies of this course.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系旅遊健康碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課，選課前請先至系辦詢問
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生獨立完成一篇碩士論文或專題製作報告。學生在指導教授的協助下，經驗一次以學術為導向或以實務為導向之研究過程。其包括研究計劃的撰寫、研究設計、資料的收集、分析、與解釋，並統整成一份書面報告。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to assist students in independently finishing theses or projects for designated topic. With the professors’ help, students can experience the research process from intellectual and realistic prospects. This includes research plan, investigative setup, collection, evaluation and explanation of data and sorts out all the things into a complete written report.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
courseName: 休閒與健康資訊研究及應用
courseEngName: Seminar on Information Studies and Application in Leisure and Health
note:
修課限制：
1.程式設計課程、本所碩專班、雙數周上課。一次上4小時。
2.為鼓勵學生修讀程式設計課程，有關「休閒與健康資訊研究及應用」2學分與「多變量解析」2學分為二擇一必選修課程，請於畢業前務必擇一修課。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在探討資訊科技與休閒健康相關議題，鼓勵學生運用資訊知識和技能，培養同學在資訊科技進步的時代裡熟悉程式語言之操作與應用，能夠瞭解前瞻資訊科技的應用。
courseEngAbstract: This course encourages students to use advanced information technology knowledge and skills, try to become the scene design content creators, training students with advanced information technology and practical ability. And be familiar with the operation and application of the programming language.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
note: 修課限制：本所碩專班、單數周上課，一次上4小時。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在介紹及解析旅遊與休閒情境中所發生與健康有關行為之心理機轉及其重要架構，例如：健康信念模式、理性行動理論、計畫行為理論、跨理論模式等各種理論模型。並透過校外參訪見習，觀察並記錄旅遊情境或旅客實際參與行為，將理論與實務之結合，以激發研究生思考及活用與理論相關之研究架構。此外也導讀該領域之最新研究論文及探討健康行為實例，藉由分析與討論來激發研究生理論與實務之結合。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to introduce and analyze the main theory and model of health behavior applied in travel situations. Several significant theories and models (e.g., Health Belief Model, Theory of Reasoned Action, Theory of Planned Behavior, Transtheoretical Model) will be discussed. By reading and in-class discussion about the newly journal and periodicals of travel health and behaviors, it is expected that graduate students not only comprehend theories and models but also know how to apply them.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
courseName: 特殊旅遊健康創作與實務
courseEngName: The innovation and practice for Special Interest Tour groups
note: 修課限制：本所碩專班、單數周上課。一次上4小時。
courseAbstract: 本課程的目的在了解特殊興趣旅遊(Special Interest Travel)的特性，協助學生知道旅遊的產業經營管理的趨勢與可能的運用模式。培養學生旅遊市場運作能力；並藉由課堂上的練習，引發學生在旅遊產業與議題上實際創新的興趣。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is that students understand the market of the special interest travel and future of the tourism industry. By classroom exercises, students raised issues of the special interest travel in the tourism industry and use creativity skills to practice the role of tour guide for special interest groups.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
note: 修課限制：本所專班碩士班、雙數周上課，一次上4小時。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在幫助學生瞭解統計學相關之概念，俾使學習者對其有所了解與體認。學習者將透過課程講授、交互討論、課後作業及學習報告方式，探討統計學相關之觀念、原則、模式及方法。並配合SPSS統計軟體著重於研究時之具體應用，以為爾後進行論文研究預作準備。

The course contents include descriptive statistics, estimation, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, ANOVA, factor analysis, etc.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
note: 修課限制：本所碩專班二年級以上、書面選課，選課前請先至系辦詢問。
