The students enrolling this class are expected to make progress report and have discussion with the advisor in order to reach the learning goal. Teach students how to present a well-done dissertation with systematically research approaches and related references. The purpose of this course is to promote students’ capacity to design a research proposal. Students will be able to apply research knowledge and formulate a research proposal through individual and group discussion and assignments. Students will be able to identify a research problem, organize relevant literature, and design a feasible method for their study.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
note: 修課限制：混合式遠距教學、遠距教學課程、本所碩專班二年級以上。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在幫助學生瞭解研究概論相關之概念以及科學論文寫作之方式，俾使學習者對其有所了解與體認。學習者將透過課程講授、交互討論、課後作業及學習考試方式，探討研究論文寫作之觀念、原則與寫作之基本技巧、方法。以為爾後進入有關職場之經營管理、指導、教育訓練以及研究等預作準備。
courseEngAbstract: This course is provided to introduce the essential concepts in research methods, and help the students with fundamental understanding scientific writing in academic research. The class will be guided by different types of instruction including lectures, group discussions, homework and tests. By the end, the students will have a basic understanding on concepts, principle, model and method of research methods. These will be helpful to the students’ further studies and their career planning.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
courseEngName: Seminar in Tourism and Health Science II
note: 修課限制：本所碩專二年級、單數周上課，一次上4小時。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生對未來論文撰述之相關議題做更深入、完備之研討。研究生所選擇的問題主題將成為研討會中的討論焦點。同儕間與師生間之腦力激盪、相互研討是本課程的主要學習策略。
courseEngAbstract: This lesson aims at helping students to make deeper and more complete discussions in future theses and related problems. Problems and topics chosen by graduate students will be the focus of the discussions in seminar. The purpose of this course is to stimulate intellectual challenges and communications between students and professors.

department: 休閒產業與健康促進系碩士在職專班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課，選課前請先至系辦詢問。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生獨立完成一篇碩士論文。學生在指導教授的協助下，經驗一次以學術為導向或以實務為導向之研究過程。其包括研究計劃的撰寫、研究設計、資料的收集、分析、與解釋，並統整成一份書面報告。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to assist students in independently finishing theses or projects for designated topic. With the professors’ help, students can experience the research process from intellectual and realistic prospects. This includes research plan, investigative setup, collection, evaluation and explanation of data and sorts out all the things into a complete written report.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、本所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程主要在介紹失智症的症狀、診斷與分期，問題行為精神症狀的照護、如何與失智長輩溝通、活動安排、環境設計與個人中心照顧倫理。另外，也涵蓋了照顧者的壓力與調適、相關照護資源介紹。課程進行方式除講授法之外，透過照護活動實際練習與生命故事書的製作與分享，期待學生能於臨床照顧實務過程中，展現專業能力。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students to gain knowledge and skill that related to the care for the dementia population and their caregivers. This course addresses the pressing need to develop skills in understanding and caring for people with dementia. This course will also study what dementia is and the experience of living with dementia; how cultures of residential care can be improved to put the needs of people with dementia at the centre of care; and some of the difficult issues that arise for people with dementia near the end of their life.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後
courseAbstract:
在長期照護場域中，無效溝通經常導致家屬與長照專業人員之間的誤會、挫折或緊張，亦可能使得受照顧的老人遭遇不必要的健康後果或不良事件。這些溝通上的挑戰可部分歸因於老人與家庭照顧者的健康識能不足。在此脈絡下，健康識能的挑戰包括能否瞭解並運用現有長期照護服務及支持措施，也可擴展至照顧決策時存在的資訊不對稱議題，影響了老年人能否在原有的社區環境中維持其健康狀態及生活模式。
為了避免無效溝通並確保長期照護之良好品質，必須讓學生及早接觸與理解，並指導學生學習達成良好溝通的適當技巧，以縮減健康識能的落差。在本課程當中，教師將與學生共同建立長期照護場域中不同的溝通場景與對話，學生可發展有效溝通的策略與方法，並從中演練並學習如何達成有效的長期照護溝通。
courseEngAbstract:
In long-term care settings, ineffective communication leads to confusion,frustration, and even tension between the family and long-term workers, and also can contribute to undesired outcomes or adverse events of older adults. Part of these communication challenges can be attributed to health literacy of older adults and family caregivers. The health literacy challenges in this context include navigating and understanding long-term services and supports that are available and accessible.It can be extended for referring information asymmetry during care decision making as older persons maintain their health or lifestyle in the community.
To avoid ineffective communication and to ensure quality of care in long-term care settings, it is crucial to bridge the health literacy gap by exposing our students to those contexts and instructing them in proper skills of better communication. During the course, students will work with the instructor to develop communication scenarios in long-term care settings. Students can construct ways of effective
communication and learn from how it can be proceeded.

department: 二年制長期照護系
courseName: 長期照護實務工作概論
courseEngName: Overview of Long-Term Care Practicum Work
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系學士後
courseAbstract: 本科目為長期照護實務工作專業的入門課程，望藉由理論介紹與實務分享，引領學生進入長期照護實務工作專業的世界。本課程會介紹長期照護體系，及長期照護工作可以運用於各種不同的領域及場域，並激發學生思考瞭解自己與長期照護服務的連接性，以為未來進階服務做準備。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: This is the introductory course for entering the long-term care practice. The lecturer shares related theories and practical experience for guiding the students to understand the real situations of the long-term care. The course introduces the system of long-term care and a variety of fields and setting in the long-term care. Moreover, the purpose of the course is to encourage the students to think the relationship between themselves and the services of long-term care in order to preparing themselves to enter the advanced practice.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後
courseAbstract: 本課程以家庭系統理論為基礎，介紹家庭中成員彼此之關係變化與動力，並進而協助學生了解家庭對個人的影響。內容包括:婚姻歷程、親職與手足、家庭溝通、家庭凝聚與自我發展、親密界線、壓力反應、危機調適等，協助了解長期照護與家庭動力間的互動關係與應用。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: Based on the family system theory, the course is to introduce the dynamic relation among family members, and explore the interaction process between individual and family in long term care situations. The following topics will be included: the process of marriage life, parental relation, the communication in the family, differentiation and separation, ego boundary, stress coping and crisis adjustment in the caregiving process.

department: 二年制長期照護系
courseEngName: The Integration and Application in Social Community Resource
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 依循社會資源中的人力資源、財力資源以及社會資源等，細究人力資源中的內在與非正式資源、人情脈絡與人群組織，社區的物質資源與物力資源在福利服務中之運用，社會工作中的財力資源與取得之道等。進而，討論政府福利措施、機構式、社區式與居家式的福利資源，以及正式福利資源如何連串建構出有利於受助群體的資源網絡。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: Introduce and visit the social resources, include of the human resources, financial resources, and social resources in the community welfare services. Further , to discuss the integration and application in government welfare system , institutional type, community-based and home -style welfare resources.

department: 二年制長期照護系
courseName: 長期照護個案管理與實務
courseEngName: Case Management in Long Term Care Practice
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生、學士後
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生獲得長期照護與個案管理之基本知能，並介紹個案管理過程架構，包括：名詞、緣起、原則、管理模式、個案管理者職責、角色與功能，並以長期照護個案管理之應用，介紹個案管理與照護管理的概念、並以長期照護實務應用啟發學生對個案管理與長期照護應用之認識與興趣，並能實際運用於長期照護實務學習。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students to gain knowledge and skill that related to the care management. It included the following concepts: principle of health delivery system, care management, and integrated resources. This impacted students’ interesting of management and can be useful in long term care. After complete the course, the students will be able: (1) to understand the knowledge of case/care management; (2) to apply the case/care management values and principles in long term care practices; (3) to understand the concepts of care management; (5) to identify the role/competency, and the function of a care manager in long term care.

department: 二年制長期照護系
courseName: 長期照護需求評估與應用
courseEngName: The Assessments and Applications of Need in Long Term Care
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生三年級以上、學士後、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹臨床和研究中使用的評估工具，主要針對日常生活活動、肌耐 力、動作控制、認知功能、視知覺、心理社會功能及情境因素等層面之評估 工具。本課程幫助學習者熟悉使用評估工具，以利在醫療單位、機構、居家 運用適宜的評估工具。此外，讓學習者練習如何閱讀和報告評估結果。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The course introduces the assessments used in clinical and research settings. The assessments are for assessing activities of daily life, muscle strength and endurance, motor control, cognition, visual perception, psychosocial function, and the physical environment. In this course, the students can be familiar with the assessments and understand how to choose and use appropriate assessment in clinical settings, such as hospital, origination for long-term care and home care. In addition, the students can learn how to read and present the results of assessments.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論/哲學與宗教/世界文明史/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程以直向生命與橫向生命為主軸，引導學子正確的認識哲學、了解宗教，並將重心放在各哲學理論與宗教義理對生命的看法上，使哲學與宗教和人生「生、老、病、死」與「我、人、事、物」等不同面向相連結，探究人的特性與價值、人生的欲望與煩惱、對錯與善惡、真善美聖等問題，再融入各種人生觀、價值觀、知識論、倫理學、道德觀、宗教觀、修行觀等，使知、情、意、行能夠融為一體，藉以培養學生自我檢視與自我成長的態度，深入且多元的思考人生種種經驗與體會，進而建立良好的哲學思惟與宗教觀念，訂立適切且自他兩利的人生目標，展開幸福健康的生命旅程。
courseEngAbstract:
Although philosophy and religion are two oldest fields of human culture, their influences are up to now still impressive. This course offers the basic knowledge of the two disciplines, including not only philosophy and religion themselves, but also a philosophical reflection on religion.
This course introduces the brief development histories and contents of the oriental and occidental philosophies. It gives also a discourse on issues of the origin of religion and the central dogmas of a few world religions, such as Buddhism, Christianity and Islam. In order to make the learners better to understand their own cultural circumstances, the present religious state in Taiwan will be discussed too. As for the philosophy of religion, the dialectics of faith and reason and the relation between ethics and religion will be particularly emphasized.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生、本系學士後
courseAbstract: 透過課程讓學生學習情緒和壓力等相關的學識，課堂中以講授、討論、報告、分享的形式 ，讓學生理解學識後亦能培養自身情緒管理和壓力調適的能力，而應用於日常生活或職場之中。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to teach students the basic principles, theories, and relaxation techniques to effectively manage personal stress. Students will gain a greater understanding of the mind-body relationship, learn to employ a holistic approach to stress and adopt effective cognitive techniques, coping skills, and relaxation techniques. Ultimately, students will experience a more effective approach to optimal lifelong health.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note:
1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育/電腦軟體整合應用/環境永續與資訊科學」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。
 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 
3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
4.上課地點:1-8週F601，9-16週F412
courseAbstract:
本課程為環境永續發展與資訊科學之教學內容，主要在闡述環境永續發展的重要性，提昇學生永續發展的覺知，結合資訊科技的應用，以具備適當資訊應用的能力，培養維護環境永續的行動技能。
課程內容涵蓋環境倫理、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、生態保育、電腦程式設計、結合環境教育主題之資訊應用等主題。教學策略運用做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境與結合電腦軟體應用等議題。
courseEngAbstract:
This course focuses on the importance of sustainable environmental development and information science. By integrating the application of information technology, this course aims to explain the importance of sustainable environmental development and to raise students' awareness of sustainable development in order to equip students with the ability to apply appropriate information technology and to develop the skills to maintain environmental sustainability.

The course covers topics such as environmental ethics, environmental change and disaster prevention, energy conservation and energy management, ecological conservation, computer programming, and information application integrated with environmental education themes. Teaching strategies include learning by doing, experiencing in real-life situations, cooperative learning methods, using sensory learning, exploring the environment, and integrating computer software applications.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由聽四二A、護四二B、長二一A互相跨班選課。 
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
學習與養成良好的各種基本技術後並加強比賽技術、戰
術的應用與結合，以期能在桌球比賽中獲得有效成果。如有優質的各種基本技術及搭配
單打戰術應用就能在比賽中直接得分與攻擊。在比賽技術中有良好優質的接發球戰術就
能先發制人，且能有效控制對方直接攻擊得分，其贏球機率高。因此在單打技術、戰術
應用桌球技術中佔有極重要性
courseEngAbstract:
After learning and cultivating various kinds of basic skills, 
a player should reinforce the applications and combinations of singles and 
tactics, aiming to have effective results in table tennis games. If a player has 
various kinds of superior basic skills combined with the applications of singles 
tactics, he/she can score and attack directly in a game. In terms of singles, if a 
player has superior tactics for receiving and serving the ball, he/she can take 
the initiative and control his/her opponent effectively to attack and score 
directly, so that he/she will have a greater chance to win the game; therefore, 
such tactics has great importance in table tennis skills regarding singles and 
tactics applications.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生二年級以上需同時選修長二二A必修「進階長期照護實習2」、本系學士後(須同時或修畢「進階長期照護實習1」)、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程主要以人為中心的照顧作為核心理念與指引，旨在培養學習者具備以人為中心的需求評估及活動設計的能力，並將之應用於日間照顧使用者。課程內容涵蓋介紹人口變遷與日間照護發展的關連、日間照護服務範疇與實務、品質管理及相關法規、家屬參與及溝通、以及需求評估及活動設計評估等議題。課程進行方式除講授法之外，也透過實際進行需求評估及活動設計等實作活動，期待學生能於照顧實作過程中，展現專業照顧能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course focuses on personal-centered care as a core concept and guide. Students will learn about personal-centered day care needs assessment and day care activities. The course also covers topics such as the relationship between population change and day care development, the scope and practice of day care services, quality. In addition to the lecture teaching method, the course conducts practical activities such as needs assessment and day care activities through the day care center. Students will be expected to demonstrate professional care during the care process.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生二年級以上、本系學士後、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程的設計旨在協助學生正視個人生涯或職場中，可能面對的生命、痛苦 與死亡的課題。本課程期能引導學生從人生哲學、生死觀、價值觀、與意義觀 等人文角度探討生死課題、探索對生命的體認，同時對生活周遭一切進行反思。 本課程除期能提供學生進一步瞭解長期照護個案之臨終照護議題重要性外，也 將透過實務安寧療護經驗分享與知識傳遞，讓學生體認長期照護服務實務中尊 重生命體與生死議題的態度與思維準備。
courseEngAbstract: The course aims at students are: first, to learn from their personal experiences toward death or caring dying family members; second, students can open their heart to discuss the fears and anxieties of death and dying. From this course, students can be truly care and be empathetic with dying process especially in helping dying person and their families to facing the end stage of life in different long term care services.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：模組課程、實習課程、本系二技一般生二年級以上、本系學士後二年級以上、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 一、配合教育部於 103 年委託本校制訂「長期照護核心課程」，105 年開始 進行「試辦計畫」，本次實習場域為「長照十年」居家照顧服務機構， 主軸為居家照顧服務督導員。 二、認識居家照顧服務的緣起、組織功能和運作，以及專業人員角色和知能。 三、認識居家照顧服務員的服務場域（個案和家庭）的特質和工作的特性。 四、學習居家服務督導員的功能和角色、督導員的督導技巧、和溝通技巧。 五、習得居家服務管理的技巧和知能，包括照顧的安排與個案問題的管理。 六、瞭解居家服務個案家庭的特質與認識家庭動力評估的相關知能和技巧(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: This course is to help student to advacned and integrate the knowledge of long term care to clinical practice that deal with different settings approaches to long-term care.  Through this course, they can assess the common problems of the long-term care patients and their families. And apply the relevant care concept to plan and implement correctly, safety and individual intervention.  They can also realize the role functions of profession in long term care and share with themselves feeling and role adjustment in long term care setting.

department: 二年制長期照護系
note: 修課限制：實習課程、模組課程、本系二技一般生、本系學士後(須同時或修畢「進階長期照護實習1」)、需同時修長二二A選修「日間照護實務實作」、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程的主要目的是學習居家照顧服務督導員的督導功能和角色。包括學習服務方案管理的知能和技巧（需求評估、方案內容規劃、服務過程評估、服務品質確保、和成效評估），個案問題分類與因應（應用理論，區分問題，研議因應原則）、督導技巧（專業關係、團體動力、督導介入）、老人和身心障礙者周全性評估、照顧管理專員的功能角色和專業知能。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to learn intensive and advanced supervisory skills. Students are required to become familiar with program planning, constructing, and evaluation skills.  They will be exposed to the knowledge of service quality assurance. They are required to learn the categorize problems and needs of intended clients. The learning of supervisory skills is also included, including the formation of professional alliance with the clients, an evaluation and management of group dynamics for home helpers, Students are also to learn the integrated care model for the elders and disabled clients. The last goal of learning pertains to the role and function of care managers in long-term care management centers.

department: 長期照護系碩士班
courseName: 長期照護文獻導讀與評析
courseEngName: Critical Review on Long Term Care Literature
note: 修課限制：本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在藉由選讀長期照護相關英文文獻，課程內容涵蓋認識長期照護相關領域相關期刊之資料庫、期刊研究之主題、期刊論文結構之解析與評論，每人依據專業興趣搜尋及閱讀相關實証性研究或理論性文獻，並於課堂上解析報告與評論。修完該課程後，學生應可增強下列各能力：(1)英文閱讀能力(2)對長期照護相關文獻重要概念及議題之理解(3)對期刊論文架構解析(4)批判性思考能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this selected course is to help students to select and review the literature of long term care. The content of this course includes the introduction of data-base of health care management, the profile of selected journals, the basic structu

department: 長期照護系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程在協助學生對未來論文撰述之相關議題，做更深入完備之研討。課程中，學生須與該專業領域相關專長之老師，共同訂定學習契約，並透過個別輔導達成學習目標。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to assist student to be prepared on the related issues of thesis. During the course, student is supposed to make the learning contract with the professional teacher. Through one-by-one counseling, the student will reach the goal learning proposed.

department: 長期照護系碩士班
courseName: 長期照護組織經營與管理
note: 修課限制：本所、外所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助長期照護的研究生，獲得有關我國長期照護體系(Long term Care System)內有關之機構的組織及管理的知識與技能，及其在護理及醫療部門管理之應用。課程內容以管理的功能: 規劃、組織、領導、控制及人員、財、物、資源、資訊管理之矩陣為架構。範圍從長期照護醫療組織與管理的簡介開始，再依循管理的過程分別介紹醫護管理有關的主題以問題解決及策略決擇的方式以期學生因此能開發各自的管理潛能並期望為其將來能成為高效率的管理者奠定基礎。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide graduate students who are interested in pursuing long term care, with in-depth knowledge and skills in management theories and practices of long term care organizations. It is tailored to meet the demands of students in

department: 長期照護系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在闡明在長期照護體系中專業照護及管理之界定、呈現、評估、介入、提供、以及相關之實務或操作施行等之總體概念，以及長期照護實務執行，包括有團隊實(運)作、專業知能技巧、評估介入、工具應用(研發)、(照護)計畫擬定、(照護)活動設計、資源需耗、品質監測等。期許學生能習得長期照護統合概念與實務運作機制等。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is designed to be interdisciplinary by integrating medical, nursing, psychological, social, and other aspects of long-term care perspectives. The course is aimed to delineate overall figure of defining, presenting, assessment, intervention, providing, and related issues of professional tasks and management, practices and delivery of Long-Term Care (support & protection, LTC). Along with the contemporary LTC, it encompassed the attainment of LTC team, skill & technology, assessment toolkit, care plan, care activity designing, quality control, and operating & managing, for the rooting and growing of care management, seed planting faculty & material, professional empowering and industry forming, rather, for related policy promotion campaign regarding LTC demand & supply, education & nurturing, advising & counseling, reviewing, and other necessary contextual factors.
For the application of this care approaching & intervention, to empower or fulfill this new field in the country, we expect the course will examine LTC related living & life, activity, participation and health (aging, morbidity, de-conditioning), contextual factors and corresponding approaching and intervention on various care clients／recipients, sites, role. Through understanding, handling, delivering, and creating care services potentially can make good use of available resources linking, to interact, and to integrate with all related professional disciplines involved. Through lectures, oral presentation and in-class discussion, the learners with the professional background or basis would be supposed to organize the knowledge, skill and value(principle) of care, ultimately to provide pertinent relationship, prediction, agreement, plan, choice of tactics….etc., and then closing anyway.

department: 長期照護系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上
courseAbstract: 為非物理治療師或職能治療師介紹物理治療與職能治療於長期照護之角色與功能，以促進團隊合作，提供個案整合型的照護。
courseEngAbstract: This course will introduce the role of physical therapists and occupational therapists in the long term care system to other team members in order to facilitate team cooperation and provide integrative care to the long term care clients. The students shou

department: 長期照護系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生獨立完成一篇碩士論文。學生在指導教授的協助下，經驗一次以學術為導向之研究過程。其包括研究計劃、資料的收集、分析、與解釋，並統整成一份學術論文。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to assist students in independently finishing theses or projects for designated topic. With the professor’s help, students can experience the research process from intellectual and realistic prospects. This includes research plan (designated plan), investigative setup (designated setup), collection, evaluation and explanation of data and sorts out all the things into a complete written report.

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
courseEngName: The Integration and Application in Social Community Resource
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系學士後
courseAbstract: 依循社會資源中的人力資源、財力資源以及社會資源等，細究人力資源中的內在與非正式資源、人情脈絡與人群組織，社區的物質資源與物力資源在福利服務中之運用，社會工作中的財力資源與取得之道等。進而，討論政府福利措施、機構式、社區式與居家式的福利資源，以及正式福利資源如何連串建構出有利於受助群體的資源網絡。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: Introduce and visit the social resources, include of the human resources, financial resources, and social resources in the community welfare services. Further , to discuss the integration and application in government welfare system , institutional type, community-based and home -style welfare resources.

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
note: 修課限制：模組課程、學士後
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在闡明長期照護相關之政策與法規。主要內容包括國內外長期照護 政策之演進、當前台灣長期照護之政策與法規，人力與財力資源及長照服務 人員之權利與義務。期能透過課室參與及對話，培養學生對長期照護政策與 法規之變動之關注度與敏銳度。
courseEngAbstract: This course will focus on legal issues relevant to the operations of long term care providers across the continuum of care, including senior housing, assisted living, nursing facilities, Continuing Care Retirement Communities, and hospice and home health. These legal issues include licensure and accreditation, quality regulation and assurance, admission and discharge policies, reimbursement, and care coordination. We will discuss these issue from a policy context as well as through the statutory, regulatory, and case framework.

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
courseName: 長期照護個案管理與實務
courseEngName: Case Management in Long Term Care Practice
note: 修課限制：模組課程、學士後
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生獲得長期照護與個案管理之基本知能，並介紹個案管理過程架構，包括：名詞、緣起、原則、管理模式、個案管理者職責、角色與功能，並以長期照護個案管理之應用，介紹個案管理與照護管理的概念、並以長期照護實務應用啟發學生對個案管理與長期照護應用之認識與興趣，並能實際運用於長期照護實務學習。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students to gain knowledge and skill that related to the care management. It included the following concepts: principle of health delivery system, care management, and integrated resources. This impacted students’ interesting of management and can be useful in long term care. After complete the course, the students will be able: (1) to understand the knowledge of case/care management; (2) to apply the case/care management values and principles in long term care practices; (3) to understand the concepts of care management; (5) to identify the role/competency, and the function of a care manager in long term care.

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
courseName: 長期照護需求評估與應用
courseEngName: The Assessments and Applications of Need in Long Term Care
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生三年級以上、學士後、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹臨床和研究中使用的評估工具，主要針對日常生活活動、肌耐 力、動作控制、認知功能、視知覺、心理社會功能及情境因素等層面之評估 工具。本課程幫助學習者熟悉使用評估工具，以利在醫療單位、機構、居家 運用適宜的評估工具。此外，讓學習者練習如何閱讀和報告評估結果。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The course introduces the assessments used in clinical and research settings. The assessments are for assessing activities of daily life, muscle strength and endurance, motor control, cognition, visual perception, psychosocial function, and the physical environment. In this course, the students can be familiar with the assessments and understand how to choose and use appropriate assessment in clinical settings, such as hospital, origination for long-term care and home care. In addition, the students can learn how to read and present the results of assessments.

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
courseEngName: Practical Project in Long Term Care (II)
note: 修課限制：本系學士後二年級以上、外系學士後、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程針對學生於長期照護實務有興趣的議題，透過文獻搜尋、文獻閱讀與文獻分析整理，來幫助學生透過學理、研究數據與成果來更深入且廣闊地瞭解長期照護的發展與現況、瞭解長期照護需求與發展，並思考長期照護未來的走向，以及目前國際於長照的發展趨勢。本課程將結合PBL（Problem-Based Learning）問題導向學習法，透過小組學習方式進行。其中，小組式學習的好處不只是可以來增進知識，同時也可以促進溝通技巧、團隊合作、解決問題、自主學習、資訊分享、以及訓練團隊成員彼此尊重。因此， PBL 被視為是結合知識獲取及培養技巧與態度的學習方式。是故，本課程期望以學生為學習的主題，透過教師的引導從過往研究成果作為依據，並以前瞻性的觀點來看長期照護未來，冀望提出新的觀點或延伸出可新探討的議題，培養同學對長期照護議題的興趣。
courseEngAbstract: The course focuses on topics of the long-term care that students have interests on. The students will understand the long-term care deeply and globally through searching literatures, reading and discussing articles, analyzing articles, compiling, and writing. Further, the students can think of the trend of the long-term care.

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
courseName: 長期照護經營管理與品質
courseEngName: Managing and Quality Insurance in Long Term Care
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生二年級以上、外系二技一般生二年級以上、外系二技進修部二年級以上、本系學士後二年級以上、與長二二A併班開課，主開於長照學二、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 0本課程主旨在於學習長期照護機構的經營與管理，包括行政、人事、總務、環境、財務與行銷和因應評鑑適宜，重點在於實務操作的技巧和原則，這些經營管理的目標在於強化機構的品質，照護服務的情境則包括機構式、社區式、和居家式。
courseEngAbstract: The course aims to train students to understand management knowledge and skills. Management functions: planning, organization, leadership, control and personnel, financial, material, resources, information management. Ranging from health care management organization and then follow the process of managing care management-related topics are introduced to problem-solving approaches and policy choices to students so they can develop management potential and expect to become management talents in LTC industry

department: 長期照護系學士後多元專長培力課程專班
courseEngName: Ethical Issues in Long Term Care Practice
note: 修課限制：模組課程、本系二技一般生二年級以上、本系學士後二年級以上、與長二二A併班開課，主開於長照學二、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解倫理的意義、具備倫理實踐的技巧等工作知能外，另協助學生亦將習得的倫理運用於工作當中；透過實務研討培養學生具備長期照護適切之溝通應具備之正確態度與倫理。(待修正)
courseEngAbstract: The course aims to facilitate students’ development of self-evaluation of ethics, life and professional in long term care practice. Through the examination of empirical and theoretical works on issues in long term care, students will develop the competence in critical analysis and judgment, strategies to deal with ethical problems in different long term care service situations. Course contents also include the critical analysis of “life,” “respect of Individuals,” ”and “human dignity” in long term care, analysis of the relationship among ethics, law and professional and critical appraisal of enhancement of ethical practice in long term care.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 藉由教授家庭動力理論與完成個人自我家庭動力分析作業，培養學生瞭解如何評估與分析家庭動力的能力。此課程亦會探討長照家庭之各式家庭動力之議題，以其協助學生對於長期照護有更進深之認識。
courseEngAbstract: This course leads students to talk about the basic concepts of family dynamics, and then in-depth study of family history, development, life cycle, system view, and related practices and research. Through the exploration, experience and analysis of personal family dynamics, students will be inspired to understand how multiculturalism, gender role status and interaction patterns affect family dynamics, so as to cultivate the ability to evaluate and analyze family dynamics as a professional worker in the future. In addition to the teaching method of the course, the course is supplemented by film appreciation, group discussion to assist students in thinking, hoping to achieve a combination of theory and practice.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹生物統計學的基本概念，使學生成為生統的使用及受益者。協助其於閱讀研究論文時對資料內容進行正確的思考判斷，具備發現及解決問題的能力，並進而能靈活應用在專業的實務工作中。
courseEngAbstract: This course’s objective is to help the student became an informed consumer and user of biostatistics. Emphasize to cultivate the abilities of evaluating the nursing literature and applying study results to patient care. The designs of curriculum are focused on introducing the basic methods of organizing, summarizing and presenting a set of data; the concept of probability, sampling, and probability distributions; confidence intervals and hypothesis testing; comparison of two or more groups means; nonparametric methods; contingency tables; correlation and simple linear regression. Expect students can participant in nursing research.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部
courseAbstract: 高齡化社會的來臨，銀髮蓬勃發展。本課程將透過老人服務需求的討論，使同學對於老人福利、老人服務事業以及銀髮產業有一概括性的認識與瞭解，以建立其服務銀髮族群之基礎知能，期能激發學生投入銀髮專業的意願與興趣或職涯發展。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to the need of the service through the elderly welfares so that the students have a general knowledge and understanding in order to establish the basis of knowledge and ability.The course can stimulate students' willingness to invest Sseniors Industrial and professional for their career developments.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 隨著人口老化現象益趨顯著，老年人口不斷增加，老人健康照護及失能老人的長期照護已成為當前重要課題。本課 程旨在讓學生認識正常老化個案身體各系統的變化，功能衰退老年人常見的疾病、評估方式及安全照護原則與方法，瞭解老人健康照護所需運用之知識與資訊，以增加服務老年個案之專業能力。
courseEngAbstract: The main focal point of this subject is to introduce old man and relevant topics that are looked after for a long time, enable students with looking after preliminary understanding for a long time to the old man, in order to enter relevant old men to serve and look after relevant job markets such as the field's foundation for a long time as the future.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生一年級。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要是以做體驗為主，將帶領學生至社區關懷據點、老人安養機構實際做老人服務的工作，培養學生做中學，服務中學習的態度與能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course focus on experience learning. Students will go to the community and long term care facilities to care the elderly. We hope students can learn by doing.Through the course, students will learn the right attitude and ability through the participation.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所本國生、學士後、跨校
courseAbstract: 介紹社會學的基本觀念，如社會的組成、社會結構、社會變遷、各種社會制度 (如家庭、宗教、經濟等) ，以及社會學的分析方法，使學生學習培養社會學的思考方式，期能運用於日常生活與專業領域之中。全部課程的規劃分為六大部分：社會學基本原理、個人與社會的關係、社會不平等、社會制度、社會變遷與社會學的應用等。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is threefold: to examine the methodologies and theories in sociology, to examine the major themes, and to apply the major tenets of sociological knowledge to the real life situations. The emphasis will be on the applications of sociological knowledge to health care management. The conduction of the class features arts and crafts, small group discussion, audio-visual films. The major themes explored include socialization, culture, family systems, group dynamics, family violence as a social phenomenon, crime, racial relationship, political party and elections, and others. Final term exams will be held in the end of the semester.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系四技一般生、外系四技一般生。
2.跨域課程。45人修課人數上限。
courseAbstract: 本課程的內容包括老化理論、自由基對老化的影響、各器官抗老養生飲食、機能性食品簡介及如何利用機能性食品抗老。
courseEngAbstract: The course of Gerontological Health Nutrition is design for the 4- year program of Department of Gerontological health Care consists two parts. The first part introduces the concept of elderly nutrition. Such as body weight management, elderly dietary guideline, dietary goal, exchange list, nutrition label. The second part introduces the nutritional care and the diet therapy on various elderly diseases, such as obesity, DM, atherosclerosis disease, chronic renal failure, osteoporosis, nutritional deficiency (such anemia) etc.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note:
.1.第二階段加退選僅由護理學院四技生一年級生互相跨班選課及護理學院重修生選課。
2.第三階段加退選開放系外選課。
3.主題:文學與傳統故事改編。
courseAbstract: 本課程銜接中學國文教育，著重培養學生閱讀、欣賞、寫作、口語表達等語言文字能力，並提升學生閱讀興趣、拓展人文視野，增進學生人文精神與文化涵養，進而落實至生活中，以培養獨立思考、理性自主的健全人格。
courseEngAbstract: In this course students will study representative works of classical and modern literature, with an emphasis on improving verbal skills such as reading, writing, speaking and appreciation for Chinese literature. In doing so, the course aims to inspire students' interest in reading in order to expand on their knowledge, thus able to integrate vitality and cultural conservation into everyday life, whilst promoting independent, logical thinking and a healthy character.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生獲得專業與倫理之基本知識、概念及各種照護倫理困境之分析與決策能力，進而激發學生發展批判性的倫理思考與判斷之潛能。課程內容以專業倫理之基本概念及倫理理論與原則，銜接人文社會學科 (如哲學、宗教、邏輯、法律等)， 並以臨床常見之案例、加深學生對高齡照護倫理的印象。透過講解、分析與討論等教學方法，檢視價值觀與衝突、倫理與道德觀、病人權利與責任、照顧工作者權利與責任、倫理理論、基本倫理原則、倫理困境與倫理決策等等議題。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this course are to help students to gain the basic knowledge, concepts and standardized behavior of ethics, to distinguish clinical ethical issues, as well as the ability to analyze and make decisions of ethical dilemma in order to urge them to develop critical thinking and proper judgment. The concepts of this course focus on the ethical basic concepts and the application of ethical principles: including the analysis and discussion of ethics and moral concepts; the formation and conflicts of values, the rights and responsibilities of patients and care givers; application the main theories and principles of ethical dilemma, and the ethical decision framework.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「資訊素養與網路運用」課程之學生互相跨班選課。2.重修生請自第二階段開放選課。全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程為電腦之基礎課程，主要培育學生資訊素養，以具備適當資訊應用能力。課程內容除強化電腦基本概念、作業系統與文書處理軟體應用能力外，並包含網路觀念、網路應用、網路安全、資訊倫理，與智慧財產權。
courseEngAbstract: This course is a basic course to educate students to have enough knowledge about information literacy and network application. The course will include the basic concept of computers, operating systems, office application software, network applications, information security, and intellectual property concepts.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由高41A、健43A、健43B、運四3B互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
本課程主要希望修課學生能學習到進階體能訓練的概念，
進而提升自己的體能，且本課程擁有徒手肌力訓練、核心訓練與健身器材的操作練習，
相信選修者必定能掌握進階的體能訓練技巧。
courseEngAbstract:
In this course, students can learn the advanced physical training to improve 
their physical fitness. This course has Bodyweight training, core training and 
exercises in the operation of fitness equipment. It is believed that electives 
must be able to master the advanced physical training skills.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
courseEngName: Introduction of Policy and Marketing in Long-term Care
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後
courseAbstract: 本課程主要以台灣長照政策與發展歷程為肇始，相關理論為依據，介紹台灣長照發展政策與未來發展趨勢，並因應社會與長照產業市場改變，在長照經營行銷策略、行銷與品牌管理，機構行銷與公共行銷、長照市場分析與區隔等，讓學生對長期照護品牌經營與市場行銷有概括性認識，期能激發學生長照產業營運行銷企劃能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course will introduce the long-term policy in Taiwan and other countries. Based on the current policy and future trend, the course will applies theories and practices of services marketing on the subject of Long term care marketing. In addition to the concepts of consumer behavior, service product positioning, and market segmentation, the 4Ps of service marketing will also be introduced in the class. Learners are expected to catch up the essence of the long-term care, and possessing independent thinking and judging potential, rather, applying to the professional fields.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生二年級以上、外系二技進修部
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助同學了解非營利組織的實務運作，以及其與政府、產業的合作互動。除了對非營利組織之意義、發展策略、組織行銷等主題介紹，更在實務上有多面向的探討，諸如非營利組織的法制條件、人力資源管理、資源募集整合、組織內部運作、社會企業等非營利組織有效管理之重要議題，期能協助同學對非營利組織有正確的瞭解並有效掌握其運作的關鍵要素，並兼顧理論與實務應用。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to lead the students to understand how NPO operate and cooperation with government and market. This course will help students to identify and secure resources for the support of nonprofit agencies by understanding basic concept of non-profit organization and the techniques for developing comprehensive plans, conducting prospect action plans and cultivation, practicing appropriate stewardship, leading campaigns for various types and vehicles of giving, utilizing technology to facilitate resource on the non-profit organization development, and implementing creative approaches.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
courseEngName: Long Term Care Management and Individual Service Plan
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上
courseAbstract: 本課程內容以需照護對象最大宗的老人照護為主，旨在提供學生獲得長期照護管理知能之實際應用，特別聚焦於個案個別性之照護計畫或方案，課中強調站在需照護本人觀點的照護概念及需求評估的重要性。透過實務操作技巧的活用及演習，期許同學由有體驗、體認、感動、投入而學得有用的學問。
courseEngAbstract:
Care management can be approached as personal assistance technology. 
From this viewpoint, it is important to understand a process as management, even though care planning and assessment play a central role.On the other hand, we can also understand care management as a system.From this perspective, the design of institutional arrangements of care management is crucial.The two perspectives show that care management is not just about individual support or its alternatives, but an entire system that needs to be designed and managed.The goal of the class is for students to understand care management with this concept in mind.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「哲學與人生/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
courseEngAbstract:
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
courseName: 高齡健康促進理論與實務
courseEngName: Gerontological Health Promotion Theory and Practice
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生二年級以上
courseAbstract: 介紹高齡者健康的定義、健康促進與疾病預防之關係、個人健康促進生活評估、行為改變之方法與原則、健康促進行動策略，將健康促進之概念應用於運動、飲食、社會支持、健康責任、壓力與情緒管理、時間管理、自我實現、網路與睡眠及靈性健康等領域。讓學生具有高齡者健康促進相關知識與技能，透過邏輯推理與 批判性思考找出健康問題，並利用行為改變原則或健康促進行 動策略發展健康促進計畫；並藉由團體健康促進策略與實作報告透過溝通、合作讓學生能將實際執行健康促進活動於日常生活中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is aimed to obtain the knowledge of basic concept and method to health promotion, planning, intervention and evaluation and to facilitate and develop advanced skill of health promotion among elderly. The course content includes concepts and definitions of health promotion, history and development of health promotion, models and approaches to health promotion, application and skill to health promotion, assessing gerontological health Care needs, planning health promotion interventions, implementing health promotion and evaluation in health promotion. To improve the quality and well being of life achieves the goal of health for elderly.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
multipleTeacherName: 王曉萍, 彭晴憶, 鄒昌婷, 張蘇鈺, 黃香香
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本系四技一般生二年級以上，113/3/12-113/4/9
courseAbstract: 本課程培養學生具有高齡健康照護專業之基本知識與技能，實際運用高齡健康照護所學之相關學理技術於臨床情境中。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to develop students’ clinical competence in gerontological health care settings.  Within the practicum, students will be trained to apply gerontological theories, related knowledge, and skills in daily gerontological practice.  Students will also be trained to communicate and cooperate with other team members, and to provide elderly Students are also encouraged to actively participating in clinical and ethical issue discussions.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習護理/高照/醫教/助產/健管/長照/聽語「應用法規導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由休四二A、高四二A、健四二AB互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
：本課程透過對羽球基本技能及相關知識的介紹，幫助學
生認識羽球活動的各種技巧，並以引導學生充分運動及享受羽球運動樂趣為主軸，建立
學生終身運動之基礎。授課內容包括單、雙打比賽技能與比賽觀念、比賽規則演變與羽
壇現況的講解，以及實際引導學生體驗各種不同形式的比賽，使學生建立對羽球活動的
基本技能與終身興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is to help students know the various skills of badminton activities 
through the introduction of badminton basic skills and related knowledge 
aiming to have students fully exercise and enjoy the fun of badminton, and 
establish the foundation for lifelong exercise. Curriculum includes game 
techniques of singles and doubles and the explanation of game concepts, 
game rule evolution and status of badminton development, and to actually 
lead students to experience games of different forms, and establish the 
fundamental techniques and lifelong interest of badmintons.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程屬於選修課程，藉由不同文化族群的醫療照護模式、健康維護及健康問題等議題之討論，學生 能認識個（群）體的健康行為與文化之間相互關係。同時，學生能瞭解在不同文化影響下，個（群） 體自我照顧及求醫行為之意義與影響因素。
courseEngAbstract: This course is an elective course. From the discussion of issues like health care mode, health maintenance, and health problems in different cultural groups, students can understand the mutual relationship between individual’s (groups’) health behavior and culture. At the same time, students also can identify the meaning and influencing factors of individual’s (groups’) self-care and behavior of seeking medical treatment under the influence of different cultures.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所本國生、跨校
courseAbstract: 課程目的旨在使學生學習芳香療法與按摩治療之理論與實務，課程內容包括芳香療 法緒論、精油製造方法與作用、精油調配學、芳香療法基本按摩運用教學與實作、芳香 療法於臉部的應用與實作、芳香療法於身體系統的應用與實作、芳香療法按摩應用與實 作，以及芳香療法保健推廣應用。
courseEngAbstract: The course is designed to provide the students with the basic knowledge of aromatherapy. The history of aromatherapy will be outlined. We will discuss factors relating to health and well-being and identify the role of aromatherapy in healing. The methods by which essential oils are extracted are outlined. It also stresses on the basic principles of Astrology, Facial Care, Head and Shoulders treatments. Distinguish the characteristics of the role of the nurse in Aromatherapy and apply knowledge in clinical nursing care to improve quality of life of the patients and their family.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
courseName: 長期照護需求評估與運用
courseEngName: The Needs  Assessment and Application in Long Term Care
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系四技一般生
courseAbstract:
本課程介紹實務和教學中使用的評估工具，評估的對象為高齡者，主要針對日常生活活動、動作評估及肌耐力、動作控制、認知功能、視知覺、心理社會功能及情境因素等層面之評估工具。
本課程幫助學習者熟悉使用評估工具，以利在機構、社區及居家場域運用適宜的評估工具。
courseEngAbstract:
The course introduces the assessments used in clinical and research settings. The 
assessments are for assessing activities of daily life, muscle strength and endurance, motor control, cognition, visual perception, psychosocial function, and the physical environment. In this course, the students can be familiar with the assessments and understand how to choose and use appropriate assessment in clinical settings, such as hospital, origination for longterm care and home care.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、本系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、外系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生了解高齡者及需長期照護者常用日語能力。學習介護日語，瞭解日本介護文化及長照禮儀，學習如何給予高齡者、長照者更溫馨的照顧。以照顧者常用到的單字做教學，藉由會話、分組演練等方式增進學生基礎日語照顧對話能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to learn the regular Japanese language of aging and long-term care, to experience Japanese culture and comprehend the differences between Taiwanese and Japanese long-term service etiquette and care, to learn how to give older people an intimate care. The students can enhance the primary Japanese conversation of care by practicing the common vocabulary through dialog and group exercises... etc.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生三年級以上、外系四技一般生三年級以上、外系二技進修部三年級
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育學生學習方案設計基本的知識與工具，從方案設計的意義、需求評量、策略方案、服務成效評估、資源應用等進行有系統的學習。藉由課程上的互動與議題的討論，啟發同學對於社會議題與問題思考的實踐。希望修習本課程後，同學具備創新思考與方案設計規劃的實作能力，未來發揮所學於長期照護與健康產業之中。設計之初步概念。希望修習本課程後，同學具備方案設計的基本觀念與實作能力，並能夠將課程所學運用於職場與生活之中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to prepare the students to develop the knowledge, skills and strategies required for grantsmanship in relation to project planning, proposal writing, service effect evaluation and fund application at the practice operational level. It also benefits society and helps practitioners, whatever the problem or specialty, to practice more effectively. It appeals the students to this course, enlightens their thinking and creativity from innovation practice and provides assistance on entering long-term care or healthcare industries.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生三年級
courseAbstract: 本課程主旨在建立學生緩和與安寧照護的概念與認知。藉由了解末期疾病病人身、心、社會的衝擊及面對死亡的準備，體認多科專業團隊與義工團隊在末期疾病照護的協同合作功能。以增進學生對疾病末期病人及其家屬身心社會照顧及協助病人及其家屬面對死亡的準備。課程中，亦同時探討護理人員在照顧末期病人時所面臨的壓力與倫理困境。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to provide advanced knowledge about care for the adult oncology patients and their familyand to strengthen concepts of continuity care and the importance of multidisciplinary in cancer care. The concept of holistic nursing care and the trajectory of cancer experience will be utilized as frameworks to introduce nursing care for oncology patients. Course contents include general concepts of cancer, cancer treatment modalities, symptom control, psycho-social needs of cancer patients, family impact in cancer care. Symptoms that are commonly seen in adult oncology patients will be emphasized.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「應用科學導論/科技與生活」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 以學生現有的數理、生物背景為基礎，引導學生進入科技應用的領域。現代科技進步快速，世界日新月異，學生需具備有敏銳之觀察力與學習能力，始能跟上時代之潮流。本課程將目前先進之科技作一概念性的介紹；涵蓋有太空科技、能源應用、材料科技、生物技術、資訊科技等內容，期能一窺世界之奧妙，進而引發學習新知之動機與興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
At the dawn of the twenty-first century today, as every citizen of the world should have a basic scientific concept and knowledge which can serve people to make the decisions, participate in civic and cultural affairs, and join economic production activities. Also, beside the professional expertise and technology, the most important thing for the citizens is to care about humanities, develop themselves actively, and benefit the people and serve the community.
The major purpose of this course is from the new technology of modern life to induced the students knowing the basic applied science and technique concept. From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
courseName: 高齡者活動設計與規畫
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生三年級以上
courseAbstract: 高齡者活動設計與規畫是在高齡照護臨床工作上，必然需要面臨的工作內容，在現今的照顧潮流中，也越來越受到重視，尤其是活動設計的執行過程、原則以及必須注意的事項諸多，稍不留意將會影響活動執行過程的困擾，因此，透過本學期課程學習讓學生具備高齡者活動設計規劃與實務帶領能力。
courseEngAbstract: Elderly activity design for elderly care will need to face today's trends, but also more and more attention, especially, implementation of the design process activities, principles and matters; They must be affected the troubled process of implementation of activities, therefore, through this semester course for students with elderly activity programs.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
multipleTeacherName: 廖英壹, 郭麗敏, 王曉萍, 廖婉彣
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生三年級以上、實習課程，密集9天(113/01/15-113/1/25)。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在使學生能將健康及亞健康之老年族群高齡健康照護學理智能實際運用於臨床實務，體認健康照護員在目前健康照護體系中所扮演角色與功能。藉由實習發現健康照護專業發展的現況及相關問題，深入探討並反思提升自我能力，熟悉健康及亞健康之老年族群高齡健康照護流程及內涵，並培養專業健康照護人員應有的智能、態度及技巧。
courseEngAbstract: This practicum is designed to help students integrate and apply the knowledge in gerontological health Care. It also helps students apply the skills of critical thinking in the processes of health care. In the practicum, students should learn to evaluate the inadaptability in a clients’s physical, psychological, and social adjustments, verify a clients’ health problems, used the acquired knowledge to formulate and carry out customized health care interventions, and evaluate the health care interventions. During the practicum, students should actively participate in the communication and collaboration process with the health care teams, and share their feelings in practicum and role adaptation in order to prepare for the future.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程以現代性的概念，貫連二十世紀至當前的藝術潮流發展，探討當代藝術的幾個重要流派、特性與不同面向，呈現藝術發展的獨特性與創造性。培養藝術涵養及建立個人對審美的主體觀，並瞭解當前社會藝術文化脈動，對當代的文化思潮有其見地，以開展學生發展自我潛能，並將藝術融入生活，提升生命境界。
courseEngAbstract: This course employs the concept of modernity as a framework to establish connections between the evolution of artistic trends from the 20th century to the present day. The course delves into various significant genres, characteristics, and different aspects of contemporary art, thereby highlighting the distinctiveness and creativity of artistic development. The objective of this course is to cultivate artistic appreciation, establish personal aesthetic perspectives and comprehend the prevailing social and cultural trends in art. The course further aims to enhance students' capacity for self-growth, integrate art into their daily lives, and elevate their overall living experience.

department: 四年制高齡健康照護系
courseEngName: Practicum for Obtaining gerontological health care Employment
multipleTeacherName: 彭晴憶, 廖英壹, 王曉萍, 郭麗敏, 廖婉彣, 鄒昌婷, 陳書毓
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生四年級、實習課程，113/02/26(一)-113/05/17(五)
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生整合並運用高齡健康照護相關之知識與技能，於照顧實務工作中，透過連續性且全時高齡健康照護實習，增加學生職場就業機會及提升工作適應能力，以奠定學生從事高齡健康照護工作的基礎。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to develop students’ caring competence in gerontological health care settings. Within the practicum, students will be trained to integrate and apply gerontological health care theories, related knowledge, and skills in daily gerontological practice. Students are expected to provide evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized gerontological care based on assessment. Students will also be trained to communicate and cooperate with other professional team members, and to provide elderly health education and consultation. Students are also encouraged to actively participating in clinical and ethical issue discussions.

department: 高齡健康照護系碩士班
courseEngName: Reablement in The Elderly: Theory and Application
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育學生復能的理論與應用概念，包含物理治療與職能治療的角色，運動及訓練生活行為改變、環境改造、智慧科技、輔具、資源利用等，族群除涵蓋原有高齡失能失智族群外，更加強健康、亞健康族群的預防延緩失能與失智 。課程會針對高齡復能相關文獻加以評析，並在期末整理出一個主題報告呈現。以期學生能將復能概念應用在高齡健康促進與照護的研究上。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides students with an opportunity to understand the reablement in the elderly. The class consists of lectures, topic discussion, and journal reading. Topics will cover principles of reabement, physical and occupational therapy. Prevention of disabled and dementia for the elderly, applications of assistive products, and barrier free environment in long term care. The course will help students to understand the basic theory of and application of reablement. Furthermore, understanding and criticizing the journal , then organize an topic are required in the class.

department: 高齡健康照護系碩士班
multipleTeacherName: 王曉萍, 廖婉彣, 葉馨婷
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助碩士班學生認識研究方法，課程內容包含健康服務研究的基本哲學、抽樣方法、調查訪問、實驗研究、問卷設計、資料收集與分析等，將透過研究實例介紹實證研究在政策實務上之應用，並透過文獻批判以提升學生閱讀與批判科學實證論文的技巧，期可協助學生強化研究技巧與能力，並將研究能量運用於高齡健康照護之重要議題中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to help master students understand research methods. The course content includes basic philosophy of health service research, sampling methods, survey interviews, experimental research, questionnaire design, data collection and analysis, etc. It will introduce empirical research in policy practice through research examples. The application of the above, and through literature criticism to improve students' skills in reading and critiquing scientific empirical papers, can help students strengthen their research skills and abilities, and apply research energy to important issues in elderly health care.

department: 高齡健康照護系碩士班
courseName: 進階高齡健康照護I：健康照護與促進
courseEngName: Advanced Gerontological Health Care I : Health Care and Health Promotion
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生發展健康促進方案以改善高齡者健康的能力。課程包括檢視影響高齡者健康的相關因素及其對應的健康促進方案，由社會環境面的討論延伸至個人的健康信念與照護行為，主題包含:高齡友善城市與社區營造、醫療照護體系、以及家庭與個人生活型等對高齡者健康的影響，期盼學生能應用相關理論知識，針對有興趣的高齡人口群及健康議題發展適切的健康介入方案。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to cultivate students' ability of developing health promotion programs to improve the health of the elderly. The course will review social and environmental elements regarding health care and health promotion, followed by introducing behavioral theories applied in a variety of health promotion programs. Students are expected to familiarize with the concepts of health behavior and health promotion, and to apply relevant theories to develop appropriate health intervention plans for interested elderly population groups and health issues.

department: 高齡健康照護系碩士班
courseName: 進階高齡健康照護II：產業經營與管理
courseEngName: Advanced Gerontological Health Care II: Operation and Management
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生具備高齡產業經營及管理知識與能力。課程內容以管理的功能:規劃、組織、領導、控制及人員、資源、資訊管理之矩陣 為基礎架構，探索高齡健康產業組織經營與管理等議題。課程依循管理程序，分別針對高齡產業與組織經營管理相關主題，以問題解決及管理策略抉擇為核心目標，以期學生能厚植高齡產業管理職能，並期望為成為進階高齡健康產業管理人才奠定基礎。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to cultivate students with the knowledge and ability to manage the elderly industry. The course content is based on the functions of management: planning, organization, leadership, control and personnel, finance, and resources, and explores topics such as the operation and management of the elderly industry. The course follows the management procedure and focuses on themes related to the elerlth industry and organizational management, so that students can strengthen the management functions of elderly industry and become management talents.

department: 高齡健康照護系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課。

department: 高齡與運動健康暨嬰幼兒保育技優專班
multipleTeacherName: 吳孝觀, 郭朝揚, 葉馨婷
note: 修課限制：本院四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、跨域課程
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在訓練學生運用智慧科技設備,進行身體活動功能評估,並規劃個
人化的賦能處方與訓練指導，以協助移動障礙或衰弱族群、肌少症高風險族群
及認知功能障礙高風險的高齡長者改善生活質量。課程分為理論課程、檢測實
務課、資料解讀科技賦能處方設計課。學生將學習操作各類智慧設備,進行高齡
及移動障礙族群的身體活動能力評估,並依據評估結果,規劃適合的賦能處方與514
訓練指導內容,以促進這些族群的身體功能與自主活動。

multipleTeacherName: 吳孝觀, 郭朝揚, 林懿苑, 林莉如

人化的賦能處方與訓練指導，以協助移動障礙或衰弱族群、肌少症高風險族群

note: 修課限制：本院四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、跨域課程

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程協助學生學習會計的基本觀念,作為財務管理及分析的準備,藉由對財務的認識達到有效管理的目標,並訓練學生思考,分析和推理的能力.更進而將基本觀念運用於其他相關管理課程及日常生活和工作上,以提高學生管理及財務方面的知識和能力.課程內容包括會計基本觀念,會計處理程序,會計基本理論,現金與內部控制等.
courseEngAbstract: The course assists students to obtain basic Accounting concept and prepares for the requirement of financial management and analysis, through the knowledge of finance to reach the goal of effective management. The course also provides the training of capa

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 癌症健康大型資料庫摘錄規則與運用
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在訓練學生習得癌症登記相關醫學字辭、癌症登記摘錄內容邏輯、範疇、摘錄規則與
技術，以及癌症登記作業在醫院甚至國際上癌症登記師的角色與任務，使學生在「癌症防治
法」規範下的醫院癌症登記作業，具有紮實的認知與解析能力，不但落實輔導其就業之專業實
務能力，甚至在進到醫療院所之前就已經具備取得癌症登記師資格之相關教育訓練，成為醫療
院所與癌症診療品質認證需求的專業證照癌症登記師首選培訓人才。

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract:
本課程以行銷學為基礎，並考量醫藥市場之獨特性，介紹醫藥市場之行銷理論與實務。課程內
容將從一般行銷原則和醫藥市場背景開始，接著介紹各種相關行銷工具的概念。課程主題包括
醫藥環境介紹、價格策略、供應鏈、行銷計劃、法規事務、醫藥廣告和銷售技巧。應用場景設
定包括但不限於藥廠行銷、社區藥局行銷及醫療院所自費醫療行銷。

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract:
本課程介紹台灣藥事法規及醫學倫理；藥事法規的部分，透過法條剖析、案例分析之方式幫助
學生理解法規內涵，課程主題包括：衛生行政管理法規體系、藥師業務及執業管理、藥局藥商
藥物業務及管理、管制藥品管理及藥物濫用防治、化妝品衛生管理、藥害救濟與罕見疾病防
治、全民健康保險相關法規等範疇。醫學倫理將涉及臨床醫學倫理、醫藥行銷倫理、
生保健、輔助生殖、長期照護、安寧療護、器官捐贈等相關之倫理議題。

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
courseEngName: General Concepts and Quality Control of Drugs
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract:
本課程主要內容是介紹藥物由來、劑型、劑量、新藥品上市許可之流程、藥
品開發過程之優良藥品製作規範(GMP & CGMP)與品質管理、優良人體細胞
組織操作規範(GTP)、優良臨床試驗操作規範(GCP)、藥品與醫療器材管理法
規、常用藥物之作用原理，藥品動力、藥物與食物間之交互作用、用藥安全
需知及藥物中毒之解毒等；常用藥物簡介包括：神經系統相關藥物、影響內
分泌及新陳代謝藥物、心臟血管疾病用藥、消化系統藥物、感染和癌症之化
學治療藥物等。
courseEngAbstract:
The course is a two credit hours course and design especially for undergraduate student of
Health Care Management. This curriculum emphasizes on the general concepts of drugs, process of
new drug marketing, good manufacturing practice and quality control, good tissue practice, good
clinical practice, regulations of drug and medical equipment management, general concepts of drug
pharmacokinetics, drugs and food interaction, safety of drugs and antidote of drugs. The curriculum
trends will start from more details and bring a completely drug concepts. The subjects include
general used-drugs affecting on the respiratory disease, cardiovascular disease, gastrointestinal
disorder, , urinary-bladder disorder, mental disorder, and endocrine disorder.

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract:
本課程延續前一學期之生物統計學(一)，藉電腦 Excel 中之資料分析套裝軟
體進一步加強學生基本生物統計學應用的實務操作，以使學生具備從事健康
事業管理相關工作及協助研究的基本工具與電腦軟體操作實務。課程內容著
重於推論統計學的 t 檢定、卡方檢定、變異數分析、簡單及複迴歸分析、相
關，與其電腦 Excel 實作；學生主要在引導下依個人興趣個別自選統計主題
練習。
courseEngAbstract:
The objective of this course is to provide students with practical experience on
the application of biostatistical theories by data analysis of Excel, a tool for the
work and research in the health related fields. Students are trained and guided
and can practice individually to run statistical software by computer in the
computer classroom. The homework and tests are mainly according to students’
interested statistical topic by their own selection. Topics taught in this course
further emphasize on inferential statistics that mainly include hypothesis testing, 
t tests, chi?square tests, analysis of variance, regression analysis, correlation
analysis, and related practice by Excel.

department: 二年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程是介紹流行病學的基本概念和理論，強調學生能培養獨立思考判斷，具備發現及解決問題的能力。在課程設計方面除了使學生能練習操作在資料收集過程中，判斷資料的正確性及整合資訊的能力，並能針對社區及醫院中常見的問題討論及提出因應之道，課程內容除了介紹流行病學的基本知識外，學習疾病自然史、致病因即健康與疾病狀態的測量及監測，瞭解流行病學的方法及相關領域的知識，並進而能靈活應用在專業的實務工作中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is aimed to consider the application of epidemiological concepts and methods to health care, planning, intervention and evaluation and to facilitate and develop skills of epidemiology into different community and clinical settings. The course

department: 二年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。
courseEngAbstract: This course is an introductory course on nursing research. Students will have the opportunity for a systematic investigation of a health-related topic of the student’s interest demonstrating knowledge and skills of research methodology. This course provid

department: 二年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康事業機構作業管理
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 健康事業機構作業管理是醫療產業中包括醫院經營最重要的一個管理制度，無論是營利或非營利機構、公立或私立機構，作業管理是醫院管理中最重要的一環，課程中，介紹作業管理制度包含了作業管理的理論與醫院實務，目標管理制度、責任中心制度、人力資源管理、預算制度及成本控制、醫療機構的經營策略管理及醫療行銷管理等。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on daily operation of healthcare organization.

department: 二年制健康事業管理系

生認識羽球活動的各種技巧，並以引導學生充分運動及享受羽球運動樂趣為主軸，建立

壇現況的講解，以及實際引導學生體驗各種不同形式的比賽，使學生建立對羽球活動的
基本技能與終身興趣
courseEngAbstract:
This course is to help students know the various skills of badminton activities 
through the introduction of badminton basic skills and related knowledge 
aiming to have students fully exercise and enjoy the fun of badminton, and 
establish the foundation for lifelong exercise. Curriculum includes game 
techniques of singles and doubles and the explanation of game concepts, 
game rule evolution and status of badminton development, and to actually 
lead students to experience games of different forms, and establish the 
fundamental techniques and lifelong interest of badmintons

courseEngAbstract: Health information management professionals are an integral part of the healthcare team. They serve the healthcare industry and the public by managing, analyzing, and utilizing the data vital for patient care and making the data accessible to healthcare p

department: 二年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程的教學，內容包括了抽象理論：如組織溝通的意涵、 組織溝通的相關理論，以及在不同社會情境下的組織溝通的議題，例如人際關係、多元文化、在衝突中達到有效的組織溝通等，此類較為複雜、且難度較高的整體溝通問題，以及微觀的人際溝通，例如：性別與溝通、醫病關係與溝通家庭內之人際關係。並且介紹目前被廣泛應用於組織溝通的正向心理學概念和策略。
courseEngAbstract: The teaching of this course includes abstract theories: such as the meaning of organizational communication, the relevant theories of organizational communication, and the issues of organizational communication in different social situations, such as interpersonal relationships, multiculturalism, and effective organization in conflicts. Communication, etc., such complex and difficult overall communication problems, as well as micro-interpersonal communication, such as: gender and communication, medical relationship and communication, and the interpersonal relationship within the family and the introduction of the current widely used in organizational communication To psychology concepts and strategies.

department: 二年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在採用健康照護機構實務案例為素材，引導學生運用問題分析與決策及專案管理的概念、技術，在課堂上分析並引導討論相關案例，期使學生在畢業前即能孰悉醫療及健康事業機構的經營管理議題，以及相關領域問題處理的實務情境，有助於學生未來職場及早適應與管理能力之發揮。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to provide students with organized understanding and practicing ability on problem solving and decision making in healthcare organization. Firstly, by intruding basic concepts and techniques in problem solving and decision making, to construct students with related knowledge. Secondly, by using real cases in healthcare industries, students learn from pre-class reading, assignments, and following with class discussion for these cases, to construct student with ability of problem analysis in real situation. Finally, practicing with oral presentation and written report, and discussing in classroom, to deepen the ability for adapting and developing in future workplaces.

department: 二年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助具有健康照護管理學基礎之學生，進一步獲得有關健康照護人力資源之評估、取得、應用、提升及創新的知識與技能，及其在臨床實務之應用。授課內容包括人力資源管理之導論、策略性人力資源管理、相關法令、工作分析與設計、人力規劃、招募與甄選、訓練與發展、績效管理、員工留任、薪資與福利、勞工安全、勞資關係、紀律管理等。

courseAbstract: 本課程包括每週2小時1學分的英語聽與講練習。學生經程度測驗後依程度分級。教學重點為初中級至中級(low-intermediate ~ intermediate level)之日常生活會話英語聽力理解及練習。
courseEngAbstract: This is a one-semester course which is worth one credit and includes a two-hour listening and speaking practice in the language laboratory each week. The main contents of the course consist of listening comprehension of everyday English conversations (from high beginning to low-intermediate level) and English conversation practice.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 1.建議同學依排定時程修習課程避免延畢，如遇特殊原因須停修者，須先至通識中心進行前置流程。  2.第二階段加退選開放健科學院重修生選課。3.第三階段加退選開放系外重修生選課。
courseAbstract: 本課程為一學期兩小時兩學分的課程。教學重點為文法重點複習、閱讀技巧及練習、普通英文文章閱讀，於該課程中學生能熟練中級至中高級(intermediate ~high intermediate level)基本文法重點、學習並運用各種英文閱讀技巧、閱讀並理解中級至中高級(intermediate ~high intermediate level)英文文章。
courseEngAbstract: This is a two-credit, one-semester course. Included in the instruction for students of all levels are grammar review, basic sentence structure, introduction and application of English reading skills to high-intermediate reading articles, outlining and summarizing, as well as general or professional conversational English, talks, lectures, reports, and programs.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程先介紹有關休閒產業、健康事業、健康科技照護以及語言治療與聽力障礙的發展趨勢，並了解目前各領域科技應用的現況及跨領域之可能性，內容包括保健旅遊之跨域整合、管理方法應用、資訊科技與長照領域之結合，以及聽語治療的應用等。藉由各領域發展趨勢的了解，進一步透過企劃案構思，讓學生能充分了解跨領域應用的精隨。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the development trends of leisure and health industry, healthcare technology, and speech language pathology and audiology. The course also briefs the current state of technology applications, and identifies the possibility of cross-domain integration that includes the domains on health tourism, management, information technology, the long-term care, and speech language pathology and audiology. Based on the understanding of cross-domain background, students can propose business plan to fulfill the requirement of cross-domain applications on healthcare domain.

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生獲得有關我國保健及醫療照護體系(Health Care System)內有關機構之組織及管理的基本知識與技能，及其在醫療相關部門管理之應用。課程內容以管理程序為架構，範圍從管理的簡介開始，再依循管理的過程分別介紹健康照護管理有關的主題－醫療體系與環境、規劃、組織、人力資源管理、領導與激勵、品管，風險管理等之理論與實務層面。以期學生由此能對健康照護管理有一基本的但完整的認識，以開發自己的管理潛能。

courseAbstract: 本課程就文言文（50％文言文－諸子散文、詩詞韻文）與白話文（50％白話文－現代散文、現代小說）兩方面，編選古典文學名篇及現代經典文本。內容安排除兼顧古典與現代的文學價值外，亦涵蓋文學的通俗性與藝術性。
courseEngAbstract: This course is based on two textbooks, compiled with famous classical and modern literature each. Apart from valuable literature sources and the balance between classical and modern materials, its contents also include the popularity and artistic quality of each.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程協助學生學習會計的基本觀念,作為財務管理及分析的準備,藉由對財務的認識達到有效管理的目標,並訓練學生思考,分析和推理的能力.更進而將基本觀念運用於其他相關管理課程及日常生活和工作上,以提高學生管理及財務方面的知識和能力.課程內容包括會計基本觀念,會計處理程序,會計基本理論,現金與內部控制等.
courseEngAbstract: The course assists students to obtain basic Accounting concept and prepares for the requirement of financial management and analysis, through the knowledge of finance to reach the goal of effective management. The course also provides the training of capa

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 心理學是一門研究人類心靈(mind)與行為(behavior)的科學，其主要的研究領域包括生理與知覺、學習與制約、記憶與認知、動機與情緒、人格與社會等主題。管理與商業心理學是一門將這些心理學的理論與研究結果應用於組織經營管理的學科。本課程包含六大主題：個人與團隊性格、自我概念與自尊、知覺與決策行為、創造力與問題解決能力、職場關係與人際網絡、與各種性格的人相處與溝通等。由於時數限制，本課程並未將激勵、領導、團體動態、衝突管理、壓力管理等主題列入討論。這些議題將另於『組織行為學』課程中進行討論。
courseEngAbstract: Business and managerial psychology refers to the application of knowledge and research in psychology in the work setting. Topics covered in this course include individual and group personality, self-concept and self-esteem, perception and decision making,

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2. 全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
courseEngAbstract:
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.

courseAbstract: 本課程分四大部分，第一部份介紹急診醫學與常見疫病；第二部份則介紹各種身體常見之症狀，說明其意涵即可能代表之疾病；第三部份則依人體系統，介紹各種常見之疾病；第四部份則介紹臨床醫療實務經驗。

courseAbstract: 心理學是一門研究人類心靈(mind)與行為(behavior)的科學，其主要的研究領域包括生理與知覺、學習與制約、記憶與認知、動機與情緒、人格與社會等主題。管理與商業心理學是一門將這些心理學的理論與研究結果應用於組織經營管理的學科。本課程包含六大主題：個人與團隊性格、自我概念與自尊、知覺與決策行為、創造力與問題解決能力、職場關係與人際網絡、與各種性格的人相處與溝通等。由於時數限制，本課程並未將激勵、領導、團體動態、衝突管理、壓力管理等主題列入討論。這些議題將另於『組織行為學』課程中進行討論。
courseEngAbstract: Business and managerial psychology refers to the application of knowledge and research in psychology in the work setting. Topics covered in this course include individual and group personality, self-concept and self-esteem, perception and decision making,

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2. 全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
courseEngAbstract:
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.

From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.

courseAbstract: 此課程主要介紹環境及職場中可能會遭遇的物理性危害問題，了結國內與國際間對於發展健康環境目前的概況，並透過相關新聞事件與法規的解說，加強同學對於正確健康環境的觀念。再以分段實習的方法，由討論中交換正確的知識。此課程冀望幫助同學了解正確的健康環境概念，並學習正確使用不同物理性因子的測定方法。
courseEngAbstract: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts of healthy environment and understanding the safety and hygiene problems in the environmental and occupational conditions, and assist students in realizing the basic principals and evaluation meth

note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程以現代性的概念，貫連二十世紀至當前的藝術潮流發展，探討當代藝術的幾個重要流派、特性與不同面向，呈現藝術發展的獨特性與創造性。培養藝術涵養及建立個人對審美的主體觀，並瞭解當前社會藝術文化脈動，對當代的文化思潮有其見地，以開展學生發展自我潛能，並將藝術融入生活，提升生命境界。
courseEngAbstract: This course employs the concept of modernity as a framework to establish connections between the evolution of artistic trends from the 20th century to the present day. The course delves into various significant genres, characteristics, and different aspects of contemporary art, thereby highlighting the distinctiveness and creativity of artistic development. The objective of this course is to cultivate artistic appreciation, establish personal aesthetic perspectives and comprehend the prevailing social and cultural trends in art. The course further aims to enhance students' capacity for self-growth, integrate art into their daily lives, and elevate their overall living experience.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系

2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
學習與養成良好的各種基本技術後並加強比賽技術、戰
術的應用與結合，以期能在桌球比賽中獲得有效成果。如有優質的各種基本技術及搭配
單打戰術應用就能在比賽中直接得分與攻擊。在比賽技術中有良好優質的接發球戰術就
能先發制人，且能有效控制對方直接攻擊得分，其贏球機率高。因此在單打技術、戰術
應用桌球技術中佔有極重要性。
courseEngAbstract:
After learning and cultivating various kinds of basic skills, 
a player should reinforce the applications and combinations of singles and 
tactics, aiming to have effective results in table tennis games. If a player has 
various kinds of superior basic skills combined with the applications of singles 
tactics, he/she can score and attack directly in a game. In terms of singles, if a 
player has superior tactics for receiving and serving the ball, he/she can take 
the initiative and control his/her opponent effectively to attack and score 
directly, so that he/she will have a greater chance to win the game; therefore, 
such tactics has great importance in table tennis skills regarding singles and 
tactics applications.
