courseAbstract: 此課程主要介紹環境及職場中可能會遭遇的物理性危害問題，了結國內與國際間對於發展健康環境目前的概況，並透過相關新聞事件與法規的解說，加強同學對於正確健康環境的觀念。再以分段實習的方法，由討論中交換正確的知識。此課程冀望幫助同學了解正確的健康環境概念，並學習正確使用不同物理性因子的測定方法。
courseEngAbstract: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts of healthy environment and understanding the safety and hygiene problems in the environmental and occupational conditions, and assist students in realizing the basic principals and evaluation meth

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程以現代性的概念，貫連二十世紀至當前的藝術潮流發展，探討當代藝術的幾個重要流派、特性與不同面向，呈現藝術發展的獨特性與創造性。培養藝術涵養及建立個人對審美的主體觀，並瞭解當前社會藝術文化脈動，對當代的文化思潮有其見地，以開展學生發展自我潛能，並將藝術融入生活，提升生命境界。
courseEngAbstract: This course employs the concept of modernity as a framework to establish connections between the evolution of artistic trends from the 20th century to the present day. The course delves into various significant genres, characteristics, and different aspects of contemporary art, thereby highlighting the distinctiveness and creativity of artistic development. The objective of this course is to cultivate artistic appreciation, establish personal aesthetic perspectives and comprehend the prevailing social and cultural trends in art. The course further aims to enhance students' capacity for self-growth, integrate art into their daily lives, and elevate their overall living experience.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由休四二A、高四二A、健四二AB互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
課程強調的是以瑜珈觀點的力量與柔軟度訓練，及闡
明正確的伸展與訓練方式，內容包括呼吸法、放鬆與伸展概念基礎、氣功暖身及
功能性強化訓練，並以高熱能的串聯動作得到最佳的舒展，進而達到刺激新陳代
謝、強化功能性肌群、矯正不良姿勢以促進身心健康。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is emphasis on improvement of strength and flexibility to stimulate 
metabolism, strengthen the muscle functional group, correct bad posture to 
promote physical and mental health by breathing, relaxation and extension of 
conceptual foundations, qigong warm and functional strengthening training 
and to high heat

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
courseEngName: Data analysis and statistics applications in Healthcare quality
note: 修課限制：學程課程、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在培養同學們未來在執行品質管理作業時，運用統計方法收集、分析、判讀與呈
現資料及定訂建議改善方案的能力，授課範圍涵蓋目前醫療產業品質管理概況與內容、資料收
集與管理、如何應用統計、分析、圖表判讀與呈現結果及撰寫建議案等內容。透過課程之講授
與練習，期使同學不僅對健康照護品質管理，有整體性的了解，同時藉由學習實務應用的工具
與技巧，期望同學未來若進入醫療機構從事品質管理實務時，除能夠具備收集、管理及分析資
料之能力外；並能具備客觀評估、推論及撰寫建議案或計畫之能力。
courseEngAbstract:
The objectives of this course is to train students to make the use of statistics method techniques
in the practice of healthcare quality management, in particularly, the capabilities of data collections,
management, and analysis. In addition to those objectives, students was taught objective assessment,
reasoning and writing the continuous quality improvement proposal, or plan.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校、學程課程
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在訓練學生習得疾病分類相關醫學字辭、疾病分類編碼內容架構、
編碼規則與技術，以及疾病分類作業在醫院的角色與任務，使學生在健康保險制
度下的醫院疾病分類作業，具有紮實的認知與解析能力，不但落實輔導其就業之
專業實務能力，進而取得疾病分類員資格，與醫院需具備專業證照的實務工作無
縫接軌。

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康事業管理職涯探勘
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程協助學生於畢業前自我探索健康事業管理專業職涯之發展 潛能，瞭解職場所需的能力與態度，並思索健康事業管理的專業角色及其發展，期使修課學生 能透過宏觀視野及深度反思，思考自己可能之的職涯選擇、規劃並進行相關的準備。
courseEngAbstract:
The purpose of this course is to help students exploring their potential in career of health care
related industries, understanding required working abilities and attitudes, and thinking of the
role extension. Students will be expected to do career planning based on a proactive and
broad vision.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：學程課程、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract:
課程主要將介紹如何運用地理資訊系統(Geographic Information System-GIS)來呈現與健康相關之資
料，此課程主要的目標在於利用實務操作的方式來提昇學生管理與呈現健康相關資料之能力。課程中
將運用 ArcGIS 地理資訊套裝軟體來學習以下相關資料管理與分析策略：1) 基本空間資料呈現與空間
資料的特性；2) 座標投影系統的介紹；3) 如何將住址轉換成空間座標；以及 4) 空間資料的分析方式。
本課程主要的教學方式為課程講授並且利用實際練習操作 ArcGIS 地理資訊套裝軟體等方法，落實學
習分析空間計量資料與管理的技能。
courseEngAbstract:
This course provides a basic understanding of the concepts of Geographic Information System (GIS) and
how to apply this skill to public health-related research. Basic descriptive and analytical function of GIS will be introduced along with additional spatial concepts including 1) the features of spatial data, 2) map projections, 3) coordinate systems and geocoding, and 4) spatial data analysis. This is an course with a strong emphasis on students gaining a hands-on experience in the use of GIS software to manage health-related spatial data.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康照護資料分析與決策
courseEngName: Data analysis and decision making in health care and management
note: 修課限制：學程課程、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本科目於教學設計上，乃著眼於進階資料庫管理與統合健康資料分析方法之實務操作，目標在於提昇學生臨床資料分析、獨立個案分析、管理與分析統計相關資料之能力。課程中將運用SAS統計套裝軟體來學習以下統計資料管理與分析策略：1)建立資料庫關聯檔案並進行資料庫整合工作；2)迴歸分析統計策略；3)分類與診斷分析; 4)臨床試驗分析等。整體而言，選修本課程之學生，將透過課程講授、實際練習操作統計套裝軟體及實例研討等方法，落實學習進階計量資料分析與管理。
courseEngAbstract: The objective of this course is to provide students with advanced practical applications of bio-statistical methods by running the SAS statistical software. Several clinical data in the health related agendas will demonstrate and analyze effectively. Major topics and headings will include (1) overview of SAS statistical software, (2) data arrangement, (3) regression analysis, (4) classification and diagnosis analysis, (5) clinical trial. The advance ability toward the management of quantity data will be the core of teaching plan and interactive procedure. The aims of this course are to promote and reinforce students actually understand the whole-spectrum of advanced statistics and its practical directions.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在系統性地介紹專案管理知識體系及在醫療服務產業的應用。內容將從專案管理的概念架構開始，引述相關基本原理，包括專案、專案管哩，及專案管理系統架構(包括專案起始、專案規劃、專案執行、專案控制)等，進而將探討前述概念與方法在醫療服務產業的應用。此外，配合課程內容及國際專案管理學會專案管理證照考試制度，輔導學生經由對專案管理知識體系的完整認知。專案專題實作，及模擬考試等措施協助學生在就學期間考取國際通行的專案管理IPMA D級證照，有效增強學生就業及問題解決的實務能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on international body of knowledge in project management, and helping students complete certifying assessment of IPMA level D.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：學程課程、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程為介紹衛生及健康照護領域常用之統計指標及定義，藉由課程的安排，引領學生瞭解衛生統計涵蓋內容。課程安排分為二部分：第一部分以醫管實務為主，包括介紹統計指標之範疇及概念、醫療機構及醫療保健服務常用之統計指標，以及死因統計、生命表。第二部分以公共衛生統計為主，包括標準化率、靜態及動態分析，以及人口、醫療、健康促進、國際比較等專題。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides a practical introduction to statistical methods used in a variety of health and human service settings. Concepts are illustrated with examples that demonstrate how principles operate and are applied to common health problems.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康事業管理實務專題(一)
courseEngName: Practical Project for Health Care Management(1)
multipleTeacherName: 陳冠臻, 劉介宇, 邱尚志, 徐瑋, 游宗憲, 李麗惠, 陳依兌, 蔡懿玲, 張育通, 陳巧珊, 黃三翁
note: 修課限制：專題製作、本系四技一般生三年級以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生統整專業課程理論於實作經驗，已完成一個專題。課程分上、下學期兩階段完成。本學期為第一階段，課程內容為確認健康事業管理有關之實務問題，運用問題解決法及科學研究之過程找出有效解決方案或研究方法。
courseEngAbstract: This class is designed to help students integrate theories learned from courses with practical experience to complete the project.  There are two stages in the first semester and second semester respectively.  To identify the health care management-related topic, to apply the skill of problem solving and scientific research process, and to find out the effective resolution or research method would be the major content at the first-stage in this semester.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康照護人力資源管理學
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助具有健康照護管理學基礎之學生，進一步獲得有關健康照護人力資源之評估、取得、應用、提升及創新的知識與技能，及其在臨床實務之應用。授課內容包括人力資源管理之導論、策略性人力資源管理、相關法令、工作分析與設計、人力規劃、招募與甄選、訓練與發展、績效管理、員工留任、薪資與福利、勞工安全、勞資關係、紀律管理等。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to assist those students who have basic knowledge in health care management to acquire information about healthcare human resource management. The course content include followings: healthcare human resourse assessment, plann

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 過去由於健康照護產業的高度專業化及資訊的不對等，在醫療及健康照護服務輸送過程中，病人或服務使用者通常扮演著弱勢的角色，其需求與期望往往不受到服務提供者的重視。然而近年來，處在消費者意識高漲的氛圍下，以及由於以病人為導向的健康照護(patient-centered health care)模式獲致良好的臨床成效，同時健康照護產業競爭趨於白熱化等因素，健康照護服務提供者開始重視以市場為導向的健康照護服務輸送模式，行銷的概念於焉形成。本課程運用服務業行銷(Service Marketing)之概念、理論、與實務
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on essential elements and principles of marketing and its practices in health care.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習護理/高照/醫教/助產/健管/長照/聽語「應用法規導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由高41A、健43A、健43B、運四3B互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
本課程透過對籃球運動二人、三人進攻和防守組合的戰
術與技術介紹，增進學生半場賽對抗的技能，並享受團隊互助合作與默契的樂趣，以及
裁判能力的養成。課程內容包括二人組合進攻、防守戰術與技術，三人組合進攻、防守
戰術與技術。規則部分各種違例、犯規的介紹，半場比賽裁判執法演練。
courseEngAbstract:
This program is through the introduction of tactics and techniques of two man 
and three man basketball defensive and offensive combinations to strengthen 
student’s techniques of half court matches and enjoy the fun of team work and 
spoken consensus and the establishment of the ability of referee. The 
program content has include the tactics and techniques of basketball team on 
two people , three people with defensive and offensive combinations to 
strengthen student’s techniques of matches ,rules of games include to 
introduction of breach of rules and foul, a referee judge practice from half court 
match.

To identify the health care management-related topic, to apply the skill of problem solving and scientific research process, and to find out the effective resolution or research method would be the major content at the first-stage in this semester.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康照護人力資源管理學
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助具有健康照護管理學基礎之學生，進一步獲得有關健康照護人力資源之評估、取得、應用、提升及創新的知識與技能，及其在臨床實務之應用。授課內容包括人力資源管理之導論、策略性人力資源管理、相關法令、工作分析與設計、人力規劃、招募與甄選、訓練與發展、績效管理、員工留任、薪資與福利、勞工安全、勞資關係、紀律管理等。

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 過去由於健康照護產業的高度專業化及資訊的不對等，在醫療及健康照護服務輸送過程中，病人或服務使用者通常扮演著弱勢的角色，其需求與期望往往不受到服務提供者的重視。然而近年來，處在消費者意識高漲的氛圍下，以及由於以病人為導向的健康照護(patient-centered health care)模式獲致良好的臨床成效，同時健康照護產業競爭趨於白熱化等因素，健康照護服務提供者開始重視以市場為導向的健康照護服務輸送模式，行銷的概念於焉形成。本課程運用服務業行銷(Service Marketing)之概念、理論、與實務
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on essential elements and principles of marketing and its practices in health care.

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習護理/高照/醫教/助產/健管/長照/聽語「應用法規導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制健康事業管理系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由高41A、健43A、健43B、運四3B互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
學習與養成良好的各種基本技術後並加強比賽技術、戰
術的應用與結合，以期能在桌球比賽中獲得有效成果。如有優質的各種基本技術及搭配
單打戰術應用就能在比賽中直接得分與攻擊。在比賽技術中有良好優質的接發球戰術就
能先發制人，且能有效控制對方直接攻擊得分，其贏球機率高。因此在單打技術、戰術
應用桌球技術中佔有極重要性。
courseEngAbstract:
After learning and cultivating various kinds of basic skills, 
a player should reinforce the applications and combinations of singles and 
tactics, aiming to have effective results in table tennis games. If a player has 
various kinds of superior basic skills combined with the applications of singles 
tactics, he/she can score and attack directly in a game. In terms of singles, if a 
player has superior tactics for receiving and serving the ball, he/she can take 
the initiative and control his/her opponent effectively to attack and score 
directly, so that he/she will have a greater chance to win the game; therefore, 
such tactics has great importance in table tennis skills regarding singles and 
tactics applications.

courseAbstract: 次級（或稱二手）資料（secondary data）經常是健康照護相關研究之材料，在重視實證醫學的今日，許多研究均利用各種次級資料進行統計分析，以評估健康照護品質及病人之預後。在台灣，除了許多醫療機構本身的資料庫（例如醫院之醫檢報告，健檢報告）外，舉凡癌症登記、生命統計、死亡登記等全國性資料庫一直是實證醫學研究中經常利用的重要研究素材。本課程將以實例介紹台灣地區各種可用於實證醫學及健康照護研究之次級資料，並將以「全民健康保險學術研究資料庫」為對象進行實地之統計分析及示範，同學也將被要求分析此健保資料庫樣本

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供醫管碩士班學生有關品質管理之知識與技能及其在健康醫療體系之運用。課程內容涵蓋品質概念演進、品質管理理論及原則模式、顧客服務、品質管理新議題及研究相關問題等，並強調品質之評估、監測、執行及評值。進行之重點是閱讀英文書籍與文章、討論、網路搜尋等，俾使學習者對品管知識技能有完整的了解，並能在實務上確切執行，以增進機構經營之效率。

courseName: 健康事業人力資源管理學
note: 修課限制：本所限專班生、外所限專班生、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目的是在幫助學生對於人力資源管理有關的重要觀念與技巧，能有一 個完整而有系統的學習。由於「人力資源管理」是機構內各級管理者必須具備的 管理職能之一，因此，本課程除介紹人力資源部門的「功能與業務」外，同時亦 以一般單位管理者的角度，探討如何對單位內的人力資源加以妥善運用及有效管 理。本課程探討的範疇包括：策略性人力資源管理、人力資源管理規劃、工作設 計與分析、任用程序、訓練發展、績效考核、薪酬制度與福利、職業安全與員工 健康等相關議題之研討。

courseAbstract: 次級（或稱二手）資料（secondary data / second-hand data）經常是健康照護科學領域中經常被使用的研究材料，台灣有許多全國性的衛生資料（多為行政目的而建置），包括癌症登記、衛生統計、出生與死因登記、勞工保險與傷病給付等；也有許多全國性的大型衛生調查資料（如全國國民健康調查、老人流感資料庫、新生兒體位調查等），這些資料都可作為很好的研究素材。然而，面對這些大型資料，研究者必須具備足夠的資料處理以及邏輯思考能力，才能有效且正確的擷取這些資料進行研究分析。本課程的主要將介紹我國「全民

courseAbstract: 組織行為學乃是一門研究組織內個人行為、團體動態、以及組織系統的行為科學。在個人行為方面，組織行為學所探討的包含個人的背景特質、知覺與學習過程、以及工作動機。在團體動態方面所欲瞭解的是組織內，正式與非正式團體的形成過程、人際互動與溝通模式、團體的功能、團體決策的特徵、以及領導才能與風格。最後，組織行為學亦研究整個組織系統的特質，如組織結構、企業文化、以及整個組織的變革與發展。

courseAbstract: 人類的行為表現或生活方式對健康有極大的影響，而透過行為與社會科學的知識運用則可以幫助我們進一步去了解健康與社會行為的發展脈絡，並研擬可能的介入方案，以達到健康促進的目的。本課程運用行為與社會科學的知識，幫助學生了解健康與社會行為的關係，由理論變項間探討健康與個人、組織、團體、文化等行為各層面之影響因素。藉此有系統的理論模式學習，瞭解如何改變人類的健康認知信念、態度，並擴及產生正向積極的健康行動，並學習健康心理學、 健康促進與衛生教育概念、原理、與實務 、 健康促進與衛生教育方案之規劃、策略與評價與健康/醫療社會學的相關內容

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、城區部上課
courseAbstract: 授與提昇研究能力與增進閱讀學術文獻有關統計能力之知識與概念。其內容包括敘述統計學（集中趨勢量數、離中趨勢量數、分布、作圖與作表）以及推論統計學（區間估計與考驗之過程，Z score、pooled-t test、paired-t test、卡方、one-way ANOVA、皮爾遜積差相關、線性迴歸與無母數分析等）。課中利用EXCEL資料分析工具及各式小型科學電算器如Casio 36PV等協助運算，期能達成理論與實務之結合為目的。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to offer fundamental statistical concepts related to the practice of nursing. The contents include population & samples descriptive statistics; probability; sampling; statistical distributions; estimation; hypothesis testing; pooled samples

courseAbstract: 本課程是介紹流行病學的基本概念和理論，強調學生能培養獨立思考判斷，具備發現及解決問題的能力。在課程設計方面除了使學生能練習操作在資料收集過程中，判斷資料的正確性及整合資訊的能力，並能針對社區及醫院中常見的問題討論及提出因應之道，課程內容除了介紹流行病學的基本知識外，學習疾病自然史、致病因即健康與疾病狀態的測量及監測，瞭解流行病學的方法及相關領域的知識，並進而能靈活應用在專業的實務工作中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is aimed to consider the application of epidemiological concepts and methods to health care, planning, intervention and evaluation and to facilitate and develop skills of epidemiology into different community and clinical settings. The course

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程乃醫療經濟學之基礎課程，主要內容為個體經濟學基本理論及分析工具的介紹，並藉由個體經濟學之理論及工具，對健康及醫療給付行為之需求、供給、成本控制及其他重要課題進行分析與解釋。
courseEngAbstract: The course is a basic course for Health Economics, the essential contents of the course includes two parts; The first part introduces the basic theories for Microeconomics and analytic instruments .The second part analyses and explains the demand, supply,

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習護理/高照/醫教/助產/健管/長照/聽語「應用法規導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。城區部上課
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程內容包括醫療資訊簡介、醫學資料處理、電子病歷、醫學資訊傳輸標準與分類代碼、醫療決策分析與智慧型系統，衛生資料交換第七層標準(HL7)，醫學數位影像傳輸標準(DICOM)，遠距醫療及醫療電子商務。
courseEngAbstract: The content of this course includes Introduction to Medical Informatics, Medical Data Process, Electronic Medical Records, Medical Image, Medical Coding and Classification systems, Medical Decision Support and Intelligent Systems, Health Level Seven (HL7)

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在系統性地介紹專案管理知識體系及在醫療服務產業的應用。內容將從專案管理的概念架構開始，引述相關基本原理，包括專案、專案管哩，及專案管理系統架構(包括專案起始、專案規劃、專案執行、專案控制)等，進而將探討前述概念與方法在醫療服務產業的應用。此外，配合課程內容及國際專案管理學會專案管理證照考試制度，輔導學生經由對專案管理知識體系的完整認知。專案專題實作，及模擬考試等措施協助學生在就學期間考取國際通行的專案管理IPMA D級證照，有效增強學生就業及問題解決的實務能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on international body of knowledge in project management, and helping students complete certifying assessment of IPMA level D.

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校、城區部上課
courseAbstract: 創業管理是一門綜合創意發掘、創新規劃、新事業開發、企業成長管理等的整合性經營管理課程。本課程旨在介紹創業管理的理論與實務應用，內容分為創業管理的理論基礎、創業的外部環境與策略規劃、創業的執行與管理等三大部份，主要內容包括創業管理的架構、資源與能力、創業的外部環境、創業的策略、創業的計畫書、網路創業家、新創企業的財務基礎、爭取投資人與建構投資交易、新建構事業的組織、內部創業、網絡關係與特許加盟、健康管理事業的籌設、管理及成功經營典範。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students understand the theory and practical applications of entrepreneurial management. The course is designed to introduce the framework for entrepreneurship, resources and capabilities, the environment for entrepre

note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論/哲學與宗教/世界文明史/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。城區部上課
courseAbstract: 本課程以直向生命與橫向生命為主軸，引導學子正確的認識哲學、了解宗教，並將重心放在各哲學理論與宗教義理對生命的看法上，使哲學與宗教和人生「生、老、病、死」與「我、人、事、物」等不同面向相連結，探究人的特性與價值、人生的欲望與煩惱、對錯與善惡、真善美聖等問題，再融入各種人生觀、價值觀、知識論、倫理學、道德觀、宗教觀、修行觀等，使知、情、意、行能夠融為一體，藉以培養學生自我檢視與自我成長的態度，深入且多元的思考人生種種經驗與體會，進而建立良好的哲學思惟與宗教觀念，訂立適切且自他兩利的人生目標，展開幸福健康的生命旅程。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed according to the vertical and the horizontal aspects of life. Guide students to understand the fundamental content of philosophy and religion, and focus on the various philosophical theories and religious teachings. "Birth, aging, sickness and death" and "oneself, humans, and subjects around one’s life" will be linked together in this course. The characteristics and values of human beings, human's desires and troubles, right and wrong, good and evil, and etc. will be explored. The attitudes on life, values, knowledge, ethics, morality, religion and life and death will be examined. For cultivating positive and active concept, students have to integrate his/her knowledge, feelings, and intentions. May they be happy and healthy and establish a good philosophical contemplation and religious reflection, and in an appropriate direction of life which profits both themselves and other lives through the learning of this course

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康事業機構作業管理
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、城區部上課
courseAbstract: 健康事業機構作業管理是醫療產業中包括醫院經營最重要的一個管理制度，無論是營利或非營利機構、公立或私立機構，作業管理是醫院管理中最重要的一環，課程中，介紹作業管理制度包含了作業管理的理論與醫院實務，目標管理制度、責任中心制度、人力資源管理、預算制度及成本控制、醫療機構的經營策略管理及醫療行銷管理等。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on daily operation of healthcare organization.

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在介紹一般性營利機構進行財務管理的基本分析方法暨工具。進而介紹如何，將財務管理之原理原則運用於醫療機構及其它非營利性機構。

note: 1.第一階段加退選開放尚未通過英文畢業門檻之延畢生。2.第二階段加退選開放給延畢生及應屆畢業生。3.第三階段加退選開放四技4、3年級/二技2年級/在職3、2年級/學士後3、2年級選課。4.本課程出席情況計入分數，若課程進行中需實習或其他個人因素無法正常上課，請不要選課以免影響學習成績。 5.本課程優先讓未達本校英文畢業門檻學生選課。6.本課程為直接即時加選，無須另行繳交未通過校外英檢之證明文件。
courseAbstract: 本課程在閱讀測驗應試技巧上，培養學生對於英語使用之認知，提升學生英文單字與文法能力，增進學生英文閱讀技巧。在聽力測驗應試技巧上，幫助學生瞭解口說英語語音變化之特性與幫助學生熟悉職場使用之非正式英語表達法。在多益或其他英語檢定考試上，引導學生熟悉開英語檢定考試試題，幫助學生培養臨場應試經驗並強化學生於本課程習得之語言使用技巧與應試策略。
courseEngAbstract: This is a three-credit, one-semester course. The course will provide students with intensive drills for reading comprehension test, effective instruction for listening comprehension test, and useful practice tests. Each unit will incorporate a variety of exercises and practices to equip students with systematic knowledge of vocabulary and grammar. In addition, this course will also enhance students’ ability in employing effective test-taking strategies. Approaches including lecturing, group discussion, test-taking practice, and analysis of practice test will be utilized in this course to promote students’ achievement in English proficiency tests.

note: 1.第一階段加退選開放尚未通過英文畢業門檻之延畢生。2.第二階段加退選開放給延畢生及應屆畢業生。3.第三階段加退選開放四技4、3年級/二技2年級/在職3、2年級/學士後3、2年級選課。4.本課程出席情況計入分數，若課程進行中需實習或其他個人因素無法正常上課，請不要選課以免影響學習成績。 5.本課程優先讓未達本校英文畢業門檻學生選課。6.本課程為直接即時加選，無須另行繳交未通過校外英檢之證明文件。
courseAbstract: 本課程在閱讀測驗應試技巧上，培養學生對於英語使用之認知，提升學生英文單字與文法能力，增進學生英文閱讀技巧。在聽力測驗應試技巧上，幫助學生瞭解口說英語語音變化之特性與幫助學生熟悉職場使用之非正式英語表達法。在多益或其他英語檢定考試上，引導學生熟悉開英語檢定考試試題，幫助學生培養臨場應試經驗並強化學生於本課程習得之語言使用技巧與應試策略。
courseEngAbstract: This is a three-credit, one-semester course. The course will provide students with intensive drills for reading comprehension test, effective instruction for listening comprehension test, and useful practice tests. Each unit will incorporate a variety of exercises and practices to equip students with systematic knowledge of vocabulary and grammar. In addition, this course will also enhance students’ ability in employing effective test-taking strategies. Approaches including lecturing, group discussion, test-taking practice, and analysis of practice test will be utilized in this course to promote students’ achievement in English proficiency tests.

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、跨校、城區部上課、畢業班課程
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在讓學生把長期照護的理論與實務相結合；從介紹國內長期照護的政策與體系發展開始，讓學生了解長期照護在台灣發展的脈絡及未來可能之趨勢，接著帶入長期照護的團隊服務，需求評估以及現有的各式服務類型介紹、長照保險說明、最後以經營管理面的議題，含人力資源管理、行銷策略操作、品質管理、評鑑實戰分享、倫理議題與顧客抱怨處理等作為結尾。
    本課程有1次的參訪行程，安排長期照護機構，需繳交參訪心得；1次至輔具公司實際操作體驗；另透過學生分組選擇一種議題作深入報告，於選題後定期以投影片提出進度說明，由教師給予輔導，並於期末口頭報告及繳交書面期末報告。
courseEngAbstract: The main idea of this program is "Let students understand the development of long-term care, the concept of a total system, all kinds of service management and operation methods and the problems you may meet up ; combining theory, practice to give students the reference basis of obtaining an occupation in the future."

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
courseName: 健康事業管理專題研討
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、城區部上課、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程是整合學生在前三個學期的核心課程。讓學生成為具有核心知識的管理人。進而闡述健康服務產業的歷史發展與沿革。並將這些管理之核心知識融入健康服務產業之應用。
courseEngAbstract: This course aimed to help students to review and integrate a variety of managerial, quantitative, and industrial knowledge and skills before students complete undergraduate program. The materials cover in this class will first quickly review some basic qu

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
courseEngName: Specific Topics Discussion in Healthcare Management
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、畢業班課程、城區部上課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在建構本系學生應用專案管理系統性知識體系，實際應用於健康服務產業相關實作性專題。內容將從專案管理的概念架構、專案整合管理、專案管理資訊科技應用，及專案實作練習，進而探討應用前述概念與方法於健康服務產業時的重要事項。此外，本課程將進一步規劃應用本系健康產業教室設備，提供學生專案管理相關軟體並建構師生課程互動網路平台，有效配合專題實作輔導學生實際應用專案管理知識於實務操作，再藉鼓勵修課學生報名參與『全國專案管理實作競賽』(台灣專案管理學會主辦)，提升學習興趣增進觀摩交流機會。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with rich experiences in practices of project management, those who had finished learning of international body of knowledge in project management

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校、城區部上課、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 過去由於健康照護產業的高度專業化及資訊的不對等，在醫療及健康照護服務輸送過程中，病人或服務使用者通常扮演著弱勢的角色，其需求與期望往往不受到服務提供者的重視。然而近年來，處在消費者意識高漲的氛圍下，以及由於以病人為導向的健康照護(patient-centered health care)模式獲致良好的臨床成效，同時健康照護產業競爭趨於白熱化等因素，健康照護服務提供者開始重視以市場為導向的健康照護服務輸送模式，行銷的概念於焉形成。本課程運用服務業行銷(Service Marketing)之概念、理論、與實務
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the lesson is to provide students with organized understanding on essential elements and principles of marketing and its practices in health care.

department: 二年制進修部健康事業管理系
note: 1.第一階段加退選開放尚未通過英文畢業門檻之延畢生。2.第二階段加退選開放給延畢生及應屆畢業生。3.第三階段加退選開放四技4、3年級/二技2年級/在職3、2年級/學士後3、2年級選課。4.本課程出席情況計入分數，若課程進行中需實習或其他個人因素無法正常上課，請不要選課以免影響學習成績。 5.本課程優先讓未達本校英文畢業門檻學生選課。6.本課程為直接即時加選，無須另行繳交未通過校外英檢之證明文件。7.畢業班課程，密集課程14週。

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所一年級、外所一年級
courseAbstract: 隨著醫療科技的進步與人的壽命不斷延長，長期照護（long-term care）已經是當前先進國家須正視的課題，臺灣也將在2025年時邁入超高齡社會的時代，言下之意臺灣總人口數中將有超過20%的65歲以上人口；面對人口結構的轉變，您準備好了嗎? 本課程將藉由人口學角度入門，旨在引導學習者認識長期照護的基本概念、探討人口高齡化下帶給社會的改變，並透過閱讀長期照護相關文獻進行長照相關議題的探討，培養學習者對長期照護有2 基本的專業知能、技巧，以及初步評估與因應能力。同時培養學習者對長期照顧議題的關心與服務的熱情，能了解長照的新興趨勢，並促使對長期照護專業的興趣與參與動機，藉此培育更多專才投入長照領域。
courseEngAbstract: With the ageing of population increasing dramatically, maintaining health in old age becomes increasingly important. Successful policies in this area can increase the potential labor force and the supply of non-market services to others. They can also delay the need for long term care for the elderly by preventive strategies. This course discusses all the issues related to long-term care from micro- and macro- perspectives.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
courseEngName: Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery in Databases
note: 修課限制：本所、外所
courseAbstract: Course is designed for scientific master students. Course content provides students the use of advanced data mining tools through real-world practical examples. Course covers the basic data science concept, major data mining algorithms and data model deployment in application. The major topics include classification, clustering, association, derivation detection, visualization and summarization techniques. Importantly, we propose to bridge the gap between theory and practice, and apply data mining solutions in real world applications. The course will be built with several real cases – medical application ex. breast cancer classification, directing customers to subscription through App behavior analysis, minimizing chum rate through analysis of financial habits, credit card fraud detection, insurance contract analysis, etc. The course will be practically oriented, emphasizing the knowledge discovery process, economic considerations and implementation issues. Real world assignments, invo
courseEngAbstract: Course is designed for scientific master students. Course content provides students the use of advanced data mining tools through real-world practical examples. Course covers the basic data science concept, major data mining algorithms and data model deployment in application. The major topics include classification, clustering, association, derivation detection, visualization and summarization techniques. Importantly, we propose to bridge the gap between theory and practice, and apply data mining solutions in real world applications. The course will be built with several real cases – medical application ex. breast cancer classification, directing customers to subscription through App behavior analysis, minimizing chum rate through analysis of financial habits, credit card fraud detection, insurance contract analysis, etc. The course will be practically oriented, emphasizing the knowledge discovery process, economic considerations and implementation issues. Real world assignments, involving realistic and simulated data, will provide the students with hands-on experience in using data mining in practice.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹巨量資料的基本知識與方法，內容包括巨量資料分析的趨勢與挑 戰、巨量資料的定義與來源、半結構與非結構化資料處理，以及如何運用人工智慧(artificial intelligence)與機器學習(machine learning)建構深度學習(deep learning)模型。為使學生對巨量資料分析的理論發展與實務應用有全面性瞭解，將以影像辨識與物件偵測、文本分析為主安排業師授課輔以個案、範例介紹及實作。每位同學於期末須提出研究專案方向，以落實學習目標。由於專案實作需有程式設計基礎，建議可使用的語言有Java, Python, R 與 Visualization 等工具。本課程主要目標要能呈現期末專案成果與實務應用之價值(business value)。
courseEngAbstract: This course will begin with trend and challenges of big data analysis, and is followed by the machine learning algorithms, technical architecture, and programming (Python/R for text mining and SNA analysis); they are domain knowledge and techniques for the analysis. Students must propose a term project to justify learning achievement.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所、外所
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹了健康照護與資訊科技應用的知識、基礎設施、功能和工具。在實務個案中探討規劃和管理知識在健康照護工作中的應用，重點傳遞著健康科技研究概念框架以及更深層次的影響。課程將以照護技術為發展前提，藉由案例分享，讓學生了解目前健康科技議題之下的產業變革，並瞭解相關技術應用優勢，包括資訊系統、醫療科技以及照護專業等。期望同學藉由個案的閱讀、討論、分析、傾聽與反思的過程，培養健康科技應用決策所需的邏輯思維與知識，提昇同學對於未來研究與就業展的專業能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the knowledge, infrastructure, functions, and tools of health care and information technology applications. Practical cases explore the application of planning and management knowledge to health care work, conveying the conceptual framework of health technology research and its deeper implications. The course content will begin with care technology, and through case sharing, students will learn about the changes in the industry under current health technology issues and understand the advantages of related technology applications, including information systems, medical technology, and the care profession. Through case reading, discussion, analysis, and reflection, students will be able to link theory and practice to enhance their understanding of health technology development. This course is designed to enhance students' understanding of the development of health technology. Through thorough exposure to health technology cases, course participants will become familiar with the logic, theories, and uses presented in the cases and understand the strengths, challenges, and limitations of the current industry development in the cases.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、外所二年級以上、與長照研二合班開課，自第一階段開放長照所同步選課
courseAbstract: 根據美國老年學會（Gerontological Society of America）的定義，老人學是對於老化過程（aging processes）及處於生命歷程當中的個人（individuals across the life course）之研究領域。它探索當個人年老時所發生的生理、心理及社會面向的變化；它研究因人口老化所引起的整體社會變遷；它應用這些知識於政策與實務領域之中。老人學本質上即是一個跨學科的多元領域，除了因為對老化的共同興趣所聚集的不同專業人員的協力合作外，期望能透過研究、教育、實踐與應用跨領域知識，以增進年老人口的生活品質與福祉。本課程透過介紹老人學的主要理論、概念及議題，引導學生思考並理解老年人口的異質性與多元性。
courseEngAbstract: This gateway course highlights lots of things or issues used to examine many problems and disciplines related to the aging & the elderly. The learners would be guided to get familiar with the demography, biology, psychology, sociology and public policy for the aging and elderly, and then can gain access other related or extended fields of it. Old people have been getting decayed all the way in all aspects with impacts and deprivation in mixed and complex manifestation, encompassing perception, sensation, health, behavior, disability and dementia biomedically; rather, cognition (intellectuals, memory, attention, learning, and creativity…etc), personality trait, stress & coping, psychiatric disorders, even death & mourning in mental aspect;; socially, communication & interaction network, friend making, marital status, retiring, leisure, living arrangement, socioeconomic status, and care arrangement; potentially, extending over spiritual aspect. Thru’ multidisciplinary lectures and discussions may be helpful to handle the potential differences, such as gender, ethnicity, histogram, interaction and living experiences accumulation, all of them will facilitate the approaching of the multi-aspect and complex presentation of aging and elderly.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
courseEngName: Health Assessment and Management in Tourism and Health Science
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、外所二年級以上、自第一階段開放全校研究所同步選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以瞭解旅遊者在生理和心理上評估與管理。學習者將透過課程講授、分組報告、交互討論，研討觀光、旅遊安全與身心健康相關評估與管理之概念、模式、原則與方法。本課程也經由業師講解與參觀現場，讓研究生能結合理論與實務，以為爾後進入觀光、旅遊與健康有關職場之經營管理、指導、教育訓練以及研究等之準備。
courseEngAbstract: This gateway course globally highlights the overall figure of assessment and management on tourism, travel and health. Through the lectures, discussions, and practices, the students would approach the concepts, principles and methods on safety and health assessment in tourism and health science.  The scope of this course based on the assessment and management related to tourism will cover the scope of health, mental aspect, and tour related areas.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課、實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
courseAbstract: 本課程的目的是培養學生的研究能力，包括數據收集和數據分析，最後組織和報告研究結果，鼓勵學生分享他們的知識和研究經驗。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this course are to foster students research capability, include data collection and data analyzing, and finally to organize and report the research result,  to establish a brain storming research climate, encourage students share their knowledge and research experience.

department: 健康科技學院碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、外所二年級以上、自第一階段開放全校研究所同步選課
courseAbstract: 次級（或稱二手）資料（secondary data）經常是健康照護相關研究之材料，在重視實證醫學的今日，許多研究均利用各種次級資料進行統計分析，以評估健康照護品質及病人之預後。在台灣，除了許多醫療機構本身的資料庫（例如醫院之醫檢報告，健檢報告）外，舉凡癌症登記、生命統計、死亡登記等全國性資料庫一直是實證醫學研究中經常利用的重要研究素材。本課程將以實例介紹台灣地區各種可用於實證醫學及健康照護研究之次級資料，並將以「全民健康保險學術研究資料庫」為對象進行實地之統計分析及示範，同學也將被要求分析此健保資料庫樣本
courseEngAbstract: In recognizing the importance of evidence-based medicine, secondary data have been widely used today in health care research. Many studies used a variety of secondary datasets for statistical analysis in order to assess the quality of health care and to e

courseAbstract: 本課程在於協助研究生瞭解資訊管理學門研究領域及可能研究方向；研究生需依教師指定論文中，分別選擇資訊科技、資訊管理領域論文各一篇，及自行決定一篇未來可能研究方向學術論文一篇(共三篇)，於課堂上做報告、分析與討論，藉此得以使學生了解其需求以及未來研究的方向。此外，本課程並定期邀請專家學者針對資訊管理研究領域進行專題演講。

courseAbstract: 本課程為JAVA程式語言入門課程，主要教學內容包含JAVA指令的語法，I/O的處理、程式邏輯運算、程式流程控制、陣列字串處理、JAVA套件等。另一方面，針對基本物件導向的程式設計，例如繼承、過載、多形等，亦會加以簡單講解並讓學生演練。
courseEngAbstract: Object-oriented programming is an important and basic IT skills, the purpose of this course is to teach students have the basic ability to establish a JAVA application and give students the concepts and the benefits of object-oriented programming include the characteristics Inheritance, Overload and Polymorphism. Topics covered include the Java programming language syntax, input and output functions, Array and strings, math functions, collection classes. Students will develop and test Java applications (typically) using Eclipse.

courseAbstract: 本課程先介紹有關休閒產業、健康事業、健康科技照護以及語言治療與聽力障礙的發展趨勢，並了解目前各領域科技應用的現況及跨領域之可能性，內容包括保健旅遊之跨域整合、管理方法應用、資訊科技與長照領域之結合，以及聽語治療的應用等。藉由各領域發展趨勢的了解，進一步透過企劃案構思，讓學生能充分了解跨領域應用的精隨。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the development trends of leisure and health industry, healthcare technology, and speech language pathology and audiology. The course also briefs the current state of technology applications, and identifies the possibility of cross-domain integration that includes the domains on health tourism, management, information technology, the long-term care, and speech language pathology and audiology. Based on the understanding of cross-domain background, students can propose business plan to fulfill the requirement of cross-domain applications on healthcare domain.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2. 全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
courseEngAbstract:
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.

note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2. 全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第二階段開放其選課，名單會於第一階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在闡述環境永續發展的意義與重要性，教學內涵希望提昇學生永續發展的覺知，增加永續發展的概念知識，培養正確的永續發展態度與價值觀，並發展永續發展的行動技能與行動經驗。課程強調在環境中進行教育，學習有關環境的知識、態度、技能，並且為實踐永續環境而準備。環境教育包含六個核心的學習要素：自然資源保育概念、環境管理概念的融入；生態原理、互動與互賴概念的融入；以及融入環境倫理與永續性的概念等。
    課程內容涵蓋環境概論、環境倫理、環境教育法規、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、與永續發展與生態保育等主題內容。教學策略運用：做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境議題等項目。教學方法採取課堂講解、分組討論、專題討論、現地參訪等方式進行，並以多媒體教材教學。期望藉由環境議題的認識與討論，深入環境的內涵；透過對於環境問題的觀察與思考，了解環境永續的本質及善盡環境保護的義務。環境教育是一種教育的過程，在過程中個人認識他們的環境，以及組成環境的生物、物理和文化間的交互作用，得到知識、技能和價值觀，並能個別或集體地了解並解決現在和將來的環境問題。
courseEngAbstract:
Environmental education is designed to explain the meaning and importance of environment and sustainable development. It refers to organized efforts to teach how natural environments function, and particularly, how human beings can manage behavior and ecosystems to live sustainably. It is a multi-disciplinary field integrating disciplines such as biology, chemistry, physics, ecology, earth science, atmospheric science, mathematics, and geography. The term often implies education within the school system, from primary to post-secondary. However, it sometimes includes all efforts to educate the public and other audiences, including print materials, websites, media campaigns, etc. 
  Environmental education consists of six core elements: the concept of conservation of natural resources, environmental management into ecological principles, into the concept of interaction and interdependence; and the concept of integration of environmental ethics and sustainable environment. Environmental education is the teaching of individuals, and communities, in transitioning to a society that is knowledgeable of the environment and its associated problems, aware of the solutions to these problems, and motivated to solve them.Environmental education is an educational process, in the process of personal awareness in their environment, and form an environment of interaction between biological, physical and cultural, are knowledge, skills, and values, and individually or collectively, can understand and solve current and future environmental problems.

courseAbstract:
本課程透過對羽球基本技能及相關知識的介紹，幫助學
生認識羽球活動的各種技巧，並以引導學生充分運動及享受羽球運動樂趣為主軸，建立
學生終身運動之基礎。授課內容包括單、雙打比賽技能與比賽觀念、比賽規則演變與羽
壇現況的講解，以及實際引導學生體驗各種不同形式的比賽，使學生建立對羽球活動的
基本技能與終身興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is to help students know the various skills of badminton activities 
through the introduction of badminton basic skills and related knowledge 
aiming to have students fully exercise and enjoy the fun of badminton, and 
establish the foundation for lifelong exercise. Curriculum includes game 
techniques of singles and doubles and the explanation of game concepts, 
game rule evolution and status of badminton development, and to actually 
lead students to experience games of different forms, and establish the 
fundamental techniques and lifelong interest of badmintons.

courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course not only emphasis on the maintenance of physical fitness and sport skill, but also on the cultivation of the leisure, for the improving the concept of injury prevention. In the activities, students can gradually improve health fitness and sports performance, and further promote the development of physical and mental.

courseAbstract: 本課程將從組織之定義及組織行為之定義開始討論組織行為在管理層面之重要性，課程會包括組織行為全球觀點、組織行為之行程與差異、組織之激勵、個體決策、工作團對與溝通領導等組織研究領域相關重點。課程會以講授、活動與戶外教學來啟發同學在組織行為學上的概念及興趣。
courseEngAbstract: The main objective of this course is to introduce the concept of Organizational Behavior (OB), such as the definition of OB and why this subject is important to enterprise. Second, the course attempts to stimulate students’ interest in the area of OB, so

department: 四年制資訊管理系

courseAbstract:
不同於經濟學原理的理論基礎，健康經濟學課程
強調經濟學於健康照護的應用。由於我國已實施全民健康保險，健康照護產
業的生態，形成衛福部健保署與醫療產業間資本要素的獨買型態。因此，本
課程將針對此一特性，分別先導入健康和醫療照護，再分別介紹醫療照護、
醫療保險的需求，以及醫療照護生產及成本，最後再帶入政府所扮演的角
色。之後再分別介紹健康照護相關的產業，並針對我國長期照護及全民健康
保險制度加以著墨，期使同學修習完本課程之後，能對健康經濟學的應用有
初步的認識。
courseEngAbstract: Health economics is a branch of economics concerned with issues related to efficiency, effectiveness,value and behavior in the production and consumption of health and healthcare. It is worth to be mentioned, the demand for health is unlike most other goods because individuals allocate resources in order to both consume and produce health. This course focus on allocating health care resource reasonably and making an effort to avoid catching the common cold affects people other than the decision maker or finding sustainable, humane and effective solutions to the opioid epidemic.

courseAbstract: 本課程將從商業智慧的理論與實務面開始講述，並說明資料探勘、資料採礦的基本概念與原  理。其中將涵蓋商業智慧的趨勢與未來之發展應用。除此，課程也將實作資料之探勘模式與技能，藉由實作之練習與探勘後所萃取出之資料解讀演練，學生能夠建構出完整的商業智慧整體結構概念，並且對於其原理、技術及應用能有更深入之了解，提升日後於職場之競爭力。
courseEngAbstract: The main purposes of this course are to introduce the crucial role of business intelligence in the digital century, and to guide the students how to use data mining technique to explore tacit knowledge behind information. The course will start from theoretical background of business intelligence and then extends to the trend of business intelligence and future development. Furthermore, the course will coach students employ different data mining model to enhance data handling practical experience. The outcomes of this course may improve students’ professional competence in their career marketing.

department: 四年制資訊管理系

courseAbstract:
本課程將以物聯網資訊促進健康發展為基礎導論，分別由健康、亞健康以及失能照護等分階段進行簡介，其中特別著重高齡照護議題，藉由專家訪談、案例分享，及進行課堂討論，讓學員認識健康照護物聯網的應用之效益。
在資訊技術的導引方面，物聯網的概念已從傳統式的單一產品與技術導向，進而邁向大規模生活應用、醫療健康、與資料分析的發展模式；本課程將引導學員從物聯網基本架構、裝置開發實務進行個案了解，並以此延伸開始認識三段五級的健康促進與預防等概念，進而激發學員發揮健康照護與醫療資訊跨領域的創新結合。
courseEngAbstract: This course mainly discusses the theory of healthcare on elderly who are classified as healthy, partial healthy, and disabled. Through case analysis, trend analysis, and expert interview, students are able to explore the application of Internet of Things (IOT) technology on healthcare of elderly and the current development of healthcare industry. Internet of Things refers to the interactive activities among machines. In this course, we introduce the basic concept and the application of IOT technology, the trend and challenge of IOT technology, how to connect IOT technology and healthcare service, and the application of IOT technology on healthcare of elderly.

department: 四年制資訊管理系

courseEngAbstract: The major subject of this course is to introduce the Machine Learning Programming theoretically and practically.

courseAbstract: 本課程之介紹，在於使學生對法律常識、法律理念、倫理概念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知。從生活與倫理及正義概念出發，就常見的法律問題，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代人正確的法律觀及倫理觀。
courseEngAbstract: This course helps students to develop the following concepts: law, ethic, legal perspective, and legal system of Taiwan. From the aspects of ethics and justice, this course introduces common legal issues, in order to develop the knowledge of law and ethic for students.

courseAbstract:
本課程透過攻防系統介紹與練習、團隊攻防練習、比
賽系統介紹與練習等，使學生體會排球是項有趣的團隊運動，瞭解比賽場地設備
和比賽規則。課程內容包含個人或多人的進攻與防守技術、戰術學習與運用，在
比賽中培養學生的集體行動團結合作精神，進而達到增進友誼和同學間之情感，
並享受比賽帶來的競爭與樂趣。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is through the introduction and practice of offensive-defensive 
system, group offensive-defensive practice, game system introduction and 
practice etc., to have students experience that volleyball is an interesting 
group sports, and understand game fields, equipment and the rules of game . 
Curriculum includes individual or group offensive and defensive techniques, 
the learning and application of tactics, establishing the spirit of team work 
through games so that to strengthen the friendship among classmates and 
enjoy the competition and fun with games.

courseAbstract:
課程強調的是以瑜珈觀點的力量與柔軟度訓練，及闡
明正確的伸展與訓練方式，內容包括呼吸法、放鬆與伸展概念基礎、氣功暖身及
功能性強化訓練，並以高熱能的串聯動作得到最佳的舒展，進而達到刺激新陳代
謝、強化功能性肌群、矯正不良姿勢以促進身心健康。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is emphasis on improvement of strength and flexibility to stimulate 
metabolism, strengthen the muscle functional group, correct bad posture to 
promote physical and mental health by breathing, relaxation and extension of 
conceptual foundations, qigong warm and functional strengthening training 
and to high heat.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程內容包括健康照護資訊簡介、醫學語言與分類系統、醫學資料處理、電子病歷、生醫訊號處理、病人安全資訊系統、醫學資訊傳輸與資料交換標準（HL7）、醫學數位影像傳輸標準（DICOM）、醫療決策分析與智慧型系統、遠距醫療、網路健康照顧服務及公共衛生資訊系統等。
courseEngAbstract: The content of this course includes Introduction to Health Informatics, Medical Data Process, Electronic Medical Records, Medical Image, Medical Coding and Classification systems, Medical Decision Support and Intelligent Systems, Health Level Seven (HL7),

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、程式設計課程
courseAbstract:
本課程為教導學生撰寫行動應用軟體(Application software, Mobile
application, 或簡稱 App)。近年來，行動裝置已非常普及，無論智慧型手機
或平板電腦，這些行動裝置上的應用軟體，皆有很大的需求，因此，行動應
用軟體可說是目前當紅的應用軟體開發領域。
本教學著重於 Android 系統上的軟體開發，因此，同學應熟悉 Java 程
式語言(不熟悉的同學可一邊上課學 Android，一邊利用課外時間惡補 Java)，
上課開發環境為 Android Studio，課程包含學習使用介面、事件處理與其他
進階功能，以讓學生能具備開發行動應用軟體之能力。
courseEngAbstract:
Technology continues to evolve and provide us with increasingly powerful
mobile devices. Computers are no longer confined to desks and laps but instead live
in our pockets and hands. The purpose of this course is to teach students how to build
Teacher’s academic code: 9996
mobile apps for Android operating platform. We learn to write both web apps and
native apps for Android using Eclipse and the Android SDK. Moreover, the course
teaches students to think about the unique design and deployment issues that must be
taken into consideration when developing applications for mobile devices.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、程式設計課程
courseAbstract: 本課程主要在教授行動軟體APP (1)軟體製作技術，(2)UI/UX設計技術，(3)企畫技術。我們將指導學生實作幾項APP習作作品，並且完成一項APP應用作品。
courseEngAbstract: The essential of this course is leading students to build up their APP software programming skills, to be familiar with APP UI/UX design skills, and to practice the APP development teamwork. Students will be guide to practice several APP development. And they are asked to develop and make one APPs in this course by themselves.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、程式設計課程
courseAbstract: SAS系列軟體是當今重要的資料處理、資料應用、資料分析軟體，可以用在一般資料處理應用分析也可以用在Big Data資料處理應用分析。在SAS資料處理、應用與分析架構上，本課程著重於「從資料應用角度，如何使用SAS資料處理技術來整理分析資料，並製作相關文件」。
courseEngAbstract: We are intended to introduce the concept of planning, designing, and executing applied data manipulation projects using SAS technologies. Through step-by-step guiding of case studies, students are going to be familiar with the processes of applied data manipulation. And they are going to study SAS basic data manipulation skills. Students are asked to work on several projects in this course.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note:
開學第1週前至系辦申請，經甄選後，採人工方式選課。
修課限制：實習課程、本系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、維持十八週課程
courseAbstract: 運用企業社會資源，讓學生進行實習，拓展學生在專業實務方面之知識與經驗；實習指導老師提供相關諮詢與輔導。
courseEngAbstract:
(1) Let students be familiar with working environment and cultivate correct concepts and work ethic. 
(2) School utilizes social resources to have students expand their knowledge and experience in the areas of professional practice; 
(3) Instructors provide consulting and counseling. 
(4) Instructors assess students’ learning outcomes.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
courseName: 產業經營績效之大數據分析
courseEngName: Big data analysis for industrial operating performance
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程將教授學生如何透過數據分析程式(python與VBA 程式設計)彙整產業經營績效數據，掌握預算的執行、成本與費用的控制、資產負債與現金的效率管理技巧。本課程將讓學生整合數據分析與商業管理理論，透過預算掌握企業發展，控管企業營運執行，奠基學生養成以大數據分析作為決策之依據。
courseEngAbstract: This course will demonstrate how to aggregate industrial operating performance data through data analysis skill (including python and excel vba programming). This help student to master budget execution, cost/expense control, and asset/liability/cash efficiency management skills. This course will allow students to integrate data analysis and business management theory in order to realize the framework of business development through budget and control business execution performance, which is the foundation for students applying big data analysis as the basis of decision-making.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生獲得有關我國保健及醫療照護體系(Health Care System)內有關機構之組織及管理的基本知識與技能，及其在醫療相關部門管理之應用。課程內容以管理程序為架構，範圍從管理的簡介開始，再依循管理的過程分別介紹健康照護管理有關的主題－醫療體系與環境、規劃、組織、人力資源管理、領導與激勵、品管，風險管理等之理論與實務層面。以期學生由此能對健康照護管理有一基本的但完整的認識，以開發自己的管理潛能。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to assist the student with nursing experiences to gain the knowledge and skills of the organization and management, in turn, and to be able to apply those to healthcare management. Topics include：The concept of “Customer-Focu

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、外系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在介紹資訊安全的理論與實務，包括資料加解密技術與演算法，數位簽章與認證，及現行網際網路上駭客行為及防駭。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides the basic concepts of information security. It includes the principles of encryption, decryption, signatures and authentication. The security practices in the Internet and electronic commerce will also be introduced in the course.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
multipleTeacherName: 徐建業, 祝國忠, 洪論評, 林東正, 陳彥宏, 杜清敏, 連中岳, 林良憲, 陳亮均, 吳承翰
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、專題製作、程式設計課程
courseAbstract: 為某一主題上提出創新觀念，或對某主題存在的問題提出解決方案，或在效能上提出改進具體建議之研究，並驗證之。
courseEngAbstract: The topics of this course bring up creative ideas on certain topics, make solutions to known problems on certain topics; or researches in making effective suggestions to improve efficiency and prove it.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由資43A、資43B、語43A互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
本課程透過對羽球基本技能及相關知識的介紹，幫助學
生認識羽球活動的各種技巧，並以引導學生充分運動及享受羽球運動樂趣為主軸，建立
學生終身運動之基礎。授課內容包括單、雙打比賽技能與比賽觀念、比賽規則演變與羽
壇現況的講解，以及實際引導學生體驗各種不同形式的比賽，使學生建立對羽球活動的
基本技能與終身興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is to help students know the various skills of badminton activities 
through the introduction of badminton basic skills and related knowledge 
aiming to have students fully exercise and enjoy the fun of badminton, and 
establish the foundation for lifelong exercise. Curriculum includes game 
techniques of singles and doubles and the explanation of game concepts, 
game rule evolution and status of badminton development, and to actually 
lead students to experience games of different forms, and establish the 
fundamental techniques and lifelong interest of badmintons.

note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由資43A、資43B、語43A互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
學習與養成良好的各種基本技術後並加強比賽技術、戰
術的應用與結合，以期能在桌球比賽中獲得有效成果。如有優質的各種基本技術及搭配
單打戰術應用就能在比賽中直接得分與攻擊。在比賽技術中有良好優質的接發球戰術就
能先發制人，且能有效控制對方直接攻擊得分，其贏球機率高。因此在單打技術、戰術
應用桌球技術中佔有極重要性。
courseEngAbstract:
After learning and cultivating various kinds of basic skills, 
a player should reinforce the applications and combinations of singles and 
tactics, aiming to have effective results in table tennis games. If a player has 
various kinds of superior basic skills combined with the applications of singles 
tactics, he/she can score and attack directly in a game. In terms of singles, if a 
player has superior tactics for receiving and serving the ball, he/she can take 
the initiative and control his/her opponent effectively to attack and score 
directly, so that he/she will have a greater chance to win the game; therefore, 
such tactics has great importance in table tennis skills regarding singles and 
tactics applications.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、外系四技一般生、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目標為輔導同學考取有利就業與深造的資訊管理相關證照，涵蓋醫資管理師、Microsoft與TQC證照等，內容包括Excel試算表的進階操作功能、Excel/VBA物件導向程式設計、Access資料庫管理系統的進階操作功能、結構化查詢語言SQL的設計技巧以及醫學資理管理。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the advanced functions of Excel and Access, programming of Excel/VBA and SQL, and basic concepts of medical informatics. This course also helps the students prepare for and pass the related certification.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大四、外系四技一般生大四、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、畢業班課程
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在介紹學生使用者體驗(UX)與使用者介面(UI)設計中使用的方法和工具。使用者體驗設計專注於產品生命週期的早期設計階段，旨在確保產品滿足使用者需求；涵蓋的範例工具和方法包括角色、場景、故事板、焦點團體、線框圖、原型設計等，以及InVision、Áxure、Balsamiq等軟體。
在本課程中，學生將透過三個團隊活動實際演練當今行動科技的產品設計中一個或多個使用者體驗設計的方法，藉以讓學生清楚瞭解使用者體驗與使用者介面設計的概括全貌。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides an introduction to the fields of UX research and design. Students will gain an understanding of what is involved in UX research, including conducting interviews, evaluating systems, and analyzing systems using principles of good design. Students will also learn about the work involved in UX Design, including the generation of promising design solutions and the creation of prototypes at multiple levels of fidelity. By interleaving successive phases of UX Research and Design, students will see how to learn from inevitable mistakes and improve towards a product with a great UX.

department: 四年制資訊管理系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「應用科學導論/科技與生活」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 以學生現有的數理、生物背景為基礎，引導學生進入科技應用的領域。現代科技進步快速，世界日新月異，學生需具備有敏銳之觀察力與學習能力，始能跟上時代之潮流。本課程將目前先進之科技作一概念性的介紹；涵蓋有太空科技、能源應用、材料科技、生物技術、資訊科技等內容，期能一窺世界之奧妙，進而引發學習新知之動機與興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
At the dawn of the twenty-first century today, as every citizen of the world should have a basic scientific concept and knowledge which can serve people to make the decisions, participate in civic and cultural affairs, and join economic production activities. Also, beside the professional expertise and technology, the most important thing for the citizens is to care about humanities, develop themselves actively, and benefit the people and serve the community.
The major purpose of this course is from the new technology of modern life to induced the students knowing the basic applied science and technique concept. From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.

department: 資訊管理系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所、外所（是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表）。
courseAbstract: 資訊系統由於逐漸標準化、公開化、分享化以至於資訊系統架構逐漸趨於一致。由於競爭對手對於資訊的獲得較過去相對容易，極易產生模仿的效果，因此單單只靠IT資源所形成的競爭優勢根本不存在獨特性、差異性，更難以保持長期的領先地位。「策略與資訊管理」指的是在組織中發展出來一套有價值性的資訊策略規劃與應用模式，結合訊系統及資訊人員作最有效的管理，以其發揮最佳競爭優勢。
courseEngAbstract: Information system has been standardized, open-sourced, and shared, which leads to a unified structure of information system. Competitors can easily obtain each others’ valuable information and mimic each others’ behavior. Thus, depending on information p

department: 資訊管理系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所、外所（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）。
courseAbstract: 應用決策支援系統與提升決策績效是資訊科技應用的一個重要方向。隨著企業電子化的普及，將資料進一步加值並作深入的分析，創造「運籌於帷幕之中，決勝於千里之外」之競爭力，是未來資訊應用的重要趨勢，也是資訊管理者必須充分瞭解的核心知識。
courseEngAbstract: Applying decision support systems and making the better performance of decision is an very important of using information technology. Lots of information and data are produced by current information technology. More analysis on these information or data w

department: 資訊管理系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所、外所（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）。
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹巨量資料的基本知識與方法，內容包括巨量資料分析的趨勢與挑戰、如何運用機器學習(machine learning)演算法於巨量資料處理、巨量資料的架構與技術(Hadoop, MapReduce/MR, Ecosystem)、巨量資料處理的程式設計(以Python / R開發應用)。為使學生對巨量資料分析有全面性的瞭解，除教師授課外將輔以個案討論、範例實作，此外透過相關文獻閱讀可協助同學擬定期末專案方向，以落實學習目標。由於 Hadoop 是採用 Java 語言撰寫，對於許多不熟悉 Java 語言的同學來說有相當大的入門障礙，因此本課程會先調查同學程度，再進行考量。可能用到的工具會有Java, Python, R與Visualization等工具。主要能呈現期末專案成果與business value，與培養 story telling 的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course will begin with trend and challenges of big data analysis, and is followed by the machine learning algorithms, technical architecture (Hadoop, MapReduce/MR, Ecosystem), and programming (Crawler development with Python, text mining and SNA analysis with R); they are domain knowledge and techniques for the analysis. Students must propose a term project to justify learning achievement.

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進學生瞭解醫療決策分析，了解在一未確定的健康醫療事件中如何做一好的決策，我們使用機率及效用的方法來推導與分析，同時培養學生檢索國際相關期刊的能力，並了解相關的論文內容，藉此讓學生體認醫療決策分析的角色與功能。

courseAbstract: 本課程協助同學瞭解基本管理理論，並輔以實際案例進行案例教學，課程涵蓋管理理論演進、企業環境分析簡介、策略規劃原理、決策理論、組織結構與設計、組織變革與創新、組織行為基礎、激勵理論、領導理論、溝通、組織控制程序及實務案例研討等。
courseEngAbstract: The course assists students to familiarize the fundamentals of management and develop their analytical ability through case studies. The discussion issues will include the evolution of management theory, strategic planning, organization design, organization change and development, leadership theory, motivation theory, communication and negotiation, control theory and marketing management, operations management, information management and financial management.

courseAbstract: 本課程設計旨在協助學生培養服務的精神，藉由至服務機構提供服務，落實課堂所學之服務知識與理念，並進而從服務中學習、瞭解服務於社區之重要性與體驗服務之意義，培養正向的服務態度，以期自我省思、瞭解自我進而促進自我成長與肯定生命價值。
courseEngAbstract: This course is provided to introduce the basic concepts of volunteer, and help the students with fundamental understanding in non-profit organization (NPO). The class will be guided by different instructions of lecture, group discussion, homework and test

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「哲學與人生/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 「哲學與人生」是對「人的生命」所作的「哲學反省」。人，作為自然的、社會的、歷史的存在，在他所生活的世界中，面臨著繁複多樣、瞬息萬變的問題：處境、命運、愛情、知識、道德、藝術、宗教、臨終與死亡……其中有些問題事實上已經深深困擾著我們，另外一些則伺機突襲，在我們還來不及準備的時候，就被迫面對。生命的意義究竟是什麼？本課程嘗試以深入淺出的討論，藉由過去、當代人物的所感、所思，促進學習者進一步反省自我生命之種種。
courseEngAbstract:
Philosophy and Life is as a philosophical reflective thinking for the life.
Human beings, as natural, social and historical beings, face a great many complex varied and fast changing problems in the life-world, for example, love, destiny, knowledge, morality, art, religion, dying, and moreover the death so on.... Actually some of them have deeply perplexed us, while others watch for their chances to attack there would leave no time for covering our ears and we are merely compelled to confront with them. After all, what does Life mean?
Whereas this course tries to take up by the way a kind of discussion in explaining the profound in simple terms, and in making use of whatever in history, or the present age somebody's feeling and thinking, in order to promote the students to question themselves more about, and reflect further on all sorts of life-self.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程之目的，在使學生了解健康行為科學之學理與策略，以及其在健康科學領域之運用。並藉探討健康與行為各層面之影響因素及其相關理論，使學生對健康行為科學在保健上之重要性有一清楚認識。透過文獻閱讀與討論使學生熟悉健康行為之教育策略、健康行為養成的過程。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students understand the knowledge and approach of health behavior, and know how to application in health science field. By exploring theory and varies influence factors of health behavior, to make students full unders

department: 四年制運動保健系
note:
1.第二階段加退選僅由人康、健科學院四技生一年級生互相跨班選課及人康、健科學院重修生選課。
2.第三階段加退選開放系外選課。
3.主題:文學與傳統故事改編
courseAbstract: 本課程就文言文（50％文言文－諸子散文、詩詞韻文）與白話文（50％白話文－現代散文、現代小說）兩方面，編選古典文學名篇及現代經典文本。內容安排除兼顧古典與現代的文學價值外，亦涵蓋文學的通俗性與藝術性。
courseEngAbstract: This course is based on two textbooks, compiled with famous classical and modern literature each. Apart from valuable literature sources and the balance between classical and modern materials, its contents also include the popularity and artistic quality of each.

department: 四年制運動保健系
courseEngName: The theory and application of basic meridian
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程將從傳統中醫哲學與基礎論述出發，介紹中醫基本理論、臟象學說、經絡學說，以及中藥養生與外治法簡介等領域，並與西醫理論進行比較，期待同學們能在現代醫學的思維中，將中醫知識融合到運動保健基礎知識中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to introduce the philosophy and fundamental theories of traditional Chinese medicine, including basic theories, theory of visceral manifestations, meridian, and herb therapy.  We expect students could integrate the knowledge of traditional Chinese medicine and the concepts of western medicine to apply in the practice of exercise and health science.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程以現代性的概念，貫連二十世紀至當前的藝術潮流發展，探討當代藝術的幾個重要流派、特性與不同面向，呈現藝術發展的獨特性與創造性。培養藝術涵養及建立個人對審美的主體觀，並瞭解當前社會藝術文化脈動，對當代的文化思潮有其見地，以開展學生發展自我潛能，並將藝術融入生活，提升生命境界。
courseEngAbstract: This course employs the concept of modernity as a framework to establish connections between the evolution of artistic trends from the 20th century to the present day. The course delves into various significant genres, characteristics, and different aspects of contemporary art, thereby highlighting the distinctiveness and creativity of artistic development. The objective of this course is to cultivate artistic appreciation, establish personal aesthetic perspectives and comprehend the prevailing social and cultural trends in art. The course further aims to enhance students' capacity for self-growth, integrate art into their daily lives, and elevate their overall living experience.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目標在於探討最新運動生理學新知，其次探討運動生理學應用於健康體適能有關的發展，包括：影響健康體適能的因素；評估心肺適能的測驗；體適能的訓練方法；特殊群體的運動；健康的身體組成與營養等。再次探討運動生理學與運動表現相關的科學，包含：影響運動表現的因素；評估運動表現的測驗；提升運動表現的訓練方法；特殊族群的運動訓練；營養、身體組成與運動表現；環境對運動表現的影響強化劑與措施。最後探討如何透過運動生理學新知進行特殊群體，如：婦女、氣喘患者、糖尿病患者與老人等的運動的處方等。
courseEngAbstract: Exercise physiology can be defined as the study of the effects of exercise on the various systems of the body, it is a systematic study of how exercise alters the structure and function of the human body particularly the neuromuscular, skeletal cardiovasc

department: 四年制運動保健系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由運四一A、護二一A、護二一E互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
學習與養成良好的各種基本技術後並加強比賽技術、戰
術的應用與結合，以期能在桌球比賽中獲得有效成果。如有優質的各種基本技術及搭配
單打戰術應用就能在比賽中直接得分與攻擊。在比賽技術中有良好優質的接發球戰術就
能先發制人，且能有效控制對方直接攻擊得分，其贏球機率高。因此在單打技術、戰術
應用桌球技術中佔有極重要性。
courseEngAbstract:
After learning and cultivating various kinds of basic skills, 
a player should reinforce the applications and combinations of singles and 
tactics, aiming to have effective results in table tennis games. If a player has 
various kinds of superior basic skills combined with the applications of singles 
tactics, he/she can score and attack directly in a game. In terms of singles, if a 
player has superior tactics for receiving and serving the ball, he/she can take 
the initiative and control his/her opponent effectively to attack and score 
directly, so that he/she will have a greater chance to win the game; therefore, 
such tactics has great importance in table tennis skills regarding singles and 
tactics applications.

department: 四年制運動保健系
courseEngName: Testing and Evaluation of Physical Fitness
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生

courseEngAbstract: Based on the Physical Fitness Program designed by the Ministry of Education, the course is to instruct students to understand the concepts and contents of physical fitness. Not only to integrate the relevant theories with experiments and groups works, stu

department: 四年制運動保健系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由生41A、護43A、運四1B互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在培養撞球運動基本認知與技術能力，並籍由撞
球運動的學習,促進學生身心機能的發展，增進人際關係及規律運動習慣之養成。
courseEngAbstract:
The aim of the course is to learn billiard in mind and learn skills through
the game of billiard, so that learners experience the fun of learning golf
skills, and thus become the future health-related physical fitness and
life-long sports movement options.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目的在探討人類自生命發生至終結整個過程中，各發展階段之重要現象、影響因素及後續反應。主要之理論架構以心理、生理、社會及靈性層面各種重要觀點統合為經，並輔以文化特質為緯，課程特別強調發展危機和任務，期能使學習者獲得全面性之觀念與實務性之經驗探討。
courseEngAbstract: This curriculum proposes students can understand a developmental process of human, and characteristics of individual’s behavior patterns in each development stages. Then students can learn the strategies of prevention and adjustment for themselves. The de

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「應用科學導論/科技與生活」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 以學生現有的數理、生物背景為基礎，引導學生進入科技應用的領域。現代科技進步快速，世界日新月異，學生需具備有敏銳之觀察力與學習能力，始能跟上時代之潮流。本課程將目前先進之科技作一概念性的介紹；涵蓋有太空科技、能源應用、材料科技、生物技術、資訊科技等內容，期能一窺世界之奧妙，進而引發學習新知之動機與興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
At the dawn of the twenty-first century today, as every citizen of the world should have a basic scientific concept and knowledge which can serve people to make the decisions, participate in civic and cultural affairs, and join economic production activities. Also, beside the professional expertise and technology, the most important thing for the citizens is to care about humanities, develop themselves actively, and benefit the people and serve the community.
The major purpose of this course is from the new technology of modern life to induced the students knowing the basic applied science and technique concept. From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程為運動保健係學生選修課程之一，瞭解運動保健在運動治療過程中，所應扮演的角色。並藉由運動治療之理論基礎與實際操作的授課教學討論，讓學生清楚運動治療對於體能活動的重要性。
courseEngAbstract: Exercise therapy is an individualized exercise prescription (or plan) such as Principles of conditioning、Sports injury management & Injury evaluation process、Principles of muscular strength & endurance, designed to restore health and prevent further disea

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生評估會員健康與體適能現況，並依其能力處方合宜、適當的運動計畫，並有能力追蹤、評量運動計畫的漸進過程，以確保運動所帶來的助益
courseEngAbstract: To provide students the core components for exercise prescription related to the general population. This course will include good development, evaluation/testing (baseline data), exercise selection and development of specific exercise protocols. The stud

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在教導學生如何處理運動時所發生的運動傷害，運動前的預防措施及運動傷害後的復健。課程內容包括運動傷害防護基本概念、知識及技能，運動傷害評估及如何規劃運動傷害防護室。
courseEngAbstract: The course is aimed to teach students how to handle sports injury immediately, preparation before exercise and the rehabilitation after sports injury. Course contents include basic concepts of sports injury, knowledge and skill, sports injury assessment a

department: 四年制運動保健系
courseEngName: Prevention and Health Care of Lifestyle-related Disease
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在讓學生學習21世紀的健康趨勢的演變及各種慢性疾病的相關知識,包括可能的成因,機轉,對健康的影響及目前的防制重點,使學生能對不同族群提出適切的健康指導,以增進其在運動保健領域上的整體指導能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to instruct students to understand the general knowledge of lifestyle-related disease, and how to prevent it through the improvement of dietary plan and exercise practice. Students can in one way learn how to live a healthy lifestyle and pr

department: 四年制運動保健系
note:
運四AB合班
1.修課限制:本系四技一般生、大二以上。
2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制運動保健系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由高四三A、助二一A、運四二A、運四二B、運四三A互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
教育部針對高中職以下學校，鼓勵其應落實游泳
教學及提昇學生之游泳能力。然而許多高中職學生進入大專院校後，並非全
部達到基本游泳能力之要求。本課程旨在引導學生認識水的危險和水上安全
等相關知識，進一步則教導學生學會並增進游泳之基本能力，包括基本潛
水、韻律呼吸、自由式、蛙式、仰式、蝶式等。
courseEngAbstract:
The Ministry of Education proposed that all students under 12 should learn 
swimming and achieve certain criteria in individual swimming levels. However, 
many Taiwan students those have entered colleges appear to not develop 
their skills in swimming. The course is to awaken students to the safety and 
danger about waters. The instructor will help students to develop and improve 
their swimming skills, such as underwater swimming, rhyming and efficient 
breathes, freestyle, breaststroke, backstroke, and butterfly stroke.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 上課教室：韻律教室，運動保健指導模組。修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程主要在培養學生有能力進行基礎的有氧運動帶動，包括正確示範動作的能力、有效的口指令引導與動作導正的技巧
courseEngAbstract: This course is emphasis on aerobic instructing and leading skill. Teaching student know how to utilize the proper form of aerobic movement, good communication skill and cueing to demonstrated and to lead an aerobic class. Also allowing the student to have the ability to observe and correct faulted movements to making exercise safer.

courseAbstract:
在舞蹈的領域中，現代舞強調「探索」與「醒思」這
兩項精神，人體的自我探索、人在時間與空間中的醒思，因此本課程著重於身體
運作的認知與探索，課程目標強調經由肢體活動做身體能力的察覺與開發。課程
內容以漸進的練習原則，探索累積學習者的身體經驗。
courseEngAbstract:
Among all dancing areas, modern dance emphasizes on both “exploration” 
and “disillusion” spirits, self-exploring on human body, consciousness about 
human within time and space. Therefore, this course emphasizes on 
recognition and discovery of body operation, and the curricular goal stresses 
on the awareness and development of body competence through body 
activities. The course content is to explore the body experiences of 
cumulative learners by proper sequential practices.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三、外系四技一般生、護理及長照學士後、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在學習超媒體(hypermedia) 的素材製作，包含文案(text)、圖像(image)、語音(audio)、視訊(video)；並教導學生利用各種素材製作、文案編輯、圖像處理、語音合成及視訊剪輯，進而編撰成影音光碟VCD、SVCD、DVD與網路串流。
courseEngAbstract: The course provides material source of hypermedia with computer software that includes text clips, image clips, audio clips, and video clips. The learner will integrate these clips to produce VCD, SVCD, DVD medium and steams in the web sites.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三
courseAbstract: 一.先備能力:先修課程:解剖學、生理學、病理學二、本課程橫向統合及縱向銜接之實施情形。 本科目之教學設計縱向銜接基礎醫學之解剖、生理學及病理學等相關知識；橫向統合其他護理專業核心科目之護理專業知能三、課程摘要：中文：本課程在提供已具有解剖、生理、病理及內外科護理學知識的學習者， 學習身體評估之知識與技巧。課程目標強調評估技術之正確性與完整性，教學策略將針對不足之學理進行澄清與討論，各項評估技巧則藉由示教及分組練習，使學生能有系統的進行個案常用的身體評估，並應用於護理工作中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is offered to the learners who have had basic courses in human anatomy, physiology, pathology, and medical-surgical nursing. Health assessment is designed to promote the learners the habit of observation, the skills of data gathering, and the

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 授課地點：健身房，修課限制：本系四技一般生大三
courseAbstract: 課程內容主要是以實務操作為主，體適能檢測與評估是第一大主軸，體適能中心器械操作指導與肌力訓練計畫實務是第二大主軸，藉分組操作及演練，進行校內人員實測與評估報告、訓練計畫實施、指導模式建立為考核依據，令學生能藉由不同點的切入多方體驗體適能之實務操作，為因應職場需求而做好準備。
courseEngAbstract: The course is design to help students understand the application and practicality of fitness. The course divides into two major parts which are fitness assessment and gym instruction. First is the basic skill of fitness testing, communicating and consulti

department: 四年制運動保健系
courseName: 骨骼肌肉機能評估與訓練
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三、外系四技一般生大三以上、跨校
courseAbstract: 骨骼肌肉機能評估與訓練，是運動保健領域中重要的一環。任何運動傷害若是能在第一時間獲得正確的評估處理，並接受正確的運動訓練計畫，將會有效的縮短復原時間。本課程將授予運動保健系學生有關骨骼肌肉機能評估與訓練的概念與實際操作，以期學生獲得基礎的評估技巧與訓練方法。
courseEngAbstract: Physical examination in sports injuries plays the important role in the field of the Exercise & Health Science. If we can provide the corrective assessment processing and exercise training programs in any sports injuries, it will be helpful in shortening

courseAbstract: 本課程法學之介紹，使學⽣對法律結構、法學理念及我國現⾏法有⼀整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、整復推拿⼈員切⾝法律問題等作系統性介紹，以培養正確的法律觀。從醫護業務與法律實務的⾓度，介紹傳統整復推拿⼈員的責任分際、法律問題、糾紛預防等，以強化法律問題的處理能⼒。
courseEngAbstract: Folklore conditioning industry regulations education

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 授課地點：健身房。修課限制：本系四技一般生大三
courseAbstract: 功能強化運動主要是針對身體的狀況， 結合適當的運動計畫執行之後，改善原本功能退化的狀況，進而讓身體在運動計畫的訓練之後，能夠恢復到健康的狀態。本課程的理論基礎是以運動改善下半身的循環促進，並進而帶動全身的循環以促進健康。從下肢訓練開始設計不同強度的訓練模式，並進而連接到各個部位所需要的運動如50肩 、坐骨神經痛、足底筋膜炎、尿失禁、經前症候群等等。透過適當的運動訓練計畫，讓身體再找回健康，是這門課的主軸。
courseEngAbstract: Functional strengthening exercise is mainly aimed at the physical condition, combined with the implementation of the appropriate exercise plans, to improve the original function degradation condition, so that the body can recover to a healthy state after the training of the exercise plan. The theoretical basis of this course is to improve the circulation of the lower body by exercise, and then drive the circulation of the whole body to promote health. To start from the lower limb training, different intensity training modes are designed, and then connected to the required exercises of various parts such as 50 shoulders, sciatica, plantar fasciitis, urinary incontinence, premenstrual syndrome and so on. Through the appropriate sports training plan, let the body regain health, is the main axis of this course.

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。
courseEngAbstract: This course is an introductory course on nursing research. Students will have the opportunity for a systematic investigation of a health-related topic of the student’s interest demonstrating knowledge and skills of research methodology. This course provid

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生基本的教學能力，使學生能運用教學原理進行個人、家庭及社區健康指導之教學過程，同時讓學生體認教學在健康照護實務中的功能及應有的態度。學生修習本課程中，必需實際完成教學計畫的擬定、執行、與評值過程。課程內容包括：教學在健康照護中角色與功能、教與學的原則、教學設計、學習評估、教學計畫、各種教學方法、教學媒體、教學評值等。
courseEngAbstract: This course will assist student to develop basic competencies in health teaching for individuals, families and communities and to experience the teaching function and attitude in health care practice. Actual student teaching projects will be developed, im

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上
courseAbstract: 運動心理學係屬美國心理學會 (American Psychological Association) 其下的第47分支機構 --- 健身與競技運動心理學 (Exercise and Sport Psychology) 之一門專業屬性極高之學科，主要在教導學生瞭解與組織運動、身體活動、運動員訓練、和教練指導方面相關的心理學知識之基本概念和應用方法。
courseEngAbstract: The study of Exercise and Sport Psychology is the academic branch of the American Psychological Association. It is the 47th branch of the APA. The purpose of the course is to teach students to understand the basic concepts and application of psychological

department: 四年制運動保健系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上
courseAbstract:
透過運動經營管理學程概念與定義的講授，讓學生對運動管理有整體的宏觀觀念， 
    學習有關運動經營管理基本理論，獲得運動經營管理的技能與知識、規劃與設計之

note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大四、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 使學生獲得專業與倫理之基本知識、概念與行為標準。能識別常見專業倫理問題並對其困境作倫理價值之分析與決策，進而激發學生發展批判性的倫理思考與判斷之潛能。課程重點在於專業倫理之基本概念、理論與原則、規範之護理實務應用為主，內容包含價值觀與衝突、倫理與道德、倫理理論、原則與規範、病人權利與責任、運動指導員職責與權利、醫療團隊合作倫理、倫理困境與倫理決策。
courseEngAbstract: The aim of this course is to help students to gain the basic concepts, knowledge of ethics, as well as the ability to analyze and make decisions of ethical issues in order to urge them to develop critical thinking and proper judgment. The concepts of the

department: 四年制運動保健系
multipleTeacherName: 廖翊宏, 彭雪英, 黃俊清, 賴世烱, 郭堉圻, 黃文經, 林懿苑, 林于世, 吳孝觀, 洪雅琦, 周定衡, 蔡咏芯
