3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
利用循序漸進的教學方式，教導學生匹克球的基本動作，
透過對匹克球基本動作的熟練，進而提昇學生對匹克球比賽的興趣、享受匹克球運動的
樂趣。講授匹克球運動的規則及比賽策略。強調運動員必須在規則範圍內做合法的競賽，
透過匹克球運動來幫助學生守法、守分與合作的精神，並協助運動習慣的養成，期望學
生能以匹克球運動作為終身運動。
courseEngAbstract:
The content of course is to instruct students’ Pickleball skill by using 
step-by-step teaching method. Over the basic movement of the skilled is to 
enhance the students' interest in Pickleball game and enjoyment the fun of 
Pickleball. The rules and strategies of teaching Pickleball to emphasize that 
athletes must be legitimate competition in the scope of the rules through the 
sport of Pickleball to help students to obey the law, be law-abiding and 
cooperation spirit, Therefor, students are expected to develop the habit of 
exercise and to choice Pickleball as a lifetime of activity.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大二以上、教室容量40人
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在了解兒童文學的發展源流、意義與價值。並藉由不同形式的兒童文學創作文本之賞析與評鑑，激發閱讀與研究兒童文學之興趣。並探析兒童文創產業的實務與趨勢，進而期許學生除能設計融入兒童文學的幼稚園相關課程活動外，能以更寬闖、更多元的角度與觀點來賞析兒童文學創作文本。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed for students who major in child care in order to equip students with the knowledge of children’s literature-poetry, story, drama…etc. It will also be expected that the student’s ability of designing the activity integrated children’s literature in this course.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: Skills for Infant and Toddler Care
note:
黃馨慧掛名，教室容量35人，跨域課程，志願選限本系30人、第二階段加開放本系外系選課至多5人，第三階段不開放，上課時間10:10-12:40
修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上、外系二技一般生大二、外系二技進修部大二以上、外系四技一般生一般生大二以上、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本課程設計以培養學生熟悉保母實務工作內容為導向，將以講解、示範、及輔導學生練習丙級保母技術士術科科目為主，包括安全醫護區、遊戲學習區、調製區及清潔區四組考題。並安排學生至資深保母家參觀見習兩日，實際觀摩保母從事居家照顧的工作內涵。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed mainly for students to familiarize with the child care providers’ skills certification. The instructor will explain and demonstrate the skills, and supervise students practicing the skills including the following four areas: safety

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大二以上、外系二技一般生大二、外系四技一般生大二以上、外系二技進修部大二以上、教室容量40人
courseAbstract: 本課程將介紹當今世界著名之音樂教學法，其中更著重在奧福教學教學的理念。訓練學生說白、歌唱、律動、樂器合奏及即興創作的能力。期末運用對教學理念的運用，設計音樂劇的呈現。
courseEngAbstract: In this course, I will introduce the most popular music pedagogy which are Kodaly、Orff、Suzuki and Dalcroze in the world. Students will practice speech rhythm、singing、musical ensemble 、improvisation and so on. At the end of this semester.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生、本系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程為一學期，每週二小時(畢業班上課週數則是12週，每週3小時)，二學分。教學內容包括英語聽力及口說能力之訓練。聽力訓練方面包括各種聽力技巧之培養，如聽前準備、聽取重點、聽取細節、其他輔助性聽力策略等。口說訓練方面則包括如何提問與回答、如何介紹自我、他人、服務單位或產品、語音留言、公共廣播、同儕互訪與角色扮演、透過聽力延伸主題來做小組討論及口頭報告等。是一門由英語中級程度提升至中高級程度之聽力與口語溝通訓練課程。
courseEngAbstract: This course includes a two-hour listening and speaking instruction and practice each week. The focus of this course is on developing students’ listening and speaking skills. Students are encouraged to develop their listening and speaking skills through various listening and speaking activities by making use of pre-listening strategies, listening strategies and speaking strategies for oral communication.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note:
本課程安排多次校外教學和戶外活動，欲選修前，請審慎評估自身體力、健康狀況及耐候程度，以確保個人安全。
修課限制：本系四技一般生、本系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、外系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在從學生經由電影休閒活動，引導學生了解更深層生活之中的文化領域，再利用文學閱讀的休閒活動，更進一步進行個人的寫作創作，開發未獲運用的身心組織及功能，更積極地反饋為個人的成長，增進個人身心發展與成熟，進而轉換成品德與自我價值體系。
courseEngAbstract: The aim of this course is to guide students explore their culture by watching movies, reading books, and writing novel. To borrow the ideas of the movies, students can  create their own novel. In term of those leisure activities, students can develop their personal growth and create their value system.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: Introduction to Illness in Infant and Child
note: 幼四二AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程包括有認識正常嬰幼兒的成長與發育，以及生長發育異常兒童之發現與處理方式，新生兒篩檢，嬰幼兒異常症狀早期發現之要點，兒童各器官系統正常與異常情況之理學評估和比較，並需實習身體評估與照護之要領。課程之平時作業為每位同學回顧及探討自身的出生史、生長史、預防注射紀錄、疾病史和家族史，藉此能知己而後知彼、將心比心，深刻了解生長發育與疾病之要義。學期中亦安排分組專題報告、特殊疾病之專家演講，參訪醫院或嬰幼兒保育機構，以及新生兒篩檢實驗室。
courseEngAbstract: This study includes “Introduction of Pediatrics, Normal and Abnormal Growth of Infant and Child, Newborn Screening, Immunization, Physical Assessment of All the Organ Systems of Infant and Child, Basic Knowledge of Abnormal Symptoms and Signs of Infant and Child, Identification of Children with Illness, Appropriate Way of Caring and Management of Abnormal Children”.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 幼四二AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹有關兒童行為觀察與輔導基本概念，以及兒童行為輔導的策略與技巧，配合課堂補充講義學習兒童行為觀察量表之使用與了解問題行為發生原因，進一步應用行為輔導介入之策略。課程內容包含常見問題行為特徵與輔導策略介紹，以及認識有特殊需求兒童之行為輔導（包括智能障礙、語言障礙、身體病弱、情緒障礙、多重障礙、自閉症、注意力缺陷過動症、發展遲緩等特殊兒童之教育與輔導策略）。藉由本課程內容安排，期盼可以培養學生對兒童行為輔導工作的熱誠與能力，並將所學運用於實際教學環境中。
courseEngAbstract: This course was base on theories of psychology and sociology .The major purpose was to discuss some effective strategies for solving the problems of child behavior, so that will be useful to the students in their professional career. This curriculum includes three parts, the first is theories and skills of child behavior guidance; the second is problems of behavior which were found on most of child, it includes: aggressive behavior, feeding problem, toilet training, sleeping problem, emotional problem, hyper-activity, social behavior, etc.; the third is behavior disorder of childhood, it includes: anxiety disorders, depression and peer relations, learning disabilities, over-activity disorder, mental retardation autism and childhood schizophrenia, etc.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 課程設計能力係屬幼兒教師、保育人員之專業能力，為提昇教保品質之基本條件。本課程旨在幫助學生建立自己的教保課程設計理念、培養實際設計課程活動之能力。主要內容包含課程之基本概念、幼兒教保課程的基礎、要素與設計發展、以及設計幼兒教保活動的主要方式。學生應能根據課堂所學及視實務機構所需，分組合力進行課程設計。
courseEngAbstract: This course deals with the theory and practice of curriculum design. Participants will learn the theoretic underpinnings which inform the practical problems of making curriculum and the how to do curriculum design. This course will begin with the curriculum rationale and then explore contemporary design models as expressed in the literature.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
multipleTeacherName: 陳紀萍, 陳俊全, 楊金寶, 邱瓊慧, 段慧瑩, 孫沛婕, 陳亮吟, 吳蘭若, 陳貞旬
note: 幼四二AB合班，實習期間：113/1/15-1/25(9天)寒假實習，修課限制：實習課程、本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 1.了解見習機構之性質、組織狀況及業務內容等。 2.觀摩並學習見習機構專業工作者之角色與職責。 3.藉見習活動認識與印證幼兒保育專業知識與技能。
courseEngAbstract: By practicum, students are expected to learn about three sets of knowledge, skills, and attitudes. First, they will get more ideas about the characteristics, organizations, and work contents of varies infant and child care centers. Second, by involving in daily activities of the classroom, students will observe and learn the professionalism of child caregivers. Last, through student teaching and related activities, students will consolidate their knowledge and skills regarding infant & child care.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseName: 嬰幼兒發展與學習評量
courseEngName: Assessment of development and learning for young children
note: 幼四二AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在認識嬰幼兒發展與學習評量的理論與其在幼兒園實作的基本概念、方法及議題，並熟悉資料的收集、分析解釋與溝通報告的方法。除瞭解常見的嬰幼兒發展評量工具外，亦探討如何與幼兒園教保活動課程大綱結合，進行嬰幼兒的學習及教保服務人員的教學兩方面的評量。
courseEngAbstract: This course addresses the assessment of young children from birth to age eight. The assessment process takes into account the whole child: cognition, communication, sensory, perceptual, motor, social/moral development within the context of family, school and cultural environments. Emphasis is on the use of observation and authentic assessment strategies to evaluate learning. Analyzing and interpreting assessment results to enhance learning outcomes and determine program effectiveness is also a key component of this course. In order to complete the assignments, students must have access to children.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由幼四二A、幼四二B、護四二C、休四一A互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
本課程透過攻防系統介紹與練習、團隊攻防練習、比
賽系統介紹與練習等，使學生體會排球是項有趣的團隊運動，瞭解比賽場地設備
和比賽規則。課程內容包含個人或多人的進攻與防守技術、戰術學習與運用，在
比賽中培養學生的集體行動團結合作精神，進而達到增進友誼和同學間之情感，
並享受比賽帶來的競爭與樂趣。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is through the introduction and practice of offensive-defensive 
system, group offensive-defensive practice, game system introduction and 
practice etc., to have students experience that volleyball is an interesting 
group sports, and understand game fields, equipment and the rules of game . 
Curriculum includes individual or group offensive and defensive techniques, 
the learning and application of tactics, establishing the spirit of team work 
through games so that to strengthen the friendship among classmates and 
enjoy the competition and fun with games.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 課程設計能力係屬幼兒教師、保育人員之專業能力，為提昇教保品質之基本條件。本課程旨在幫助學生建立自己的教保課程設計理念、培養實際設計課程活動之能力。主要內容包含課程之基本概念、幼兒教保課程的基礎、要素與設計發展、以及設計幼兒教保活動的主要方式。學生應能根據課堂所學及視實務機構所需，分組合力進行課程設計。
courseEngAbstract: This course deals with the theory and practice of curriculum design. Participants will learn the theoretic underpinnings which inform the practical problems of making curriculum and the how to do curriculum design. This course will begin with the curriculum rationale and then explore contemporary design models as expressed in the literature.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由幼四二A、幼四二B、護四二C、休四一A互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
利用循序漸進的教學方式，教導學生跑步的基本動作，
透過對跑步基本動作的熟練，進而提昇學生對跑步的興趣、享受跑步運動的樂趣。講授
木球運動的規則及比賽策略。強調運動員必須在規則範圍內做合法的競賽，透過跑步運
動來幫助學生守法、守分與合作的精神，並協助運動習慣的養成，期望學生能以跑步運
動作為終身運動。
courseEngAbstract:
The content of course is to instruct students’ Running skill by using 
step-by-step teaching method. Over the basic movement of the skilled is to 
enhance the students' interest in Running and enjoyment the fun of Running l. 
The rules and strategies of teaching Running to emphasize that athletes must 
be legitimate competition in the scope of the rules through the sport of Running
to help students to obey the law, be law-abiding and cooperation spirit, 
Therefor, students are expected to develop the habit of exercise and to choice 
Running as a lifetime of activity.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: The management under two years old child care service
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本系二技一般生，教室容量40人，志願選限本系四技大三和大四，第二階段開放二技選課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在了解如何規劃、經營與管理-2歲嬰兒托育服務，包括機構式的托嬰中心以及居家式托育服務。課程內容涵蓋托嬰中心及居家式托育服務的立案/登記等相關政策法令規章，其次為托育服務內容之規劃設計、安全衛生之提供、親職教育、教保人員在職進修與專業倫理等知能與良好態度之建立。本課程奠定未來生涯欲從事嬰兒托育服務者，經營與管理知能與技巧。
courseEngAbstract: The subject learning objectives are: To demonstrate a knowledge and understanding of child care service under two years old. To identify the role of an early childhood leader as a manager of a child care center.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: Skills for Infant and Toddler Care
note:
黃馨慧掛名，教室容量35人，跨域課程，志願選限本系30人(四三+四四)、第二階段加開放本系外系選課至多5人，第三階段不開放，上課時間10:10-12:40
修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上、外系二技一般生大二、外系二技進修部大二以上、外系四技一般生一般生大二以上、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本課程設計以培養學生熟悉保母實務工作內容為導向，將以講解、示範、及輔導學生練習丙級保母技術士術科科目為主，包括安全醫護區、遊戲學習區、調製區及清潔區四組考題。並安排學生至資深保母家參觀見習兩日，實際觀摩保母從事居家照顧的工作內涵。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed mainly for students to familiarize with the child care providers’ skills certification. The instructor will explain and demonstrate the skills, and supervise students practicing the skills including the following four areas: safety

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大二以上
courseAbstract: 本科目主要在探討課後照顧服務的意義與目的，主要內容兼顧理論與實務，包括課後托育的基本理念與理論基礎、課後照顧服務相關法令、兒童發展與行為輔導、課後照顧服務之課程與教學實務、課後托育服務之休閒活動設計、台灣目前課後照顧服務之現況。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to explore the meaning and purpose of after school care services. The contents are including both theory and practice, such as the basic concepts and theoretical basis of the after school care service, after school care services related laws, child development and behavior counseling, the curriculums and instructional practices of after school care services, and Taiwan’s current status of after school care services.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大二以上、本系二技一般生、教室容量40人
courseAbstract: 從肢體開發課程作為出發，延伸至聲音開發，體驗表演的基礎練習後，進而進行創作的激盪與兒童戲劇的可能。
courseEngAbstract: The course of physical development is base. The course extends voice development.After the basic practice of experience performance, it gets on the agitate of creationand possibility of children’s drama.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseName: 幼兒科學教學活動設計與實務演練
courseEngName: The Design and Practice for Children's Science-Education Course
note:
修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大三以上、本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
實習單位人數限制:修課限32人
courseAbstract:
科學概念的啟蒙與培養，應從幼兒學前教育階段為佳。但現行教育保育人
員本身科學相關知能的訓練稍嫌不足，恐怕難深談對幼兒科學活動的設計。
本課程是以幼教或幼保系學生現有的科學知能背景為考量，安排科學基礎
課程來加強、提昇學生本身相關的科學素養。另外將設計一系列可供學生發
揮並能達到幼兒科學觀念培養的相關教材，讓學生實際操作與演練。將科學
基礎課程與幼教專業實務間作一聯結，以期學生能將科學知能與態度應用於
幼教學理中。
courseEngAbstract:
The cultivation of science education should begin way before children enter
elementary school. However, nowadays many preschool teachers do not possess enough
science knowledge or acquire systematic scientific trainings for them to design and
implement appropriate science curriculum for young children. As we know, teacher’s
Teacher’ s academic code：078
attitude toward certain course subject will influence how students look at the subject,
thus will affect their leaning results and related achievement. Therefore, it will be hard
for preschool kids to be able to enjoy science learning or to engage themselves in any
type of science experiments if their teacher does not like science at all.
This project intends to help college students in the department of infant and child
care (who will be preschool teachers after graduation) learn both basic science
knowledge and the design of science curriculum for young children. Furthermore,
students will have the opportunities to explore many real-life science experiments and
to practice their skills in designing scientific experiments for young children as they
attend basic science course plus advanced curriculum design course. In addition, they
will also have the chances to observe and learn from other college students as they
participate in the integrated preschool science-learning-activity design competition.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本系二技一般生、教室容量40人
courseAbstract: 本課程之宗旨為讓學生知道蒙特梭利教學法的理論與實務之大概以及啟發學生深入學習蒙特梭利教學法的興趣。蒙特梭利教學法雖於1907年開始萌芽，經各國文化與社會變遷的洗禮，能和諧地融入各國文化與社會。台灣幼兒教育的主流教學模式為以主題為中心的單元、主題或方案課程，蒙式則以學習區的教具操作為主，目前台灣已能將主題中心教學模式與蒙特梭利的教學相互融合。本課程從整體觀的概念介紹蒙特梭利教學法的理論與實務，並說明與主題中心式教學模式融合的可能性。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of the course are understanding theory of Montessori education and to familiar with the practice of Montessori Method and integrating theme teaching and Montessori method.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 幼四三AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生了解班級經營之理論基礎與實務內容，增進學生未來從事班級教學及行政經營的知能。課程內容包括班級經營基本概念和學理依據、班級行政經營、班級環境經營、班級教學經營、班級常規輔導、班級人際關係的經營和班級危機管理等。課程設計則強調透過實際參與班級經營活動，增加學生對班級經營理念的體驗與了解，而能運用於實際工作中。
courseEngAbstract:
The purpose of the course is to development classroom management skills in preschool teachers 
to be. The positive discipline skills center in developing mutual respect, cooperation and 
responsibilities in the classroom.
Learning proper management techniques is the key to having a pre-school classroom that's 
free from chaos and confusion. The techniques that a preschool teacher uses to manage her 
classroom can have far-reaching effects, not only on a student's self-esteem and motivation to 
excel, but also on the teacher's mental well-being. For any technique to be successful, it must be 
one that resonates with the teacher so it can grow organically along with the teacher-student .

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: Teaching Materials and Methods for Young ChildrenⅡ
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 課程設計與教學能力係屬幼兒教保工作人員之專業能力，為提升教保品質之基本條件，不可或缺。衡量當今幼兒教育思潮、幼兒發展需求與社會發展狀況，本課程從統整理念出發，依據「幼兒園教保活動與課程大綱」（新課綱）之精神及內涵，幫助學生建立以幼兒為中心之幼兒教材教法觀念、培養學生實際進行幼兒教保活動之能力。主要內容包含瞭解幼兒園教學之理念與實務，認識新課綱身體動作與健康領域、語文領域、社會領域之課程目標與學習指標，以及各領域之教學內容與教學方法，包含學習區教學。學生應能根據課堂所學，設計教學活動並實施，之後進行檢討。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this course are to explore the characteristics, contents, and trends of teaching methods and materials for preschoolers. Due to the limitation of course schedule, this course will focus on six major child development aspects. The contents focus both theories and practices in this topics. Students will also be able to design different lesson plans for children in its different development stages by using what they learned in this course.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: Curriculum Models for Infant & Child Care
note: 幼四三AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在介紹並探討不同類型之教保課程模式。教保課程模式於本課程中被定義為嬰幼兒園所依循一教育理念，並將其實踐於課程與教學中而形成的一種教學與保育的模式。課程內容包含對重要教育理念的介紹，及依循不同教育理念衍生出之各類型教保模式之探討。針對各類型教保模式，探討其教育理念、對兒童看法、教學方式、教師角色、與反映在教育方法上的異同等。並就各教學模式於當前台灣幼兒園之實施現況，進行分析與評論。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to explore approaches and models related to infant and childcare.  Curriculum content includes introduction of major educational theories, and exploration of various teaching models such as the project approach and the Reggio Emilia.  When examining each teaching approach, the class will explore its educational belief, beliefs about children regarding how they learn and develop, its teaching methods, teacher’s roles, and differences from other approaches.  One aim of this course is to know the current applications of these teaching models in Taiwan.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 幼四三AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助同學瞭解在嬰幼兒保育專業領域中親職教育的重要性與內涵，讓同學有能力擬定完善的親職教育課程或活動，並能在執行時針對不同對象、場合、情境等的特殊需求有全面性的考量，以求得親職教育實施之最大成效。另外，親職教育成效之評估亦是本課程之學習重點。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this course are to help students understand the importance of parent education, and acquire knowledge regarding the implementation of parent education. At the end of this course, students should be able to both design a course packet for a parent education program according to the specific needs of certain group of parents, and evaluate results of the course.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note:
幼四三AB合班
1.修課限制:本系四技大三、二技一般生。
2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由護四二A、護四二D、幼四三AB互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選，開放全校二技一般生及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
透過身體伸展、舞蹈動作，以引導與循序漸進的方式，
搭配呼吸與身體延展的肢體動作，及強化肌耐力之動作練習，讓肌肉在練習間，
透過感知與身體達到身心平衡的狀態。透過身體實作，體驗肢體的可能性及認識
舞蹈表演藝術。以肢體開發的概念，透過舞蹈與遊戲的方式，開發身體感知能力
與使用之方式，建立對身體的了解與使用。
courseEngAbstract:
Through body stretching and dance movements, in a guided and step-by-step 
manner, combined with breathing and body extension limb movements, and 
exercise exercises to strengthen muscle endurance, the muscles can reach a 
state of physical and mental balance through perception and body during 
exercises. Through physical practice, experience the possibilities of the body 
and learn about dance performance art.Based on the concept of physical 
development, through dance and games, develop the body's perception ability 
and use methods, and establish the understanding and use of the body.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: Teaching Materials and Methods for Young ChildrenⅡ
note: 修課限制：本系四技一般生大三以上、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 課程設計與教學能力係屬幼兒教保工作人員之專業能力，為提升教保品質之基本條件，不可或缺。衡量當今幼兒教育思潮、幼兒發展需求與社會發展狀況，本課程從統整理念出發，依據「幼兒園教保活動與課程大綱」（新課綱）之精神及內涵，幫助學生建立以幼兒為中心之幼兒教材教法觀念、培養學生實際進行幼兒教保活動之能力。主要內容包含瞭解幼兒園教學之理念與實務，認識新課綱身體動作與健康領域、語文領域、社會領域之課程目標與學習指標，以及各領域之教學內容與教學方法，包含學習區教學。學生應能根據課堂所學，設計教學活動並實施，之後進行檢討。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this course are to explore the characteristics, contents, and trends of teaching methods and materials for preschoolers. Due to the limitation of course schedule, this course will focus on six major child development aspects. The contents focus both theories and practices in this topics. Students will also be able to design different lesson plans for children in its different development stages by using what they learned in this course.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大三以上、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 本課程授課方式採討論教學法，針對每週的議題，由學生 分組來報告並討論，鼓勵學生表達其想法，並對應其他學生的意見，藉由交叉比對與教師的說明，來呈現兒童社區文化與生活背後的原理與概念。
courseEngAbstract: This course discuss pedagogy teaching methods adopted for weekly issues reported by the students into groups and discuss , encourage students to express their ideas and opinions corresponding other students , and teachers by cross- matching the description , to render the children in the community principles and concepts of culture and life behind .

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大四以上、畢業班課程
courseAbstract: 從嬰幼兒特殊需要意義討論到各種不同需求的特質，進而瞭解未來願景，係本課程的重點。早期療育的基本精神在於早期發現、早期治療。在課程中透過各種發展遲緩現象的探討，並說明有關鑑定評估與安置處遇基本概念，希望能提供學生對特殊需要嬰幼兒有正確的認識。並對介入特殊需要嬰幼兒的方式與流程有所瞭解，以培養學生從事特殊需要嬰幼兒保育的興趣與熱誠。課程裡也將國內現有早期療育工作的規畫與進行情況作一完整的介紹，希望學生畢業投入早期療育工作。
courseEngAbstract: This class will introduce the theory for early intervention, the categories and characteristics of exceptional young children, the needs of the families with exceptional young children, the laws and the future about early intervention。

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生大四以上、畢業班課程、教室容量30人
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目的在使學生能將知覺動作遊戲之理論實際應用至嬰幼兒保育及幼兒園的課程設計上。課程的實施是以理論架構之介紹及實際操作應用兩者相互搭配，首先介紹知覺動作遊戲之理論基礎、嬰幼兒知覺動作之正常及異常發展，再依據知覺動作遊戲之設計及操作原則，讓學生直接至遊戲教室參與並設計知覺動作遊戲，最後再介紹特殊障礙兒童之知覺動作遊戲設計、實施原則並實際示範，以期望學生能將知覺動作遊戲理論實際應用至一般及特殊嬰幼兒之保育上。
courseEngAbstract: Babies are born to learn from experimenting the relationship between their body and the environment.  Based on the tactile and other sensory systems they are born with, this curriculum aims to help students learn how to design sensory and motor activities for parents and babies.  The various baby activities aim to build up a vocabulary of sensory experiences (e.g. visual, auditory and tactile), to enhance physical contact (massage, reflexology, touching, cuddling and rocking) and motor interaction between parents and their baby.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseName: 幼兒園行政管理與實務
courseEngName: Administration and Practice of Child Care Institutions
note: 幼四四AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大四、本所與國際蒙特梭利專班（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、外系四技一般生大四、畢業班課程、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本課程以經營管理之相關理論為依據，探討托嬰中心、托兒所（幼稚園）及課後托育中心等教保育機構經營管理之各項議題，包括管理的效益與效率、規劃機能、管理決策、人力資源管理、資訊資源管理、托育機構組織行為、領導機能、組織團隊、以及家長與社區之合作等實務探討。
courseEngAbstract: The contents of the course reflect the areas of management of preschools.  The course introduces the theories and skills of management.  By definition of management of preschools, cases studying, group discussion, role playing and presentation, students develop a professional leadership in a preschool setting.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
note: 1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「應用科學導論/科技與生活」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 以學生現有的數理、生物背景為基礎，引導學生進入科技應用的領域。現代科技進步快速，世界日新月異，學生需具備有敏銳之觀察力與學習能力，始能跟上時代之潮流。本課程將目前先進之科技作一概念性的介紹；涵蓋有太空科技、能源應用、材料科技、生物技術、資訊科技等內容，期能一窺世界之奧妙，進而引發學習新知之動機與興趣。
courseEngAbstract:
At the dawn of the twenty-first century today, as every citizen of the world should have a basic scientific concept and knowledge which can serve people to make the decisions, participate in civic and cultural affairs, and join economic production activities. Also, beside the professional expertise and technology, the most important thing for the citizens is to care about humanities, develop themselves actively, and benefit the people and serve the community.
The major purpose of this course is from the new technology of modern life to induced the students knowing the basic applied science and technique concept. From the simpler chemistry, physics and biologic technology, step by step , let students know more the world and more interesting about the new matters and new technology.
The studentswho finish this course will know the basic applied science and technology and more understanding about the world we lived.

department: 四年制嬰幼兒保育系
courseEngName: The Seminar in The Topics of Early Child Care
note: 幼四四AB合班，修課限制：本系四技一般生大四、外系四技一般生大四、畢業班課程、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本課程藉嬰幼兒教保政策與法規之介紹，使學生對嬰幼兒教保政策與我國現行教保法規之法律結構、法學理念及法律政策有一整體性的認知，以奠定專業政策與法學啟發基礎。從保育正義概念出發，就幼托合一政策之理論基礎與發展、兒童教育及照顧法政策、兒童福利法制、兒童權利公約等 ，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代幼保人員正確的幼教政策與法律觀 。並從嬰幼兒保育與法律實務的角度，點出常見的幼保兒童福利政策與法規的關連性等，以強化幼保人員對此專業問題的認識與處理能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this course are to enhance student to pay attention in early child care related problems and important issues within family, child care service institute, and society. During the course implement, the students will be the main subject; they should first to find out several contemporary problems or issues in family, child care service institute, and society by small group discussion. Then, students should make data collection and analysis, discussion and paper written, to solve the problems and issues.

department: 嬰幼兒保育系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所(隔周上課)。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生認識質性研究及其在護理上的運用。課程內容包括質性研究概念的介紹、研究設計、資料的收集與詮釋、以及報告的撰寫。本課程藉由課堂講授，輔以論文研討等方式帶領學生認識質性研究方法，並探討其在應用上的重要議題，以輔助學生在閱讀及使用質性研究方法的能力
courseEngAbstract: This course focuses on the basic of qualitative research and its applications in the nursing field. The contents of this course include qualitative respective on research, qualitative research design, qualitative data collection and analysis, and qualitat

department: 嬰幼兒保育系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所。
courseAbstract: 非營利組織經營管理之教學Target在介紹與討論管理者如何運用管理學方法去經營非營利事業，所以本課程重點有二，其一是管理者的管理機能(management function)，其二是非營利組織的業務機能(business function)。
courseEngAbstract: Non-profit Organization Management This Course have two part, Management Function and Business Function. Management Function have 4 topic：1.planning 2.organizing 3.leading 4.controling. Business Function have 4 topic：1.production management 2.marketing ma

department: 嬰幼兒保育系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進學生詮釋與應用健康科學相關之統計方法。課程設計運用實際資料分析的經驗，使學生能了解統計應用之意義，並激發學生研究之興趣。課程內容包括社會統計學之概念與方法，各類統計模式、統計分析之技術、統計圖之使用及製作、統計軟體SPSS之操作學習與資料分析之應用等。強調學生能從實際資料分析之經驗中，使其能應用適當之統計方法，解決專業上的各種研究問題。
courseEngAbstract: The course is designed to provide an education that students will understand and interest the specialty of social statistics, and foster ability for independent thinking and solving problems. This course contents include statistical graphs, summary Statistics, probability distribution, significant tests, ANOVA (one way and two way), regression analysis (simple and multiple regression), model selections, design of questionnaire, factor analysis, reliability, and nonparametric approaches.

department: 嬰幼兒保育系碩士班
courseEngName: Issues in Infant and Early Childhood Education
note: 修課限制：本所。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在引導學生深入探討嬰幼兒教育相關之重要議題。課程內容包括嬰幼兒教育理論、幼兒園課程與教學、幼兒學習評量、幼兒英語、美語教學、嬰幼兒學習環境、嬰幼兒情緒教育以及幼小銜接議題之探討。尤其重視與嬰幼兒教育相關之時代潮流及發展趨勢，期望透過本課程能讓學生對相關議題具有批判能力並建立前瞻性的觀點。
courseEngAbstract: This course intends to explore related issues in infant and early childhood education, and aims to enhance students’ independent thinking and critical ability. Course content include some educational philosophies, sociological theories, curriculum design theories, instruction theories and influences of educational policies for preschool children. Students are expected to obtain more updated perspectives in related issues.

department: 嬰幼兒保育系碩士班
note:
1.書面選課、實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
2.修課限制：本所二年級以上學生。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進學生對研究的了解並提昇其研究能力。課程內容包括：依學生個人興趣擬定方向，進行文獻的查閱與整理、發現問題、進行探究，以期能發展出具專業性及學術性之研究計畫。藉由整信課程內容的設計，培養學生邏輯思考能力。學生將可在所選的教授指導下，進行個人有興趣之專題研究。
courseEngAbstract: This course offers students opportunities to improve their research capabilities. The topics covered in this course include selecting research topics, doing literature reviews, identifying research questions, exploring problems, and developing professional research proposals. By conducting individual study of a selected topic with faculty guidance, students will improve their ability to think in a logical way and learn how to evaluate a research design.

department: 嬰幼兒保育系碩士班
note:
1.書面選課、實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
2.修課限制：本所二年級以上學生，研二以上，須通過本所論文計畫口試3個月後方可提學位考試。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目標在引導學生在嬰幼兒保育相關領域內，能對特定主題進行原創性實證研究，並作為完成碩士學位的重要工作。學生在指導教授的指導下，能建立特定的研究議題、進行嚴謹的文獻探討、選擇合宜的研究方法、符合學術專業倫理下執行研究，將研究結果撰寫論文並舉行口試。
courseEngAbstract: The primary objective of this course is to guide students in conducting original empirical research on specific topics in the field of infant and child care, fulfilling the requirements for the completion of a master's degree. Under the guidance of their advisors, students will establish specific research topics, conduct rigorous literature reviews, select appropriate research methods, adhere to academic and professional ethics, write research papers, and participate in oral examinations.

department: 嬰幼兒保育系學士後教保學位學程
note: 修課限制：本系學士後。

department: 嬰幼兒保育系學士後教保學位學程
note: 修課限制：本系學士後。

department: 嬰幼兒保育系學士後教保學位學程
note: 修課限制：本系學士後。

department: 嬰幼兒保育系學士後教保學位學程
note: 修課限制：本系學士後。上課時間：18:20-21:00

department: 嬰幼兒保育系學士後教保學位學程
note: 修課限制：本系學士後。上課時間：18:20-21:00

department: 國際蒙特梭利碩士專班
note: 修課限制：國際蒙特梭利碩士專班、不開放選課。

department: 國際蒙特梭利碩士專班
note: 修課限制：國際蒙特梭利碩士專班、不開放選課。

department: 國際蒙特梭利碩士專班
note: 修課限制：國際蒙特梭利碩士專班、不開放選課。

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseEngName: Innovation and Entrepreneurship in Healthcare Industry
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生一年級、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生一年級、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、跨域課程
courseAbstract: 本科目旨在增強學生應用行銷學理論與實務於醫護教育的推廣能力。主要內容包含：策略性行銷管理、內部分析與內外環境分析、策略性分析與策略決策、產品行銷與公共形象、行銷組合變數、促銷與行動、非營利行銷、資訊行銷與廣電媒體。透過醫護與教育訓練產學行銷的引導，達到本科目的教學目標。
courseEngAbstract: This course applies theories and practices of services marketing on the subject of health care marketing. In addition to the concepts of consumer behavior, service product positioning, and market segmentation, the 4Ps (i.e., Products, Place, Promotion, and Process) of service marketing will also be introduced in the class.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseEngName: Intelligent learning Design of Health Allied Education
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生一年級、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部
courseAbstract: 本課程目標是希望能讓同學瞭解智慧教學與學習的理論基礎與教學策略，能夠將教案轉換成與環境互動之醫護教材，並學會如何利用App、IRS、AR、VR等工具來創作醫護領域課程之教材。修完這門課之後，學生將瞭解智慧學習、智慧教學與智慧環境在醫護相關領域所需用到之資訊技術，且具備發展醫護教育智慧學習環境的技能。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the basic concept and design method of intelligent learning design of health allied education. The goal of the course is to enable students to convert lesson plans into intelligent learning environment and learn how to use App, IRS, AR and VR to create material for health care courses. After completing this course, students will have the ability to design intelligent learning environment and materials.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程以教授大學部學生具有基本應用生物統計學分析的能力。強調生物統計學之應用與醫學及護理臨床研究結合，以奠定學生具有資料收集、資料分析及統計報表解讀之能力。課程內容包括：基本機率論、機率分佈理論、統計估計及檢定(獨立樣本及成對樣本 t-test)、變異數分析(ANOVA)、相關係數以及簡單迴歸分析等。本課程將會使用 EXCEL 及 SPSS 等專業統計軟體之操作。
courseEngAbstract: The objective of this course is to provide students with the elementary knowledge and understanding of the methods of statistical analysis applicable to medical and nursing research. Also, this course is directed to equip students with basic capability of applying statistical analysis. The course is 'math-lite' emphasizing concepts and application of statistical thinking and application. Basic probability theory, parametric statistics, correlation, regression, ANOVA, non-parametric statistics along with computer package practice (SAS and SPSS) will be introduced.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論/哲學與宗教/世界文明史/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
courseAbstract: 本課程以直向生命與橫向生命為主軸，引導學子正確的認識哲學、了解宗教，並將重心放在各哲學理論與宗教義理對生命的看法上，使哲學與宗教和人生「生、老、病、死」與「我、人、事、物」等不同面向相連結，探究人的特性與價值、人生的欲望與煩惱、對錯與善惡、真善美聖等問題，再融入各種人生觀、價值觀、知識論、倫理學、道德觀、宗教觀、修行觀等，使知、情、意、行能夠融為一體，藉以培養學生自我檢視與自我成長的態度，深入且多元的思考人生種種經驗與體會，進而建立良好的哲學思惟與宗教觀念，訂立適切且自他兩利的人生目標，展開幸福健康的生命旅程。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed according to the vertical and the horizontal aspects of life. Guide students to understand the fundamental content of philosophy and religion, and focus on the various philosophical theories and religious teachings. "Birth, aging, sickness and death" and "oneself, humans, and subjects around one’s life" will be linked together in this course. The characteristics and values of human beings, human's desires and troubles, right and wrong, good and evil, and etc. will be explored. The attitudes on life, values, knowledge, ethics, morality, religion and life and death will be examined. For cultivating positive and active concept, students have to integrate his/her knowledge, feelings, and intentions. May they be happy and healthy and establish a good philosophical contemplation and religious reflection, and in an appropriate direction of life which profits both themselves and other lives through the learning of this course

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程係介紹數位教材的類型及製作這些教材之軟體工具，包括有網頁式教材、動畫式教材、演講式教材、模擬式教材、視訊式教材與電子書教材等。課程會運用實際案例來示範如何用這些工具軟體來完成數位教材, 使學生能瞭解數位教材的內涵，及具備製作數位教材之能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the classification of e-Learning materials and the software tools of making these materials, including web-based materials, animation materials, speech materials, simulation materials, video materials, e-book materials and etc. The course uses the case studies to demonstrate how to use these tools to complete the e-Learning materials. Form the course, students can have the ability to produce e-Learning materials.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生認識醫護暨數位教學設計的模式與內涵，瞭解教學評量的概念、種類及技巧，如紙筆測驗命題、試題分析、實作評量、檔案評量及臨床能力評量等，採用講述、討論、實作、分組報告等教學方式，期使學生能結合數位學習科技，實際操作與演練，完成一份醫護教育/訓練之教學設計與評量計畫。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students understand the concepts and models of teaching and the concepts, types and skills of teaching evaluation as well. For example, skills of paper-and-pencil test, item analysis, performance evaluation, portfolio evaluation and clinical competence assessment. The teaching strategies include lecturs, discussion, group project, practice and presentation. After finishing this course, students will develop a teaching/training and evaluation plan by integrating related theories and the digital learning technology in health allied education field.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseName: 數位學習系統設計與管理
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程係介紹數位學習系統所包含之組成，及設計與管理之方式。這些系統功能包括了教材管理系統、學習管理系統、教材編輯系統、視訊會議系統、電子白板、教材錄製系統，影音串流伺服器系統及SCORM等等。同學完成本課程後，就能運用這些功能設計一個好的數位學習系統，並做有效的管理。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the components of the e-learning system and how to design and management the system. The system features include material management systems, learning management systems, material editing systems, video conference systems, electronic whiteboard, materials recording systems, video streaming server systems and SCORM and so on. After completing this course, students can use these functions to design a good e-learning system, and do effective management.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseEngName: Theories and Pratice of Digital Learning
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程介紹數位學習科技領域之範疇與內涵，以及數位學習科技之研究與發展現況。主要培育對於數位學習科技領域有概括性的瞭解，並且啟發其學習 與研究動機與創意。課程內容包含數位學習之演進與趨勢、數位內容與版權管理、數位學習系統、同步與非同步網路學習活動、網路學習之學習面與教學面、電腦化測驗與評量、電腦化心智工具、適性化學習、行動與無所不在學習、遊 戲式學習等主題。在課程期間引導學生探索數位學習系統、體、載具等之開發， 以及學習社群、學習策略、學習成效等面向之議題討論。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces theory and practice of e-learning, which educate students to understand e-learning theory and practical application. The course contains the evolution and trends in digital learning, digital content and copyright management, e-learning systems, synchronous and asynchronous learning activities, computerized testing and assessment, adaptive learning, ubiquitous and game-based learning.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note:
1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育/電腦軟體整合應用/環境永續與資訊科學」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。
 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 
3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
4.上課地點:1-8週S103，9-16週F412
courseAbstract:
本課程為環境永續發展與資訊科學之教學內容，主要在闡述環境永續發展的重要性，提昇學生永續發展的覺知，結合資訊科技的應用，以具備適當資訊應用的能力，培養維護環境永續的行動技能。
課程內容涵蓋環境倫理、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、生態保育、電腦程式設計、結合環境教育主題之資訊應用等主題。教學策略運用做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境與結合電腦軟體應用等議題。
courseEngAbstract:
This course focuses on the importance of sustainable environmental development and information science. By integrating the application of information technology, this course aims to explain the importance of sustainable environmental development and to raise students' awareness of sustainable development in order to equip students with the ability to apply appropriate information technology and to develop the skills to maintain environmental sustainability.

The course covers topics such as environmental ethics, environmental change and disaster prevention, energy conservation and energy management, ecological conservation, computer programming, and information application integrated with environmental education themes. Teaching strategies include learning by doing, experiencing in real-life situations, cooperative learning methods, using sensory learning, exploring the environment, and integrating computer software applications.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseEngName: Creative project in allied health education
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 本課程採用專題導向學習模式，旨在教導學生以小組合作方式，完成一個醫護教育主題的創意作品。教學內容包括創造力與創新教學的概念、創意法則與模式、醫護教學或實務領域的創新方案、措施、策略或作品介紹，藉由提問、反思、腦力激盪、作品賞析等多元教學策略，讓學生從完成小組專題創作的經驗中，提升個人的創新、創意教學、問題解決、人際溝通、團隊合作等能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course adopts a project-based learning approach, and aims to help students create a teaching product in healthcare education. The contents include the concepts of creativity and creative teaching, creative rules and models, and introduction of innovative programs, interventions, strategies or works in healthcare education and practice. Multiple teaching strategies consist of questioning, reflection, brainstorming and appreciation of works. From the experience of going through the process of entire group project, students will enhance their individual ability of creativity/creative teaching, problem solving, interpersonal communication and teamwork.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
note:
1.第一階段志願選，僅由醫二一A、健四一A、健四一B、資四一B互相跨班選課。
2.第二階段加退選起，開放全校二技及四技一般生選課。
3.上課地點請洽體育室，一學期至多修習2門必修體育。
courseAbstract:
：課程強調的是以瑜珈觀點的力量與柔軟度訓練，及闡
明正確的伸展與訓練方式，內容包括呼吸法、放鬆與伸展概念基礎、氣功暖身及
功能性強化訓練，並以高熱能的串聯動作得到最佳的舒展，進而達到刺激新陳代
謝、強化功能性肌群、矯正不良姿勢以促進身心健康
courseEngAbstract:
This course is emphasis on improvement of strength and flexibility to stimulate 
metabolism, strengthen the muscle functional group, correct bad posture to 
promote physical and mental health by breathing, relaxation and extension of 
conceptual foundations, qigong warm and functional strengthening training 
and to high heat.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseEngName: Seminar of Human Health Issue in Media
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技一般生二年級、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、畢業班課程，前七周上課。
2.加退選至選課第二階段。
courseAbstract: 本課程的目的在應用電影具像的媒體，協助學生瞭解並感受全球與在地相關的健康議題，培養其對國際健康議題的基本概念；並藉由具體影像的呈現，引發學生思考與討論的興趣。課程主題包括文化差異、弱勢族群、環境與健康、災難與健康照護、飲食與健康照護、傳染病、失智症、罕見疾病、安樂死、醫護倫理與生命教育等議題。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide introductory content in human health issues which useful for all level of health care students who will be practicing in the era of globalization through the media. The themes introduced several international health foci, include cultural diversity, vulnerable group health, environment and health, economic, policy and health, single parents, drug abused, dementia etc. Students will be simulated to think critically about global health issues and share their experiences.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseName: 數位學習科技應用專題
courseEngName: Study on Applications of e-Learning Technology
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技一般生二年級、畢業班課程，前八周上課。
2.加退選至選課第二階段。
courseAbstract: 本課程為統整性課程，同時結合理論與實務。先實習機構進行需求評估，並先業界討論實務需求，再依實務需求內容，呈現企劃書，並確實製作作品。同學修習本課程後，能夠將數位學習的特性融入專案管理的專業中，並考量人、事、時、地、物，有效導入組織之數位學習發展為目標。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is an integrative course, it contains the planning, production, and execution of digital 
learning as a project. Successful digital learning requires rigorous and comprehensive project 
management. After completing this course, students can incorporate the features of digital learning 
into the professionalism of the project management and assist the company in effectively 
implementing the digital learning program.

department: 二年制醫護教育暨數位學習系
courseName: 醫護教育暨數位應用實習
courseEngName: Practicum of Health Allied Education and Digital Learning
multipleTeacherName: 劉一凡, 鄭夙芬, 郭倩琳, 李明忠, 宋涵鈺, 張君豪, 黃馨, 陳稚均
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生二年級、畢業班課程，第3~13周實習。
courseAbstract: 本課程設計旨在協助學生運用醫護教育與數位學習之知能於實務中。課程內容以實務運用為主，深入了解實務工作領域中有關數位學習於醫護教育運用的需求。學生需運用相關理論分析實務常見的問題及議題、識別有效的教學策略、並實際設計適當的教學媒體，透過臨床實作、反思、小組討論與分享等多元教學策略，發揮溝通合作與培養終身學習之能力，以達成本實習目標。
courseEngAbstract: The course provides students an opportunity to practice health allied education and digital learning in the institutions. The contents of this course focuses on application, students will be able to understand the needs in health allied education and digital learning. Students will apply the related theories and analyze the currents issues and problems, identify the effective teaching strategies, promote the abilities of communication collaborative and lifelong learning.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
note:
修課限制：
1.第一階段本所開放一年級名額6名。
2.第二階段開放本所一年級6名、二年級以上含外所14名。
3.第三階段開放本所一年級6名，二年級以上含外所14名。
4.是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表。
courseAbstract: 本課程以視覺化的程式語言App Inventor為學習程式設計為出發點，App Inventor 是由美國麻省理工學院(MIT)進行系統維護與開發，主要是以積木與拼湊的概念來進行程式的開發，並透過各式各樣的元件庫，即便未曾接觸過程式的學生，也能開發出強大功能的App應用程式。課程大綱主要包含：電腦系統運作概念、網路雲端環境介紹、行動裝置系統運作原理、App Inventor 開發環境、資料型態、界面(UI)設計、元件與語法、邏輯運算、流程控制、物件導向程式設計概念、專題實作等。
courseEngAbstract: App Inventor 2 is blocky and graphic programming language developed by MIT. Even non-CS students, App Inventor 2 provides a variety of components for them to develop powerful apps on mobile devices. The course aims to cultivate logic thinking with mobile device programming. Non-CS Students just learn by basic computational thinking to develop their apps step-by-step.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
courseName: 教育數據分析理論與實務
courseEngName: Educational Data Analysis Theory and Practice
note:
修課限制：。
1.第一階段本所開放一年級名額6名。
2.第二階段開放本所一年級6名、二年級以上9名，護研所5名。
3.第三階段開放本所一年級6名，二年級以上以上9名，護研所5名。
4.是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表。
courseAbstract: 本課程結合大數據與醫護教育，增進學生對於教育數據分析之觀念與實務。課程內容分為二大範疇，一為教育數據分析方法，包含大數據、資料挖掘、人工智慧等觀念介紹與議題探討，一為教育數據分析實務，包含資料來源、資料建模、資料處理與資料視覺化等技術操作與實務應用。學生修習完本課程能夠將數據分析方法與技術應用於醫護教育相關數據，提昇醫護教育數據資料分析的能力與效率。
courseEngAbstract: This course integrates big data analysis and education to enhance students' concepts and practices for educational data analysis. The course content is divided into two categories. One is educational data analysis methods, including big data, data mining, and artificial intelligence, and the other is educational data analysis techniques, including data sources, data modeling, data processing, and data visualization. After completing this course, students will be able to apply data analysis methods and techniques to educational related data, and improve the ability of education data analysis.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
courseEngName: Research Methods and Design in Nursing
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程的內容訓練學生如何做一個科學性的研究，必須有一套訓練的方法，舉凡在如何尋找問題，如何解決問題，如何搜集資料，如何分析資料等都需要有一套嚴謹的方法論，最後介紹研究報告、論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to provide the research methods in social and behavioral science, and to facilitate the students’ scientific attitude and research ability in problem solving. The major contents include: identification of research problems, research designs, sampling, and ethical considerations of experimental research, surveys, and case study, action research, qualitative methods, data analysis and interpretation, proposal and thesis writing, etc. This course begins to explore the related elements of quantitative and qualitative research designs. Also, critiquing published research-paper and writing a practical research proposal are required. Students are required to choose a topic in health allied education to do their proposal.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在學習超媒體(hypermedia) 的素材製作，包含文案(text)、圖像(image)、語音(audio)、視訊(video)，教導學生利用各種素材作文案編輯、圖像處理、語音合成及視訊剪輯，進而編撰成影音光碟DCD教學教材與HTML電腦網頁。
courseEngAbstract: The course is aimed to learn to use text, image, audio and video hypermedia files with computer software. The students can integrate those files to produce E-learning material and streaming media on their web site.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
courseName: 醫護教育與訓練需求評估
note: 修課限制：本所
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在教導學生了解醫護教育與訓練需求評估的目的、重要性及需求評估的方法（定義問題/目的、適當選擇需求評估的方法、發展基本的需求評估的工具、收集及分析需求評估的資料、報告需求分析的結果），並完成一份醫護教育與訓練之需求評估專案報告。
courseEngAbstract: This purpose of this course is to teach students the objectives, importance, and methods of training needs assessment. The methods include defining problems and goals, selecting optimal methods, developing basic tools, collecting and analyzing data, and reporting results. After finishing this course, students will fully understand variety of curriculum design and make a professional report of needs assessment in educational training by their own.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進學學生對研究的趣及提牛研究的能力，主要的學習經驗包括：邏輯推理思考、發現問題、文獻查閱和研究設計。透過學理和批判性的討論，以增進學生對研究主題可行性評估的能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to advance students , interesting and abilities in independent study. The main learning experiences including logical thinking, finding problem, review literature and research design. Through lecture and critical discussion, students will learn how to evaluate their research design.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
courseName: 統計資料管理與分析策略
courseEngName: Data management and statistical analysis in medical research
note:
修課限制：
1.第一階段開放本所二年級6名。
2.第二階段開放本所二年級6名，三四年級以上9名。
3.第三階段開放本所二年級6名，三四年級以上9名。護研所5名。
courseAbstract: 本課程透過課程講授、實際練習操作統計套裝軟體及實例研討等方法，著眼於資料管理與統合各種量性資料分析方法之實務操作，目標在於提昇學生管理與分析統計相關資料之能力。課程中將運用 SPSS 統計套裝軟體來學習以下統計資料管理與分析策略，如建立資料檔案並進行資料檔案之增刪、編輯與修改；著手分析健康照護相關之研究資料、繪製資料圖表；運用描述性與推論性統計策略；撰寫研究資料之分析結果。
courseEngAbstract:
The objective of this course is to provide students with practical applications of bio-statistical methods by running the SPSS statistical software. Two sample data (depression data and factor analysis data) in the health related agendas will demonstrate and analyze effectively. Major topics and headings will include (1) overview of SPSS statistical software, (2) data arrangement (3) descriptive statistics, (4) analysis of variance, (5) simple regression analysis and correlation, (6) multiple regression analysis and correlation, (7) category data analysis,
(8) logistic regression analysis, and (9) repeated measurement based on the applied consideration of medical science. The advance ability toward the management of quantity data will be the core of teaching plan and interactive procedure. The aims of this course are to promote and reinforce students actually understand the whole-spectrum of basic statistics and its practical directions.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
note:
修課限制：
1.本所二年級6名、雙數周上課。
courseAbstract: 學術論文寫作主要協助學生培養縝密的思考及良好的寫作組織能力。教學重點，包括學術寫作的基本原理及結構、 句子段落寫作、文章連貫性，以及學術寫作最常運用的寫作方法，同時搭配適當的討論與寫作練習，架構研究問題、形塑研究假說、收集並歸納研究議題相關之背景知識與現存之科學證據，進而對於現有之科學證據進行系統性之評析與回顧，評斷先前所提出之臨床問題之合宜性，並以科學原則修正。希望能透過課程設計，幫助學生練習寫作策略與技巧，引導學生基於上述之科學原則以符合學術研究倫理之方式適切的撰寫學術文章
courseEngAbstract: This course aimed at guiding the class attendants to formulate practical problems into study propositions and hypothesis with the emphasis on scientific and logical principles. The primary teaching focus includes the basic principles of academic writing and structure,sentence paragraph writing, article coherence, and most commonly used writing methods in academic writing. Through the curriculum design, we will help students to practice writing strategies and skills and guide students to familiarize the fundamental requirement of thesis writing.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生獨立完成一份專業研究。學生在輔導教授的協助下，經驗一次研究過程，包括計劃的撰寫、執行、分析與解釋，並統整成一份可書面發表之報告。
courseEngAbstract: This program aimed to help the students to accomplish a professional research independently. Under the assistance of their instructors, students shall experience the processes of research including the composition, execution, analysis and interpretation of a proposal, and combine into a report for written presentation.

department: 醫護教育暨數位學習系碩士班
courseName: 醫護教育與數位學習創作實務
courseEngName: Innovative Practice in Allied Health Education and Digital Learning
note: 修課限制：本所二年級以上、雙數周上課
courseAbstract: 本科目旨在協助學生了解創新醫護教育的概念與策略，透過文獻導讀、創作評析、創作方案規劃、創作成果發表等學習活動，使學生發展對醫護教育議題或問題解決的創意性思考能力，進而能將創意運用於醫護教育暨數位學習領域，以作為未來從事相關工作或研究之基礎。
courseEngAbstract:
This course is designed to help students understand the concepts and strategies of innovative 
education through the learning activities of literature reading, critique of innovative teaching 
designs, planning of innovative educational programs, and implementation of students’ creative 
works. The students are expected to develop their creative thinking and problem-solving 
competencies, which can be applied to the field of allied health education and digital learning as the 
foundation for their future works and careers.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技一般生、本系二技進修部。
2.外系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、學士後（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）。
courseAbstract: 流行病學為公共衛生領域中之基礎科學，它也是一門結合科學與藝術的學科，在科學的用途上，流行病學藉著嚴謹的觀察或介入性的實驗來描述疾病的發生、探討疾病發生的危險因子與致病的作用機制進而促進疾病的防治。本課程的內容將從講述流行病學的定義與歷史開始，課程內容的設計在期中考前主要以介紹衛生統計方法、疾病群突發的調查、疾病診斷與篩檢、以及描述性流行病學的介紹。在下半學期課程主要以介紹流行病學的方法學為主，最後本課程將會介紹研究設計與蒐集研究資料的實務方法。本課程將以課堂講述為主，在學期中也會有數次的隨堂測驗與作業來評估學生的學習成效。
courseEngAbstract: Epidemiology is a fundamental science of public health. Its function is to identify and describe patterns of disease occurrence, and evaluate potential determinants of disease in order to prevent disease occurrence. This course provides an introduction to the fundamental definitions, concepts, and methods used in epidemiology. The first half of the course will include topics of vital statistics, the parameters of measuring disease frequency, and screening instruments. Later, the course will mainly focus on the validity and reliability issues in epidemiology, and study design including ecologic design, case-control, cohort studies, and randomized clinical trials. The goal of this class is to train students with the ability to conduct epidemiological study and to correctly interpreting the study results from epidemiological investigations.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
multipleTeacherName: 高千惠, 陳姿伶, 魏秀靜
note:
修課限制：
1.跨域課程。
2.與護理系二技合開，志願選即開放護理系二技一般生選課，名額：助產系二技一般生26名。
3.本系二技一般生、本系二技進修部。
4.護理系二技一般生、二技進修部（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）。
5.外系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、學士後（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）。
courseAbstract: 本課程設計乃藉由健康照護、性與生育、心理諮商、醫療與法律的相關知識理論為基礎，探討人類的性、愛與健康生活，探討人類的與性、愛與健康照護議題。並能分析和運用性、愛與健康的知能，發展實際及理性態度，與促進自己及服務對象之性健康。
courseEngAbstract: The course integrates the biological and psychological sexual health, reproductive health, counseling, legal, and ethical realities of life and waves them together in a rich tapestry called Human sexuality. The aims of this course are designed to encourage thoughtful sexual decision making, promote sexual well-being, and prevent sexual health problems. It will help student explore the sexuality issues, such as physical development, promotion of sexual health, prevention of disease, affection, interpersonal relationships, and sexual health care. A combination of activities and discussion offers students the opportunity to discuss possible outcomes of caring for a person’s sexual needs in the context of human health.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
courseName: 母乳哺育臨床實務運用 II
note:
1.與進修助二一甲合開。
2.修課限制：本國本所（研究生下修不計入畢業學分）、本系二技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、、外系二技進修部、學士後（是否列入畢業學分請參照入學年課程科目表）。
courseAbstract: 本課程設計旨在讓學生運用諮詢溝通技巧處理母嬰於母乳哺育相關問題，並練習以PICO詢問臨床母乳哺育相關問題、搜尋回答問題之最佳證據、練習評讀隨機控制研究、判斷證據等級及提出臨床決策建議；並認識服務於不同場域的泌乳諮詢專家之角色功能及面臨的倫理議題。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide students practicing consulting and communication skills to support and manage mothers’ and their children’ breastfeeding problems. Practicing PICO processes to ask breastfeeding related problems, to acquire evidence-based research studies, to appraisal RCT studies, and to provide suggestions for clinical decision. The role and functions of international lactation consultant in different workplace and its ethical issues related to practice were also introduced.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
multipleTeacherName: 高千惠, 高美玲, 周雪棻, 陳姿伶
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本國本所（研究生下修不計入畢業學分）、維持十八週課程。
courseAbstract: 此課程為培育學生發展助產專業能力的第二階段課程，整體助產學課程架構旨在強調助產師的角色功能，課程內容包括以家庭為中心的取向，促進和維持低危險妊娠婦女和其家庭成員的健康，及實施生產階段婦女、新生兒和家庭的健康管理。助產學及實作II的課程著重在助產師於待產、生產及產後過程的角色及其功能、親善生產的核心概念、維持正常分娩的照護措施，觀察及評估產後婦女在生理及心理方面的變化及調適，並能提供產後婦女及其家庭文化適切的健康照護。
courseEngAbstract: These series midwifery courses are designed to prepare students for specialization in midwifery practice. The core concepts include: (1) women and family-centered approach to care; (2) promotion and maintenance of health for women and the family during low risk child bearing and the child rearing periods; (3) conducting health management for the women in labor and the family; and (4) promotion of health for childbearing stage women. Midwifery and practice II emphasizes on the role and function of midwives during intrapartum and postpartum periods, core concepts of mother-friendly childbirth, intrapartum biopsychological assessment and care practices, facilitating normal childbirth practices. Assessing of postpartum family needs and provide individualized, culturally-appropriated as well as family-centered care.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本國本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在訓練學生對於身體評估之知識與技巧。課程目標強調週產期婦女身體評估技術之正確性與完整性，教學策略將針對不足之學理進行澄清與討論，各項評估技巧則藉由示教及分組練習，使學生能有系統執行懷孕期、待產中、產後期婦女，以及新生兒常用的身體評估，並應用於婦嬰護理實務工作。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to improve students the knowledge and skills of physical assessment. The objective of the course is to emphasize the correctness and completeness of physical assessment techniques. By teaching and grouping exercises to make students familiar with the skills of physical assessment, and applied to the maternal-child care practice. .

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
courseEngName: Introduction to Midwifery and Women Health Research
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本國本所（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。
courseEngAbstract: This course is an introductory course on midwifery and women health research.  Students will have the opportunity for a systematic investigation of a health-related topic of the student’s interest demonstrating knowledge and skills of research methodology.  This course provides students step by step guidance of the research process as well as the critique of in-progress and completed research.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
multipleTeacherName: 周雪棻, 陳姿伶, 陳莉莉
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本國本所（研究生下修不計入畢業學分）。
courseAbstract: 本課程由婦女為中心的健康點出發，由不同的論點探討社會因素、文化因素、環境因素、健康政策是如何影響婦女健康，以及了解婦女角色、婦女心像、性別角色與婦女健康的相關性，進而由婦女生命週期與生涯規劃探討婦女身心變化及健康相關議題。期待學生能跳脫傳統的生理醫學模式，以更寬廣的視野及整體性的概念檢視婦女健康相關議題。
courseEngAbstract: This course examines the diverse social, cultural, psychological, developmental and biological factors that affect women's health status and health promotion during their different life stages. The course specifically considers how these diverse factors interact with gender regarding women's health. Developmental and other transitions that affect women's health trajectories are also considered.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
courseName: 教學原理與健康照護實務
courseEngName: Teaching Principles: the application in health care practice
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本國本所（研究生下修不計入畢業學分）。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生基本的教學能力，使學生能運用教學的原理進行個人或團體等服務對象健康指導之教學過程。同時讓學生體認教學在健康照護實務中的功能，並培養學生對教學的興趣與應有態度。學生修習本課程中必需實際完成學習對象評估、教學計畫的擬定、執行、與評值。課程內容包括教學在健康照護相關實務中之角色功能、教與學原則、教學設計、學習評估、擬定教學計畫、各種教學方法、教學媒體與資源、教學評值。
courseEngAbstract: This course will assist students to develop basic competencies in health teaching for individuals, families, and communities. The interdisciplinary nature of health teaching, theories of teaching and learning, and their applications in client education, clinical teaching of students and staff development will be thoroughly discussed. Actual student teaching project will be developed, implemented, and evaluated.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
multipleTeacherName: 周竹宜, 楊志貞, 周雪棻
note:
1.實習課程，寒假提前開課，實習期間：112.12.25~113.1.11(W1~W4)、113.1.15~113.1.30(W1~W5)，實習時間詳見教學計畫。
2.修課限制：本系二技一般生二年級，先修課程：助產學及實作(二)、助產學實習(一)。
3.畢業班課程。
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在協助學生發展助產專業照護的能力，統整並能運用相關學理，增進照護低危險的孕產婦及其家人的助產照護實務能力，實習內容於產房實施待產婦護理、胎兒分娩、產婦和新生兒即刻身體評估及護理及執行產後期照護。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this clinical course are designed to provide the students with a variety of clinical experiences （DR and postpartum units） in order to enhance their midwifery knowledge base. It also provides the opportunities for students to provide nursing care to the childbearing family during the intrapartum, and postpartum periods.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
note:
1.實習課程，實習期間：113.02.19~113.04.15，實習時間詳見教學計畫。 
2.修課限制：本系二技一般生二年級。
3.先修課程：助產學及實作(三)、助產學實習(一)。
4.畢業班課程。
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在協助學生發展助產專業照護的能力，統整並能運用相關學理、實務經驗及研究於低危險的孕婦及其家人的助產照護業務，本課程也強調溝通及協調的能力，實習的內容包括對低危險孕產婦的由產前、生產、產後的持續性照護、不孕症婦女照護及高危險妊娠孕產婦的持續性照護。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this clinical course are designed to provide the students with a variety of clinical experiences （OPD, BR, DR, and postpartum units） in order to enhance their Midwifery, childreading/childbearing knowledge base. It also provides the opportunities for students to provide nursing care to the childbearing family during the antepartum, intrapartum, and postpartum periods.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
note: 1.第二階段開放修習「當代藝術導論/哲學與宗教/世界文明史/邏輯概論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。畢業班，密集後7週，上滿36小時。
courseAbstract: 本課程以現代性的概念，貫連二十世紀至當前的藝術潮流發展，探討當代藝術的幾個重要流派、特性與不同面向，呈現藝術發展的獨特性與創造性。培養藝術涵養及建立個人對審美的主體觀，並瞭解當前社會藝術文化脈動，對當代的文化思潮有其見地，以開展學生發展自我潛能，並將藝術融入生活，提升生命境界。。
courseEngAbstract: This course employs the concept of modernity as a framework to establish connections between the evolution of artistic trends from the 20th century to the present day. The course delves into various significant genres, characteristics, and different aspects of contemporary art, thereby highlighting the distinctiveness and creativity of artistic development. The objective of this course is to cultivate artistic appreciation, establish personal aesthetic perspectives and comprehend the prevailing social and cultural trends in art. The course further aims to enhance students' capacity for self-growth, integrate art into their daily lives, and elevate their overall living experience.

department: 二年制護理助產及婦女健康系
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、畢業班課程、維持十八週課程。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在強化學生綜合助產實務應用的能力，提升臨床情境的判斷與解決問題的能力。內容係以助產學情境模擬演練與評測。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to enhance students’ midwifery competence. Students could learn to apply critical thinking and nursing process to identify women’s health problems and implement feasible nursing interventions to meet the needs of women during simulation and Objective Structured Clinical Examination (OSCE).

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
note: 修課限制：本國本所、本國外所(是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表)。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生認識質性研究及其在護理上的運用。課程內容包括質性研究概念的介紹、研究設計、資料的收集與詮釋、以及報告的撰寫。本課程藉由課堂講授，輔以論文研討等方式帶領學生認識質性研究方法，並探討其在應用上的重要議題，以輔助學生在閱讀及使用質性研究方法的能力
courseEngAbstract: This course focuses on the basic of qualitative research and its applications in the nursing field. The contents of this course include qualitative respective on research, qualitative research design, qualitative data collection and analysis, and qualitat

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
note:
1.實習課程。
2.實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
3.維持十八週課程。
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在協助學生發展專業助產的能力，統整並能運用相關學理，增進助產臨床照護低危險妊娠經驗，實習內容於婦產科門診實施產前檢查、身體評估、健康指導、子宮頸抹片檢查、產後檢查等。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to prepare nurses for specialization in midwifery practice. The application of knowledge gained from the lecture into the midwifery care of the low risk and high-risk woman and family is the focus of the practicum. Management ability, communication, and negotiation are also the focus of the course. The situation of the practicum includes OPD in OB-GYN, Postpartum ward, and nursery.

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
note:
1.實習課程。
2.實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
3.維持十八週課程。
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在增進學生發展助產專業照護的能力，統整並能運用相關學理、進而展現專業知能於服務對象之照護、發揮助產專業角色、展現合宜溝通技巧與助產實務技能、克盡職責及自我導向學習。實習的內容包括對低危險孕產婦的由產前、待產生產、產後的持續性照護及高危險妊娠孕產婦的持續性照護。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to promote students’ competence for specialization in midwifery practice. It includes to develop midwifery knowledge and bring to take care women and their family, to show the midwives’ role, functions, communicational and midwifery skills. In addition, students could provide care to low risk and high risk women duing pregnancy, labor and delivery, and postpartum.

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
note: 修課限制：本國本所。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提升學生對護理專業質疑的能力、解決問題的能力和批判性思考能力。主要學習經驗包括護理專業現況的質疑、邏輯推理的練習、文獻的查證和組織、研究的設計、研究計畫的書寫等活動。學生藉著與產官學界的先進討論與主題相關的課題，以增進對研究主題可行性的評估能力。
courseEngAbstract: Methods and strategies applicable to nursing research will be examined and evaluated. Criteria will be presented to review research for scientific and clinical merits. The major focus of the course will be the participation of the student in all phases of the research process using a computer to simulate data or to help in the analysis an actual data set.

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
multipleTeacherName: 高千惠, 高美玲, 周雪棻
note:
1.先修科目：進階護理助產學I。
2.修課限制：本國本所。
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在協助學生發展專業助產的能力，強調高危險妊娠與家庭之護理，及助產士的角色，學生能統整、分析、批判相關學理於實際的助產護理業務中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to prepare nurses for specialization in midwifery practice. The high-risk pregnancy family care and the nurse-midwife’s role are the focus of this course. The student will integrate, analyze, and apply theory to the restoration of health in families experiencing health deviations during the childbearing and childrearing period.

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
courseName: 進階護理助產學實習 I
note:
1.實習課程。
2.實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
3.修課限制：本國本所，先修課程：進階護理助產學 I 。
4.維持十八週課程。
※未具助產師者需先修或同時修護理助產學實習(一)、護理助產學實習(二)。
courseAbstract: 此課程要旨在於增進學生照顧孕產期婦女及其家人的臨床專業能力，包括生育及其他健康問題，學生在此課程中將選擇與孕產期婦女健康相關主題，有組織的統整、應用並驗證相關的理論及研究於臨床實務，同時學生必須針對所選擇的孕產期婦女議題及護理應用，發展基本護理概念架構。契約學習是臨床教學的主要策略。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in midwifery care of women during the childbirth process. In this course, students are required to select a problem or an issue discussed in the seminar and completes the nursing process through integration and application of the theories for selected women during childbirth process in appropriate clinical settings. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomenon involving women and its implications in nursing. Problem solving and critical thinking skills of students will be enhanced by employing the learning contract teaching strategy in the course.

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
note:

courseAbstract: 專題研究
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to assist the student’s independent research ability in completing of master thesis. With the advisor’s help, the students should experience the research process on an academic basis. The contents include research motivation and purpose, literature review, research design, data collection and analysis.

department: 護理助產及婦女健康系護理助產碩士班
courseName: 統計資料管理與分析策略
courseEngName: Data Management and Statistical Analysis in Medical Research
note:
1.與護研所合開並同時開放護研所選課。
2.修課限制：本國本所、本國外所(是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表)，本課程需先修過研究方法論、高等生物統計學。
courseAbstract: 本科目於教學設計上，乃著眼於資料庫管理與統合各種量性資料分析方法之實務操作，目標在於提昇學生管理與分析統計相關資料之能力。課程中將運用SPSS統計套裝軟體來學習以下統計資料管理與分析策略：1)建立資料庫檔案並進行資料庫檔案之增刪、編輯與修改；2)著手分析健康照護相關之研究資料、繪製資料圖表;3)運用描述性與推論性統計策略;4)撰寫研究資料之分析結果。整體而言，選修本課程之學生，將透過課程講授、實際練習操作統計套裝軟體及實例研討等方法，落實學習統計資料之管理與分析。
courseEngAbstract: The objective of this course is to provide students with practical applications of bio-statistical methods by running the SPSS statistical software. Two sample data (depression data and factor analysis data) in the health related agendas will demonstrate

note:

2.實際上課時間及地點請洽授課教師。
3.修課限制：本國本所二年級以上學生，先修課程：進階護理助產學 II、進階護理助產學實習 I。
4.維持十八週課程。
courseAbstract: 此課程要旨在於增進學生照顧孕產期婦女及其家人的臨床專業能力，包括生育及其他健康問題，學生在此課程中將選擇與孕產期婦女健康相關主題，有組織的統整、應用並驗證相關的理論及研究於臨床實務，同時學生必須針對所選擇的孕產期婦女議題及護理應用，發展基本護理概念架構。契約學習是臨床教學的主要策略。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to assist students continuing to build on their clinical expertise in selected childbirth women care area. Students apply the selected theories to clinical situations on an operational basis is emphasized. By selecting an area of interest, students are required to demonstrate the role functions of an advanced midwifery in appropriate clinical settings. Students develop advanced midwifery roles, specifically, in client care and support, staff development, management and research. Students continuing to increase their professional competence in women health evidence-based practice

note: 修課限制：全英語授課、本所
courseAbstract: The purpose of the course is to advance students' physical assessment theory and skills that related to professional clinical nursing practice. The content of the course is emphasized on application skills of client interview, physiological and psychological assessment, interpreting results in women throughout the life span. Applying theories and techniques, assessing, analyzing and diagnosing health problems of a selected client will accomplish the course objectives.
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to advance students' physical assessment theory and skills that related to professional clinical nursing practice. The content of the course is emphasized on application skills of client interview, physiological and psychological assessment, interpreting results in women throughout the life span. Applying theories and techniques, assessing, analyzing and diagnosing health problems of a selected client will accomplish the course objectives.
