Students could learn to apply critical thinking and nursing process to identify clients’ health problems and implement feasible nursing interventions to meet the needs of clients during simulation and Objective Structured Clinical Examination (OSCE).

department: 四年制護理系
multipleTeacherName: 潘婉琳, 林姝含, 林秀華, 林瑛釗, 謝秀容, 蕭偉伶, 舒婉娟, 官千意, 蕭筑棋, 李姵萱, 李穎俐, 蕭孟蘋, 林秀玟, 李榮芬, 王靜慧, 蘇瑞源, 盧淑芬, 蕭世美, 鄒怡真, 熊道芬, 張昭容, 曲幗敏, 陸嘉玲, 陳美蓉, 張峰玉, 黃詩婷, 劉建宏, 李偲瑋, 古雪貞, 李玉霞, 陳思佳, 鄭雅靜, 胡曉珍, 宋翠葉, 吳秀娟, 劉士榳, 林麗卿, 王淑卿, 施淑鳳, 周瓊慧, 蔡淑珍, 許馨心, 張宜華, 范曉雯, 陳柑伴, 賴宜芳, 蘇美禎, 王美華, 涂明香, 陳貞秀
note: 實習期間：02/21-04/02，修課限制：實習課程、本系四技一般生大四、畢業班課程、修課名單由護理系實習辦公室提供
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生整合並運用專業護理相關之知識與技能，於護理實務工作中，透過連續性且全時臨床護理實習，增加學生職場就業機會及提升工作適應能力，以奠定學生從事臨床護理工作的基礎。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to develop students’ clinical competence in hospital settings. Within the practicum, students will be trained to integrate and apply nursing theories, related knowledge, and skills in daily nursing practice. The training contents include practicing nursing routings, writing nursing records, familiar with nursing staff job descriptions, and participating in managing emergency situations. Students are expected to provide evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized nursing care based on assessment. Students will also be trained to communicate and cooperate with other medical team members, and to provide patients and their families health education and consultation. Students are also encouraged to actively participating in clinical and ethical issue discussions.

department: 護理系博士班
note: 修課限制：本所國內博士班、跨校10人、程式設計課程
courseAbstract: 本課程著眼於博士層級之量性資料分析理論與實務。主要是由以下課題：測度理論、廣義線性模式、抽樣分配、模型建立、高等相依資料處理等，選取適當課題，探討目前資料分析方法、實用觀念以及可行之技巧及工具，引導學生操作或使用SPSS和SAS等分析工具。透過本課程之講授和練習，可讓學生具備對介入性研究以及護理量性資料的分析能力，進一步能夠評估研究設計及相關推論之效能，並運用於研究與實務之專業上。
courseEngAbstract: The focus of this course is applied statistical techniques, with emphasis on general linear model, sampling theory, model testing, longitudinal data analysis and multivariate analysis through the Statistical Package for the Social Sciences (SPSS) and the statistical analysis system (SAS). This course will complete weekly computer assignments that provide "hands on" experience with data analysis and interpretation of results. Students will actually understand statistical procedures and apply statistical techniques to concrete data.

department: 護理系博士班
multipleTeacherName: 魏秀靜, 林惠如, 邱秀渝
note: 修課限制：本所國內博士班
courseAbstract:
此課程主要為質性研究方法論之介紹與練習，學生能了解質性研究之發展，典範
與方法論，進而能運用質性研究練習收集資料，分析資料及批判質性研究，期使
學生能有執行質性研究之專題經驗。課程內容包含：質性研究之典範，紮根理論，
現象學，各類質性研究之比較，質性研究之收集資料，分析資料，嚴謹度，批判，
撰寫等。
courseEngAbstract:
This course critically examines diverse qualitative approaches applied in research.
The discussion emphasizes on philosophical bases of qualitative inquiries, whereas
the analysis focuses on paradigmatic nature of qualitative approaches in contrast to
quantitative approaches. The class presents sampling and a variety of data collection
procedures; discusses issues on rigor; explores methods of analysis appropriate to the
data; and considers ethical issues associated with each stage of the research. Students
are expected to complete a qualitative project.

department: 護理系博士班
multipleTeacherName: 謝佳容, 林惠如, 梁淑媛, 王采芷, 陳妙言
note: 01/19寒假提前上課。修課限制：實習課程、本所國內博士班
courseAbstract:
本課程旨在提供護理系博士班學生於健康或相關機構獲得實務或研究經驗。過程中
提供學生機會藉由熟識臨床實務問題，分析和詮釋目前護理科學之發展，參與相關
之實證或實務活動。
courseEngAbstract:
This course aims to provide nursing doctoral students to obtain clinical or research
experiences at health related institutions. Based on familiar with clinical issues, students will
analyze and interpret the current development of nursing science, involve the related practice.

department: 護理系博士班
note: 修課限制：本所國內博士班博二以上
courseAbstract:
本課程主要在強化學生教學能力，是護理教育師資培育主要的起始點，課程內容包
含(1) 分析課程發展的理論與過程；(2) 綜述及分析護理教育的演進及議題，來檢視護
理教育者的角色與功能；(3)反思創意教學的策略與相關議題。本課程教學方法是強調自
我導向、創意及批判性思考之能力培育。
courseEngAbstract:
This course examines the role of the nurse educator in both academic and health care settings.
Curriculum development is analyzed, discussed, and evaluated. It could reflect current
learning theory, technology, healthcare delivery systems, social issues, and trend, and
evidence-based studies.

department: 護理系博士班
multipleTeacherName: 謝佳容, 魏秀靜, 吳孟嬪
note: 修課限制：本所國內博士班博二以上
courseAbstract: 0領導統馭與決策模擬旨在協助學生利用問題處理和Team building 能力，以提升健康照護領域之管理者與領導者之效能，本課程藉由實務領導與管理之案例分析、研究領導者與管理者之領導風格、策略與決策、問題處理、組織文化、變革管理、衝突管理、醫療體制、醫療保險制度、與Team building之相關議題，讓學生演練與模擬領導統禦與決策之能力。
courseEngAbstract: The course utilizes a leadership competency framework to integrate knowledge, skills, values, and best practices of innovative nursing leadership. Lectures, interactive, collaborative discussion, written projects and leadership self-assessment will identi

department: 護理系博士班
courseName: 介入性與臨床試驗研究方法論
courseEngName: Design and Analysis of Nursing Intervention Studies
multipleTeacherName: 李慈音, 梁淑媛, 王采芷
note: 修課限制：本所博士班博二以上
courseAbstract: This course is designed to familiarize students with theory-driven nursing intervention reearch and clinical trials, including design, conduct, analysis and interpretation of results. Topics will include commonly used designs, methods for randomization, blinding and sample size determination, choice of controls, collaborative/ multicenter trial requirements and operational issues, data management and data quality issues, interim analysis methods, critical review of clinical trial results, ethics considerations and statistical techniques for analyzing clinical trial and nursing intervention data.
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to familiarize students with theory-driven nursing intervention reearch and clinical trials, including design, conduct, analysis and interpretation of results. Topics will include commonly used designs, methods for randomization, blinding and sample size determination, choice of controls, collaborative/ multicenter trial requirements and operational issues, data management and data quality issues, interim analysis methods, critical review of clinical trial results, ethics considerations and statistical techniques for analyzing clinical trial and nursing intervention data.

department: 護理系博士班
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授，修課限制：本所國內博士班、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，依據博士生未來護理專業發展方向，引導學生探索護理實務相關之研究議題，進行相關理論及照護模式之分析，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，與產官學界等多方領域先進之討論，訂定研究方向及主題，擬定研究設計、進行或完成研究計畫之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is conducted through individualized instruction and is designed to guide doctoral students in exploring research topics relevant to their future nursing professional development. It involves the analysis of pertinent theories and care models, integration of their clinical expertise, application of critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, and engagement in discussions with experts from various sectors including academia, industry, and government. The course aims to help the student determine his/her research direction and topic, formulate research designs, and initiate or complete the writing of a research proposal.

department: 護理系博士班
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授，修課限制：本所國內博士班、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，依據博士生未來護理專業發展方向，引導學生應用相關核心概念，發展護理相關理論及照護模式，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，確認研究主題及設計、完成博士論文研究計畫之書寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is structured as individualized instruction, tailored to the doctoral student’s future development in the field of nursing. It guides the student to apply relevant core concepts, develop nursing-related theories and nursing care models, integrate his/her clinical expertise, employ critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, and confirm his/her research topic and designs. It culminates in the completion of a written research proposal for his/her dissertation.

department: 護理系博士班
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授，修課限制：本所國內博士班、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，旨在協助博士生以臨床實務或護理專業發展為基礎，應用相關理論、照護模式及研究能力，執行研究計畫，進行資料分析、研究成果報告發表及博士論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is structured as individualized instruction with the aim of assisting the doctoral student who is building upon his/her clinical practice or nursing professional development. It emphasizes the application of relevant theories, nursing care models, and research skills, the execution of research projects, data analysis, publishing of the results of studies, and the writing of his/her dissertation.

department: 護理系博士班
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授，修課限制：本所國內博士班、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，旨在協助博士生以臨床實務或護理專業發展為基礎，應用相關理論、照護模式及研究能力，執行研究計畫，進行資料分析，完成博士論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is conducted through individualized instruction with the objective of assisting the doctoral student who is building upon his/her clinical practice or nursing professional development. It focuses on the application of relevant theories, nursing care models, and research skills, the execution of research projects, data analysis, and the completion of the dissertation.

department: 護理系碩士班護研老人組
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（成人組、老人組、婦女組、精神組、社區組、兒童組、護資組、專師組、中西醫組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生對資料庫設計及其應用有基本概念，瞭解資料庫的基本概念、資料庫分析與設計的理論基礎及其使用軟體工具，藉由實際撰寫資料庫設計程式，能瞭解資料庫系統具有資料管理功能，同時也介紹資料庫管理系統於護理實務領域的應用狀況，讓學生體認資料庫設計概念於健康及護理實務領域的重要性。
courseEngAbstract: This course will foster the student to have the basic concept of the database design and application. This course will assist students to understand the basic concepts of database systems, the theoretical basis of the analysis and design database and the application of software tools. Through the practice writing the program language of design database, students would understand database systems have data management functions. Also introduces database management system application status in the field of nursing practice. Through this course, students can recognize the concept of database management systems on the importance of the healthcare and nursing practice field.

department: 護理系碩士班護研成人專科組
multipleTeacherName: 謝雨珊, 王采芷, 簡靜慧
note: 01/15寒假提前上課。修課限制：本所碩士班（專師組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育成人專科護理師學生具備照護急性住院病人常見健康需求之進階知識與技能，並加強其對對專科護理師角色、功能與執業議題之瞭解。課程強調運用批判性思維與實證醫學和護理，以建立適當之健康問題診斷、處置和評價照護結果之學習。透過講述、學生課堂導讀、案例分析、小組討論、角色扮演、影片情境分析與數位平台討論等多元教學策略，訓練學生批判性思維考、溝通與自學能力，並培養學生具備成人專科護理師入門所需之知識與技能，使其能以專科護理師的角色提供急性住院病人適切之進階護理照護。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides the student with in-depth knowledge of common clinical situations in acute care setting. The role and function of the acute care nurse practitioner will be integrated throughout the course. Emphasis is on the utilization of critical thinking and evidence-based practice to formulate diagnoses and management and evaluation plans of care for physiologically unstable adult patients who have health problems, and are at high risk for developing complications. The focus is on the management of specific system problems of acute care. This course provides students with fundamental knowledge necessary to deliver advanced nursing care in acute care settings.

department: 護理系碩士班護研成人專科組
courseName: 成人專科護理實習 I
multipleTeacherName: 謝雨珊, 王采芷, 簡靜慧
note: 01/15寒假提前上課。修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（專師組）
courseAbstract: 本實習課程旨在培育成人專科護理師學生，照護急性住院病人常見健康需求，展現入門之專科護理師角色與功能，應用進階之護理知識與技能於提供病情單純之成人病患照護，並對專科護理師常見之執業議題有初步瞭解。實習強調運用批判性思維與實證醫學和護理，以建立適當之健康問題診斷、處置和評價照護結果於所照護之個案。透過實習契約書之訂定、實習指導教師與實習教學教師的共同輔導、實習日誌、個案報告、互動記錄、鑑別診斷形成與問題解決過程報告、與實習心得的完成，以確保學生的實習經驗，至實習結束每位學生將至少照護十位內外科常見之急性住院病人，以培養學生具備成人專科護理師入門所需之知識與技能，使其能以專科護理師的角色提供病情單純之急性住院病人適切之進階護理照護。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides the student to apply knowledge of advanced nursing management in acutely ill adults. Emphasis is on the utilization of critical thinking and evidence-based practice to formulate diagnoses and management and evaluation plans of care for physiologically unstable adult patients who have health problems, and are at high risk for developing complications. The focus is on the management of specific system problems of acute care. This course provides students to apply fundamental knowledge necessary to deliver advanced nursing care in acute care settings.

department: 護理系碩士班護研老人組
multipleTeacherName: 陳妙言, 林惠如, 謝佳容, 簡翠薇, 柯莉珊
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（老人組）
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在透過對老人老化及疾病相關之病理、生理、心理、情緒及靈性需求之理論、研究與議題研討，增進學生老人照護的臨床專業能力。學生需統整及應用老人疾病照護、經濟、主要照顧者、社會、組織、資源整合、臨終照護等理論研究於臨床實務中，發揮個案照護之功能，並需針對特定議題完成方案以展現其老人臨床照護專家的角色及功能。
courseEngAbstract: This course in designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in the nursing care of healthy aging population with specified health problems. Theories, research, and issues relevant to normal developmental transitions and changes in aging will be discussed. Emphasis is placed on physiological, psychological, family-social-cultural-environmental, spiritual, and functional aspects related to nursing interventions with the healthy aging population. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomenon involving healthy aging and its implication in nursing.

department: 護理系碩士班護研老人組
courseName: 老人健康照護實習 I
courseEngName: Health Care of Elderly I - Practicum ( 144hours )
multipleTeacherName: 陳妙言, 林惠如, 謝佳容, 簡翠薇, 柯莉珊
note: 01/15寒假提前上課，修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（老人組）
courseAbstract: 此實習旨在透過對老化及疾病相關之生理、病理、心理社會及靈性需求之理論、並配合應用口述歷史進行老人生命回顧之研討，學生需同時統整及應用老人疾病照護、主要照顧者、社會組織、資源整合、臨終照護等理論於臨床實務中，發揮個案照護之功能。學生並透過自我導向之學習，於醫療照護機構及社區情境中完成獨立提供老人連續性健康照護，以期展現老人照護專業角色功能及實務能力。
courseEngAbstract: This course in designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in the nursing care of healthy aging population with specified health problems. In this course, students are required to select a problem or an issue discussed in the seminar, and complete the nursing process through integration and application of the theories for selected clients in appropriate clinical settings. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomena involving aging and its implications in nursing. Problem solving and critical thinking skills of students will be enhanced by the teaching strategy in this course.

department: 護理系碩士班護研兒童組
multipleTeacherName: 李慈音, 林芳怡, 黃秀玫, 李美銀, 王凱微
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（兒童組）
courseAbstract: 本課程在協助學生發展兒童健康照護之進階護理能力。內容強調兒童於成長環境中危險及保護因子的評估，及身體評估、諮詢、教育、溝通、照護決策等相關進階能力之培養。由發展、家庭、環境等相關理論的角度，引導同儕關懷並深入探討出生至青春期住院兒童的相關健康議題；學生藉由自我主導學習統整學理及實證研究運用於住院兒童照顧實務上。
courseEngAbstract: This course focuses on two populations, the families with children at risk and the families with hospitalized children. Through the research findings of different approaches, such as risk and resilience, development, family, and ecology, students will expand their views to assess the child’s environment and the related health issues. Advanced professional competence in the care of the pediatric population will be highly emphasized in this course.

department: 護理系碩士班護研兒童組
courseName: 兒童健康照護實習 I
multipleTeacherName: 李慈音, 林芳怡, 黃秀玫, 李美銀, 王凱微
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（兒童組）
courseAbstract: 本課程著重在提供住院病童與其家庭之進階健康照護。學生針對所選擇服務對象的健康議題，運用相關理論、學理及研究並執行個別性照護；經由實務操作體驗進階護理師諮詢、教育及照護決策等之角色功能。學生須自我主導學習並統整學理及實證研究運用於住院兒童照顧實務上。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in the care of at-risk children and hospitalized children. Students are required to select an interested area. Through the synthesis of theories and evidence based research findings, students will apply the advanced nursing skills to their clients. The practices of self-directed learning, problem solving and critical thinking skills are highly expected in this course.

department: 護理系碩士班護研老人組
courseEngName: Research Methods and Design in Nursing
multipleTeacherName: 陳妙言, 林梅香, 吳桂花
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（成人組、老人組、社區組）、本所碩士班研二以上（重修生不限組別）
courseAbstract: 本課程的內容訓練學生如何做一個科學性的研究，必須有一套訓練的方法，舉凡在如何尋找問題，如何解決問題，如何搜集資料，如何分析資料等都需要有一套嚴謹的方法論，最後介紹研究報告、論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: Methods and strategies applicable to nursing research will be examined and evaluated. Criteria will be presented to review research for scientific and clinical merits. The major focus of the course will be the participation of the student in all phases of the research process using a computer to simulate data or to help in the analysis an actual data set.

department: 護理系碩士班護研精神組
multipleTeacherName: 李坤黛, 魏秀靜, 賴倩瑜
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（精神組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育學生具有（1）人文關懷涵養；（2）進階精神衛生護理師專業知能，包括照顧、溝通、專業及自我成長、管理等能力。主要學習經驗包括進階精神疾病個案護理經驗、個人和團體心理治療、治療性環境經營管理等；（3）引導學生進行批判性及自我導向之終生學習歷程，藉著整合自己之精神衛生護理之學理和臨床經驗，增強照護個案治療的知能，以及與醫療團隊的溝通協調。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of the course are (1) to develop person-center nursing care; (2) to have advanced psychiatric-mental health knowledge and skills, including those of nursing, communication, specialty, self-growth, management, etc. (The major learning experiences include those of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, individual and group psychotherapy and management of treatment environment, etc.)；(3) to guide students to critique and self-directed learning in order to associate with psychiatric-mental health knowledge and clinical experiences, to develop knowledge and skills of nursing, to practice crisis intervention and to promote communication and coordination of medical teams.

department: 護理系碩士班護研精神組
courseName: 精神衛生照護實習 I
courseEngName: Practicum on Advanced Psychiatric Mental Health Nursing (I)
multipleTeacherName: 李坤黛, 魏秀靜, 賴倩瑜
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（精神組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生熟悉進階精神衛生護理專業知能之實務情境。學生的主要學習經驗為運用進階精神衛生護理及相關理論提供個案護理，包括病人之整體性評估、協助鑑別性診斷、擬定及執行照護計畫、執行個別及團體心理治療、監測評估藥物治療、一般性精神衛生照護、與醫療小組成員協調聯繫有關病人之照護問題等，以達成本課程的目標。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of the course are (1) to develop person-center nursing care; (2) to have advanced psychiatric-mental health knowledge and skills, including those of nursing, communication, specialty, self-growth, management, etc. (The major learning experiences include those of advanced psychiatric mental health nursing, individual and group psychotherapy and management of treatment environment, etc.)；(3) to guide students to critique and self-directed learning in order to associate with psychiatric-mental health knowledge and clinical experiences, to develop knowledge and skills of nursing, to practice crisis intervention and to promote communication and coordination of medical teams.

department: 護理系碩士班護研成人專科組
multipleTeacherName: 謝雨珊, 簡靜慧, 王采芷
note: 01/15寒假提前上課。修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（專師組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育成人專科護理師學生，具備病情嚴重病人急性醫療照護之進階知識與技能，並加強其對對專科護理師執業議題之瞭解。實習課程強調運用批判性思維與實證醫學和護理，以建立適當之健康問題診斷、處置和評價照護結果於所照護之個案。透過實習契約書之訂定、實習指導教師與實習教學教師的共同輔導、個案報告、臨床照護指引與實習心得的完成，以確保學生的實習經驗，至實習結束每位學生將至少照護十位內外科病情嚴重病人，以培養學生具備成人專科護理師所需之知識與技能，使其能以專科護理師的角色提供病情嚴重之急性醫療病人適切之進階護理照護。
courseEngAbstract: The course is a continuum of the clinical practicum for adult health nursing I. The purposes of the course are (1) to train students’ competencies in assessing, diagnosing, examining, and managing common medical and surgical health problems, (2) to facilitate students’ consultation ability for emotional responses of acute ill patients, (3) to cultivate students’ case management ability, (4) to increase students’ communication and collaboration to achieve excellent care, and (5) to be familiar with ethical and legal issues affecting NP practice in Taiwan.. Within the practicum, student will demonstrate actual roles and responsibilities of an acute care nurse practitioner.

department: 護理系碩士班護研老人組
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（成人組、老人組、婦女組、精神組、社區組、兒童組、護資組、專師組、中西醫組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生認識質性研究及其在護理上的運用。課程內容包括質性研究概念的介紹、研究設計、資料的收集與詮釋、以及報告的撰寫。本課程藉由課堂講授，輔以論文研討等方式帶領學生認識質性研究方法，並探討其在應用上的重要議題，以輔助學生在閱讀及使用質性研究方法的能力
courseEngAbstract:
This course focuses on the basic of qualitative research and its applications in the
nursing field. The contents of this course include qualitative perspective on research,
qualitative research design, qualitative data collection and analysis, and qualitative
research reporting, etc. The major issues for utilizing qualitative research methods will
be also discussed in this course. Lecture and discussion will be used as the teaching
strategies. Students will be able to read and apply qualitative research critically.

department: 護理系碩士班護研老人組
multipleTeacherName: 梁淑媛, 葉美玲, 鍾美玲, 王凱微
note:
修課限制：護研所碩士班（成人組、老人組、婦女組、精神組、社區組、兒童組、護資組、專師組、中西醫組）、外所（是否列入畢業學分，請參照入學年課程科目表）
其中108學年(含)入學前之成人組、老人組、婦女組、精神組、社區組、兒童組、護資組、專師組之學生修習，須於拿到成績後辦理抵免「實證健康照護與應用」
courseAbstract: 本課程主要協助學生瞭解護理之實證研究與實證實務，期使學生能在實證之理論與研究上有所認識，而應用於臨床有關健康照護，以增進學生健康照護之護理實證實務能力。課程內容包含實證相關之理論與研究以及實務層面，例如臨床決策之評量、質量性研究之評量、實證研究問題之發展、發展搜尋策略、研究品質之評量、發展實證護理研究計畫等。
courseEngAbstract:
This course provides students to have the concepts of evidence-based nursing for research and
practice in healthcare. The major focus of the course encompasses the understanding of the issues
about evidence-based research and practical application through the participation, presentation, and
discussion in the class.

department: 護理系碩士班護研社區組
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授。修課限制：本所碩士班（社區組一般生）、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，依據碩士生之護理專長背景及未來專業發展方向，引導學生探索相關核心概念、理論，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，訂定研究方向及主題，擬定研究設計、完成研究計畫之書寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is delivered in an individualized format, tailored to the nursing specialization and future professional development of the master's student. It guides students in exploring relevant core concepts and theories, integrating their clinical expertise, applying critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, determining research directions and topics, and developing research designs, culminating in the completion of a research proposal.

department: 護理系碩士班護研資訊組
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授。修課限制：本所碩士班（護資組一般生）、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在幫助學生對未來論文撰述之相關議題做更深入完備之探討。課程中，學生必須與該專業領域相關專長之教師共同訂訂學習契約並透過輔導達成學習目標。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to help students to gain knowledge related to an identified research topic. The student will be evaluated based on the pre-arranged learning objectives in the learning contract.

note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授，修課限制：本所碩士班（護資組一般生）、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，旨在協助碩士生以臨床實務為基礎，應用護理理論及研究能力，執行研究計畫，進行資料分析，並完成研究成果報告及碩士論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is structured as individualized instruction, aiming to assist the master's student in utilizing clinical practice as a foundation. It focuses on the application of nursing theory and research skills, the execution of research protocol, data analysis, and the completion of research outcome reports and the master's thesis.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
note:
1.修課限制：學士後、本系四技三年級以上、本系二技一般生。
2.此為學士後護理系「實證健康照護」課程先修條件，建議選修。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與批判技能，了解理論與知識之建立依據，並建立應用研究科學方法探索解決健康照護實務問題之基本概念，在實作課程中學生經由研究文獻批判之討論，提升對護理實務現象之研究質疑，進而能了解各類研究設計及相關之研究信效度等基本概念，提升團隊合作、克盡職責、批判性思考等能力，並反思臨床實務所面對之情境或問題。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides students with the foundation of nursing research. Steps in the research process are introduced. This course prepares students to explore and solve problems regarding to scientific underpinnings of nursing research. A major emphasis of this course is to increase students' ability to formulate nursing research questions, to understand basic concepts such as research design and research-related reliability and validity, as well as to enhance students’ ability in teamwork, dedication, and critical thinking, and to reflect the contributions of research to advance nursing knowledge and practice.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
courseName: 內外科護理學與實作 I
multipleTeacherName: 謝雨珊, 黃慧芬, 簡靜慧, 陳貞秀, 江慧珠
note:
1.授課期間：02/19-06/21，實際授課時間詳見教學計畫。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選、維持十八週課程。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後、本系四技二年級以上。
4.技術練習：W2(6-7節)，S408教室。
courseAbstract: 本課程目的為增進學生照顧住院內外科疾病個案的護理知識，瞭解個案因疾病、檢查及治療所產生的生理、心理及社會的行為反應，培養運用批判性思考及護理過程，在實作課程中進行整體需要評估，確立健康問題，依個別需要，計劃和執行可行的護理措施，以提供內外科疾病個案之整體性護理，並認識未來臨床護理實務發展趨勢。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to enhance students’ nursing knowledge and skills for hospitalized clients with medical and surgical conditions. Students could learn to apply critical thinking and nursing process to identify clients’ physiological, psychological, and social behavioral responses related to disease, diagnostic tests, and treatment in nursing lab. After health problems are identified, students will make individualized care plans and feasible nursing interventions to meet the needs of clients. In addition, students could better understand the trend of clinical practice.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
multipleTeacherName: 劉桂芬, 余芮瑩, 黃馨, 張書璇, 徐珮倚, 王佩珊, 許碧芳, 林英
note:
1.實習課程，實習期間：寒假實習01/17-01/31(W1-W5)。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後、本系四技二年級以上。
courseAbstract:
本課程培養學生具有護理專業之基本知識與技能。
實際運用基本護理所學之相關學理技術於臨床情境中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to help students to apply and practice basic nursing knowledge in clinical setting. Through this course, students can assess and intervene in the common health problems of adult clients. Students are also expected to observe health team in communication and coordinative activities. Meanwhile, they can realize the profession role of nursing care setting, and share with themselves feelings and role adjustment in clinical setting.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
courseEngName: Clinical Practice of Maternal-Newborn Nursing Care
note:
1.實習課程，實習期間：05/22-06/21(W3-W5)；06/24-07/19(W1-W5)。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後、本系四技三年級以上。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生有關孕期、分娩及產後的婦女及家庭真實的臨床護理情境，使學生能融合婦嬰照護的知識、技能與態度，完成護理過程並展現專業能力。
courseEngAbstract: The purposes of this climical course are designed to provide the students with a variety of clinical experiences (OPD,BR,DR, and postpartum units) in order to enhance their childrearing/childbearing knowledge base.It also provides the opportunities for students to provide nursing care to the childbearing family during the antepartum. intrapartum.and postpartum periods.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
note:
1.授課期間：02/21-05/17，實際授課時間詳見教學計畫。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後、本系四技二年級以上。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生婦嬰照護的專業能力，課程內容強調正確臨床決策、不傷害的概念、以服務對象為中心的人際互動、護理指導、婦嬰實務及尊重文化差異等。課程結構以運用模擬情境為主，透過情境教學討論培養學生分析、綜合、批判、思考、創意等能力，並能於虛擬情境中融合婦嬰照護的專業知識、技能與態度完成護理過程。
courseEngAbstract:
The purpose of this course is to assist the students having the professional abilities of Maternal-Newborn nursing Care which including precious decision-making, client-centered interrelationships, nursing direction, clinical practice and respecting cultural differences. 
The structure of this course is emphasized on the modified clinical situation where the students could generate the knowledge, skills, and attitude related to Maternal-Newborn Nursing Care to apply nursing processes and perform the professional abilities in helping woman and her family to adapt the processes of pregnancy and childbirth. The contents include: 
1. Family-centered maternity nursing care,
2. Physical assessment,
3. Childbirth education,
4. Child-parental attachment, 
5. Breast feeding, and
6. Culture and birth.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
courseEngName: Clinical Practice of Community Health Nursing
multipleTeacherName: 黃秀麗, 李慧貞, 蘇美禎, 陳明宜, 王詩晴
note:
1.實習課程，實習期間：05/22-06/21(W3-W5)；06/24-07/19(W2-W5)。各梯次實習時間詳見教學計畫。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後二年級以上、本系四技三年級以上。
courseAbstract: 學生能於實習過程中進行家庭的健康問題評估、分析影響家庭健康問題的因素並協助家庭處理健康問題；能進行社區或群體評估並發現社區或群體健康問題，以期整合社區資源，達到促進及維護個人、家庭、團體和社區健康。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide community health services based on the diverse perspectives. The course includes the theoretical framework of community health nursing.primary health care system. community health assessment, diagnosis and intervention. characteristic and health promotion of human developed stage, family assessment and nursing, chronic physical health problem, impact of culture to community health nursing,environmental influence on community health, and long term care. In the end of the course, students may provide integrated individual and family care and be aware of community health problems, and use the community resource to achieve community development.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
courseName: 社區衛生護理學與實作
note:
1.授課期間：2/21-3/29周三至周五AM，4/3-5/17周三至周五PM，實際授課時間詳見教學計畫。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後二年級以上、本系四技三年級以上。
courseAbstract: 本課程以社區為導向之社區衛生護理相關概念，以奠定學生從事社區衛生護理工作的基礎。透過共同參與、團體互動、增進彼此溝通，培養其社區健康評估的知識及實作能力，期望學生能向下紮根做好個案及家庭護理，向外能敏銳的發現團體及社區健康問題，以期整合社區資源，達到促進及維護個人、家庭、團體和社區之整體健康。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide community health services based on the diverse perspectives. The course includes the theoretical framework of community health nursing, primary health care system, community health assessment, diagnosis and intervention, characteristic and health promotion of human developed stage, family assessment and nursing, chronic physical health problem, impact of culture to community health nursing, environmental influence on community health, and long term care. In the end of the course, students may provide integrated individual and family care and be aware of community health problems, and use the community resource to achieve community development.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
note: 修課限制：學士後二年級、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生三年級。
courseAbstract: 本課程目標在協助學生獲得實證健康照護相關的知識與技能。課程以執行實證五步驟為架構，內容包含:介紹實證健康照護概念、提出實證可以回答的臨床問題(PICO)、文獻資料庫與搜尋最佳證據、評析文獻與實證護理應用。實作方面包含:運用學習小組練習以PICO詢問臨床問題、搜尋回答問題之最佳證據、練習評讀隨機控制研究、判斷證據等級、提出臨床決策建議及閱讀系統性文獻回顧文章。
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to introduce evidence-based practice in Healthcare and strengthen knowledge and skills of evidence-based nursing for nursing students. Course contents include foundational concepts of evidence-based practice, concepts of systematic review and clinical guideline, PICO, searching for the current best evidence, methodology appraisal, and analyzing data. Students will have the opportunity to practice skills of using PICO to ask answerable clinical questions, searching the evidence and assessing quality of a randomized controlled trial, levels of evidence, and reading articles of systematic review.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
note: 修課限制：學士後、本系四技四年級重修生、本系二技一般生二年級以上。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生未來能順利的適應職涯的環境，透過討論、講授、參與職涯講座、資料搜尋、自學及分組報告等方式，認識台灣各層級醫院、優質護理職場之條件、職場相關議題和護理新鮮人可能面臨的問題，進而協助學生能有適當的選擇就業職場。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to guide and prepare students for the practicum of obtaining nursing employment. Through lecturing and discussion, students will be familiar with the purposes and agendas of the practicum, and knowing how to prepare themselves in advance to facilitate their learning during the practicum. Through the preparation of the course, students are expected to be able to integrate and apply nursing theories, related knowledge, and skills in nursing practice. In together with the practicum for obtaining nursing employment, this course is aimed to develop students’ clinical competence in providing evidence-based, individualized, and prioritized nursing care.

department: 護理系學士後學士班(學士後護理系)
note:
1.授課期間：113/02/21-03/29(W3、W4、W5 PM)/113/04/03-05/17(W3、W4、W5 AM)，實際授課時間詳見教學計畫。
2.核心課程網路退選書面加選。
3.修課限制：護理系學士後二年級以上、本系四技三年級以上。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育四年制學生具備人文關懷涵養、精神衛生護理的專業基礎知能，並引導學生進行案例分析，運用批判性及自主學習歷程，進行實務情境演練，以具備執行精神衛生護理的基本知識及實務技能。
courseEngAbstract:
This course aimed to provide students with basic psychiatric nursing knowledge, situational practice and skills. The content emphasize on the human behavior including five dimensions. They are the physical dimension, the emotional dimension, the intellectual dimension, the social dimension, the spirit dimension and their inter-dynamic relationship. Human being is not only interacting with environment, but also adjusting by themselves. Mal-adaptation may influence the occurrence of mental state disorder.
The content of this course include the development of psychiatry and mental health nursing, the basic psychiatric nursing concepts, the psychiatric nursing assessment, the therapeutic communication, the therapeutic nurse-patient relationship, the nursing care of mental disorders and their treatment, introduction to child, adolescent and gerontology nursing, the role and function of the psychiatric nurse, the nursing care of chronic mental illness patient and community mental health nursing.

department: 國際護理博士班
note:
"修課限制：
1.全英語授課 This class is taught in English.
2.不開放跨校 Not open to students from other universities."
courseAbstract:
Biostatistics plays an essential role in all stages of a quantitative health care research from design through to analysis and interpretation. This course covers the essential principles and methods required for a Ph.D. degree. During this Advanced Biostatistics course, students will build on the basic statistical skills they gained in introductory statistics courses and learn to apply more advanced techniques to real data. Emphasis is on study design, appropriate analysis, software (SPSS) application and interpretation of results. The underlying concepts of statistical analysis are covered. Sessions include lectures and practical work, both computer-based and using small workshops for discussion.
Statistical analyses will be performed using SPSS and Excel. Microsoft Word is required for all written assignments (output from SPSS and Excel should be copy/pasted into Word).
courseEngAbstract:

This course covers the essential principles and methods required for a Ph.D. degree. During this Advanced Biostatistics course, students will build on the basic statistical skills they gained in introductory statistics courses and learn to apply more advanced techniques to real data. department: 國際護理博士班
multipleTeacherName: 林惠如, 魏秀靜, 邱秀渝
note:

courseAbstract: 此課程主要為質性研究方法論之介紹與練習，學生能了解質性研究之發展，典範 與方法論，進而能運用質性研究練習收集資料，分析資料及批判質性研究，期使 學生能有執行質性研究之專題經驗。課程內容包含：質性研究之典範，紮根理論， 現象學，各類質性研究之比較，質性研究之收集資料，分析資料，嚴謹度，批判， 撰寫等。
courseEngAbstract: This course critically examines diverse qualitative approaches applied in research. The discussion emphasizes on philosophical bases of qualitative inquiries, whereas the analysis focuses on paradigmatic nature of qualitative approaches in contrast to quantitative approaches.  The class presents sampling and a variety of data collection procedures; discusses issues on rigor; explores methods of analysis appropriate to the data; and considers ethical issues associated with each stage of the research. Students are expected to complete a qualitative project.

department: 國際護理博士班
multipleTeacherName: 王凱微, 盧玉嬴, 黃慧芬, 賴倩瑜
note:
"1.全英語授課 This class is taught in English.
2.不開放跨校 Not open to students from other universities."
courseAbstract: This course aims to provide nursing doctoral students to obtain clinical or research experiences at health related institutions. Based on familiar with clinical issues, students will analyze and interpret the current development of nursing science, involve the related practice. In this course, students engage in a 144-hour advanced practicum in theory-guided practice in a selected domain of nursing. Concurrently, students participate in two seminars to present the progress of practicum and clinical experiences, and the theoretical and evidence based nursing care model.
courseEngAbstract: This course aims to provide nursing doctoral students to obtain clinical or research experiences at health related institutions. Based on familiar with clinical issues, students will analyze and interpret the current development of nursing science, involve the related practice. In this course, students engage in a 144-hour advanced practicum in theory-guided practice in a selected domain of nursing. Concurrently, students participate in two seminars to present the progress of practicum and clinical experiences, and the theoretical and evidence based nursing care model.

department: 國際護理博士班
courseName: 介入性與臨床試驗研究方法論
courseEngName: Design and Analysis of Nursing Intervention Studies
multipleTeacherName: 梁淑媛, 李慈音, 王采芷
note:
"修課限制：
1.全英語授課 This class is taught in English.
2.不開放跨校 Not open to students from other universities."
courseAbstract: This course is designed to familiarize students with theory-driven nursing intervention research and clinical trials, including design, conduct, analysis and interpretation of results. Topics will include commonly used designs, methods for randomization, blinding and sample size determination, choice of controls, collaborative/ multicenter trial requirements and operational issues, data management and data quality issues, interim analysis methods, critical review of clinical trial results, ethics considerations and statistical techniques for analyzing clinical trial and nursing intervention data.
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to familiarize students with theory-driven nursing intervention research and clinical trials, including design, conduct, analysis and interpretation of results. Topics will include commonly used designs, methods for randomization, blinding and sample size determination, choice of controls, collaborative/ multicenter trial requirements and operational issues, data management and data quality issues, interim analysis methods, critical review of clinical trial results, ethics considerations and statistical techniques for analyzing clinical trial and nursing intervention data.

department: 國際護理博士班
courseName: 進階護理實務統計與應用
courseEngName: Advanced Statistic Approaches and Applications in Nursing Research
note:
"修課限制：
1.全英語授課 This class is taught in English.
2.不開放跨校 Not open to students from other universities."
courseAbstract: 隨著護理研究的現代化發展，如何根據臨床資料計算出一些有意義的數據，並利用這些數據去推論與瞭解事實，進而有助做出正確的推論與建議。本課程之目標係希冀培養學生護理量化研究之進階實務能力，進而具備現代化護理數量方法之全面觀。 課程設計將著重於數量實務模擬，針對特定主題選定適當模式完成分析，得到有效支持探討主題之結論。課程內容方面涵蓋中介變項回歸分析、交互作用分析、統合分析、多層次臨床資料分析、臨床試驗、預測與評估等多種分析技術。此外，並配合文獻標竿學習、實例個案討論報告，期使學生能夠瞭解應用方向與方式。
courseEngAbstract:
The focus of this course is on nursing and health related research traditions, the relationship between modern statistic paradigms and research designs and how various breakthrough statistics have been used by nurse researchers.  Advanced assumptions, developments, limitations, and advantages of modern statistic approaches in the context of clinical nursing phenomena will be addressed.
We emphasize the applications of nursing statistic methods and introduce matrices as they appear and show how they simplify the presentation of nursing research models and techniques. Statistical packages (such as SAS, SPSS) provide the numerical results to complex analysis.

department: 國際護理博士班
note:
"修課限制：
1.全英語授課 This class is taught in English.
2.不開放跨校 Not open to students from other universities."
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，依據博士生未來護理專業發展方向，引導學生探索護理實務相關之研究議題，進行相關理論及照護模式之分析，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，與產官學界等多方領域先進之討論，訂定研究方向及主題，擬定研究設計、進行或完成研究計畫之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is conducted through individualized instruction and is designed to guide doctoral students in exploring research topics relevant to their future nursing professional development. It involves the analysis of pertinent theories and care models, integration of their clinical expertise, application of critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, and engagement in discussions with experts from various sectors including academia, industry, and government. The course aims to help the student determine his/her research direction and topic, formulate research designs, and initiate or complete the writing of a research proposal.

department: 國際護理博士班
note:

courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，旨在協助博士生以臨床實務或護理專業發展為基礎，應用相關理論、照護模式及研究能力，執行研究計畫，進行資料分析、研究成果報告發表及博士論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is structured as individualized instruction with the aim of assisting the doctoral student who is building upon his/her clinical practice or nursing professional development. It emphasizes the application of relevant theories, nursing care models, and research skills, the execution of research projects, data analysis, publishing of the results of studies, and the writing of his/her dissertation.

courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，依據博士生未來護理專業發展方向，引導學生應用相關核心概念，發展護理相關理論及照護模式，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，確認研究主題及設計、完成博士論文研究計畫之書寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is structured as individualized instruction, tailored to the doctoral student’s future development in the field of nursing. It guides the student to apply relevant core concepts, develop nursing-related theories and nursing care models, integrate his/her clinical expertise, employ critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, and confirm his/her research topic and designs. It culminates in the completion of a written research proposal for his/her dissertation.

courseEngAbstract: This course provides students with fundamental knowledge necessary to deliver advanced nursing care for adults and children. This course aims to increase students' understanding of the major concepts and related theories of advanced practice nursing. The focus is on the management of specific care issues relevant in adult and children. The roles and function of the advance practice nursing will be integrated throughout the course. Through lectures, discussions, and reports, students will expand their knowledge and competency in managing common health conditions of adults and children complementary to the essence of advanced nursing practice.

courseEngAbstract:
This course is aimed to increase students' understanding of the major concepts and related theories 
of advanced practice nursing. The focus is on the management of mental health issues as well as the 
community health. The course will provide students with fundamental knowledge necessary to 
deliver advanced nursing care for clients with mental health conditions as well as for clients in the 
community settings. The roles and function of advance practice nurses will be integrated throughout 
the course. Through lectures, discussions, and reports, students will expand their knowledge and 
competency for managing common mental health issues and community health by integrating 
evidenced-based nursing and their clinical experiences.

courseAbstract: 本課程主要探討健康照護及日常生活中，人們所使用的物品及環境的實務設計創作，透過人因工程之介紹與護理實務所發現之問題結合，以分組討論與設計製作的方式，讓健康照護需求透過設計探討將之落實，期使理論能與實務相互結合外並希望藉由跨學門之不同經驗與專長解決健康照護職場之相關健康照護設計。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides students to have the concept and practice of well-being design for health care and daily living. The major focus of the course encompasses: the concepts of Ergonomics and health care, and the practice of well-being design. Students pr

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專成人組

note: 02/05、02/16寒假提前上課，修課限制：本所碩士班（成人組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進學生照護成人健康之護理專業能力。成人病患常見的健康問題之臨床實務面，學生須統整並運用所學之內外科護理學、生理病理學、病因學、臨床診斷學、身體評估以及管理學等相關理論。藉由整合學理和臨床實務，學生能增強成人個案照護與治療等相關的學理，且能展現醫療團隊的溝通協調，以達成本課程的目標。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to advance the clinical professional competence in acute care setting. Students will be able to apply knowledge and theories of medical-surgical nursing, patho-physiology, etiology, clinical diagnosis, physical assessment, and management. Application of theories into clinical practice and coordination of health care team effectively to manage adults’ health problems will accomplish the course objectives.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專成人組
courseName: 成人健康照護實習 I
courseEngName: Health Care of Adult I - Practicum ( 162 hours )
multipleTeacherName: 李梅琛, 林梅香, 梁淑媛, 邱秀渝, 張靜芬, 梁惠玉
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（成人組）
courseAbstract: 本實習課程目的在增進學生照護成人個案之專業能力。實習中，學生將針對成人健康照護之相關主題，有組織、有系統的應用並驗證相關理論、研究、教育於臨床實務。學生在實習中能展現進階護理師的角色與功能，並完成相關方案，以達成本課程之目標。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of the course is to advanced clinical professional competence of students in acute care setting. Within the practicum, student will focus on issues that related to adult care, organizing and systemically applying and examining theories, research, education, and counseling in advanced practice. The course objectives will be accomplished by demonstrating advanced practice roles and competence in completing a related project, demonstrating advanced practice roles and competence in completing a related project.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專社區組
multipleTeacherName: 張淑芳, 徐淑貞, 吳桂花
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（社區組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在引導學生進入社區，由個人、家庭、團體等層面來瞭解其健康理念及行為，並藉此協助學生發展其進階的社區健康專業能力。本課程強調以社區相關之知識、理論及研究做為學生未來實際操作之基礎。
courseEngAbstract: The course is designed to guide the students to enter the community, and understand the health beliefs and behaviors from individual, family and aggregate perspectives. This will serve as foundation for the advanced practice in community. The course emphasizes on the community related knowledge, theories, and researches as the bases for student’s future practice in community

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專社區組
courseName: 社區衛生照護實習 I
multipleTeacherName: 張淑芳, 蘇美禎, 徐淑貞, 吳桂花, 許智皓, 李慧貞
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（社區組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在協助學生應用社區護理的理論與模式於真實社區情境中。學生在課程結束時須能獨力完成社區評估、確認社區健康需求或診斷，並能排定健康需求的優先次序，統整社區資源並能與社區建立夥伴關係。
courseEngAbstract: The course is designed to provide an opportunity for students to apply the theories and models in a real community. At the end of the course, the students will be able to develop the concept of community assessment, define the community diagnoses, and the priority, integrate the community resources and establish the partnership with the community.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專成人組
courseEngName: Research Methods and Design in Nursing
multipleTeacherName: 簡靜慧, 李坤黛, 廖珮宏
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（精神組、護資組、專師組）、本所碩士班研二以上（重修生不限組別）
courseAbstract: 本課程的內容訓練學生如何做一個科學性的研究，必須有一套訓練的方法，舉凡在如何尋找問題，如何解決問題，如何搜集資料，如何分析資料等都需要有一套嚴謹的方法論，最後介紹研究報告、論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course introduces the study methods of conducting an investigation for graduate students. This course includes mining a problem, solving the problem, collecting the data for the problem, and analyzing the data. How to writing a report and paper will

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專婦女組
multipleTeacherName: 陳淑溫, 戴君倚, 盧玉嬴, 潘婉琳
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（婦女組）
courseAbstract: 此課程要旨在於增進學生照顧婦女的臨床專業能力、健康促進的理論與行為以及婦女臨床專家角色，學生在此課程中將選擇一個與婦女健康相關主題，有組織的統整、應用並驗證相關的理論及研究於臨床實務，同時學生必須針對所選擇的婦女議題及護理應用，發展基本護理概念架構。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course are to provide an in-depth analysis of the context in which women health is practiced, of theories and behaviors relevant to health promotion, and the advanced nursing practice role in women health. Concepts, theories and practices related to health promotion in women health will be discussed. Students’ ability to analyzed, apply and evaluate relevant theories/research in clinical situations are emphasized. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomenon involving women and its implications in nursing.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專婦女組
courseName: 婦女健康照護實習 I
courseEngName: Health Care for Women I - Clinical Practicum
multipleTeacherName: 陳淑溫, 戴君倚, 盧玉嬴, 潘婉琳
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（婦女組）
courseAbstract: 此課程要旨在於增進學生照顧婦女的臨床專業能力，包括生育及其他健康問題，學生在此課程中將選擇一個與婦女健康相關主題，有組織的統整、應用並驗證相關的理論及研究於臨床實務，同時學生必須針對所選擇的婦女議題及護理應用，發展基本護理概念架構。契約學習是臨床教學的主要策略。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to assist students acquiring clinical expertise in nursing care of clients with obstetric, gynecologic and other female gender specified health problems. In this course, students are required to select a problem or an issue discussed in the seminar and complete the nursing process through integration and application of the theories for selected clients in appropriate clinical settings. Students are expected to develop a preliminary conceptual model to explain a clinical phenomena involving women and its implications in nursing. Problem solving and critical thinking skills of students will be enhanced by employing the learning contract teaching strategy in the course.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專資訊組
multipleTeacherName: 廖珮宏, 涂明香, 黃馨
note: 修課限制：本所碩士班（護資組）
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在於提升學生瞭解護理資訊管理相關理論與概念架構及其應用，學生能瞭解護理資訊學於臨床照護、管理、教學及研究上的使用情況。課程內容包括護理資訊管理專業人員在護理科技運用之選擇考量、及教育訓練過程與臨床照護使用的評值、旁及於有關電子化護理照護及護理資訊實務的範疇及標準。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to assist students in identifying the major theories and models of information management within nursing practice. Students will be able to understand the application of nursing informatics on clinical care, education, research and management. The nursing information specialist roles in the system selection and evaluation, education strategies, technology use in care evaluation, and the introduction of e-nursing is also included. Additionally, the future trends of the development of nursing informatics scope and standards of practice are identified as well.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專資訊組
courseName: 護理資訊管理實習 I
courseEngName: Practicum of Nursing Information Management I
multipleTeacherName: 廖珮宏, 涂明香, 黃馨
note: 修課限制：實習課程、本所碩士班（護資組）
courseAbstract: 此課程旨在使學生能應用護理資訊管理學於臨床科技使用之情境分析。學生需瞭解資訊科技如何運用於臨床病人照護，並分析相關臨床照護資訊科技使用之議題。同時，學生需應用相關護理資訊管理理論與概念架構於一特定護理科技應用系統分析與設計，並探討護理資訊護如何滿足臨床照護者、護理管理者、護理教育者及其未來發展；旁及於參與系統使用過程的教育訓練與評值、及瞭解系統設計如何受到健康照護潮流衝擊的影響。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides students an opportunity to analyze the current situations of nursing information management. Learning activities include applying a related theory or concept analysis in design and development of a project to investigate a nursing information technology application on meeting identified needs and trends in nursing students, clinicians, administrators, nursing faculty and patients and families. Students will participate in planning, education and evaluation of the implementation of a nursing information system, and to identify the impact of selected trends on the design of nursing information systems. Students will also address current and future clinical issues on selected nursing information technologies on health care.

department: 護理系碩士在職專班護專成人組
note: 授課時間地點請洽指導教授，修課限制：本所碩士班（成人組在職生）、書面選課
courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，依據碩士生之護理專長背景及未來專業發展方向，引導學生探索相關核心概念、理論，結合其臨床專業技能，應用批判性思考及實證護理的概念，訂定研究方向及主題，擬定研究設計、完成研究計畫之書寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is delivered in an individualized format, tailored to the nursing specialization and future professional development of the master's student. It guides students in exploring relevant core concepts and theories, integrating their clinical expertise, applying critical thinking and evidence-based nursing concepts, determining research directions and topics, and developing research designs, culminating in the completion of a research proposal.

courseAbstract: 本課程以個別指導之形式，旨在協助碩士生以臨床實務為基礎，應用護理理論及研究能力，執行研究計畫，進行資料分析，並完成研究成果報告及碩士論文之撰寫。
courseEngAbstract: This course is structured as individualized instruction, aiming to assist the master's student in utilizing clinical practice as a foundation. It focuses on the application of nursing theory and research skills, the execution of research protocol, data analysis, and the completion of research outcome reports and the master's thesis.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、本所(本國生)、外所(本國生)、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程之目的在於教授與護理資訊相關的基本概念。課程內容包括護理人員在資訊系統評估的功能與角色，以及對臨床、行政及教育電腦應用軟體的分析與運用。本課程亦討論到電腦化系統對社會、倫理、法律等層面所造成的衝擊。選讀本課程之後，學生將可了解如何運用電腦與資訊系統於健康照護及其相關領域中，並可評估健康照護資訊系統的使用對整個機構及社會造成的影響。
courseEngAbstract: This introductory course in nursing informatics provides students with the opportunity to explore the role of the nurse relative to the assessment of health care information systems for clinical practice. Clinical, administrative, and educational computer

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
multipleTeacherName: 邱秀渝, 陳妙言, 陳貞秀
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、護理學院全三年級以上、學士後、本所本國生、外所本國生、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）
courseAbstract: 本課程主旨在建立學生緩和與安寧照護的概念與認知。藉由了解末期疾病病人身、心、社會的衝擊及面對死亡的準備，體認多科專業團隊與義工團隊在末期疾病照護的協同合作功能。以增進學生對疾病末期病人及其家庭身心社會照顧及協助病人及其家屬面對死亡的準備。課程中，亦同時探討護理人員在照顧末期病人時所面臨的壓力與倫理困境。
courseEngAbstract: The design of this course is aimed to increase students’ understanding about concepts of palliative care and hospice care, and advance their competence of caring for the terminally ill patients and their family. The physical and psychosocial impact of ter

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、護理學院全一二年級、跨校。
courseAbstract:
課程目的旨在使學生學習芳香療法與按摩治療之理論與實務，課程
內容包括芳香療法緒論、精油製造方法與作用、精油調配學、芳香療法基
本按摩運用教學與實作、芳香療法於臉部的應用與實作、芳香療法於身體
系統的應用與實作、芳香療法按摩應用與實作，以及芳香療法保健推廣應
用。
courseEngAbstract:
The course is designed to provide the students with the basic knowledge of 
aromatherapy. The history of aromatherapy will be outlined. We will discuss factors 
relating to health and well-being and identify the role of aromatherapy in healing. The 
methods by which essential oils are extracted are outlined. It also stresses on the basic 
principles of Astrology, Facial Care, Head and Shoulders treatments. Distinguish the 
characteristics of the role of the nurse in Aromatherapy and apply knowledge in 
clinical nursing care to improve quality of life of the patients and their family.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、本系四技一般生、本系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、外系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 台灣目前正處於一個多元文化交融並存的時代，學習多種語言、文化是一種未來的趨勢。除英語 之外，日語的重要性已浮出抬面。對日據時代老一輩台灣人而言，日語有一種回憶童年的親切感，雖 然在光復後，和日本文化、語言保持了很長一段的疏離，但在近年媒體開放之後，來自日本的各種大 眾文化，開始出現在日常生活大小層面中，此時對日本文化的親進態度又回歸到現代年輕人身上，這 種「哈日」的想法，成為學習語言最有趣的動機，藉而看到日本文化的更深層面是件很好的事。
courseEngAbstract: The purpose of this course is to teach students the basics of Japanese. From the fundamental 50 pronunciations to greetings & conversions commonly used at hospitals, students will need to practice conversations and readings. An increasing number of Japanese in Taiwan had mad learning Japanese as the second foreign language a high priority for health care staffs. After this course, students will be able to use practical Japanese and read the instructions from Japanese medicine.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
修課限制：本系二技進修部、本系四技一般生、本系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、外系二技一般生

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部
courseAbstract: 授與提昇研究能力與增進閱讀學術文獻有關統計能力之知識與概念。其內容包括敘述統計學（集中趨勢量數、離中趨勢量數、分布、作圖與作表）以及推論統計學（區間估計與考驗之過程，Z score、pooled-t test、paired-t test、卡方、one-way ANOVA、皮爾遜積差相關、線性迴歸與無母數分析等）。課中利用EXCEL資料分析工具及各式小型科學電算器如Casio 36PV等協助運算，期能達成理論與實務之結合為目的。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to offer fundamental statistical concepts related to the practice of nursing. The contents include population & samples descriptive statistics; probability; sampling; statistical distributions; estimation; hypothesis testing; pooled samples

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生三年級以上、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、學士後、本所本國生、外所本國生、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、跨校
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在提供學生基本的研究知識與技能。學生除了對實務情境產生質疑，並藉由討論、批判、觀摩等活動，提升團隊合作、問題解決和批判性思考等能力。課程內容包括研究與專業發展間的關係、研究基本概念、研究步驟、研究計畫的撰寫和研究文獻的批判。
courseEngAbstract: This course is an introductory course on nursing research. Students will have the opportunity for a systematic investigation of a health-related topic of the student’s interest demonstrating knowledge and skills of research methodology. This course provid

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
multipleTeacherName: 柳舒祥, 許志怡, 余忠泰, 鄭威, 王業翰, 林弘斌
note:
1.修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生二年級以上、本系二技進修部、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生二年級以上、外系二技進修部、學士後、跨校。
2.本課程建議有解剖學、生理學、微生物免疫學基礎者可修。
courseAbstract: 病理學是探討疾病的原因、機轉、病理變化及過程、預後等的一門學問 課程分二大部分1.概論2.各論。 概論主要介紹外來的傷害與疾病的刺激對細胞與組織所造成的共通的變化、與反應與機轉。詳細內容包括細胞傷害與死亡、炎症與癒合、細胞生長發育的異常、體液代謝障礙、免疫與腫瘤、遺傳、代謝與營養疾病。 各論討論各器官系統其各類疾病的致病原因、機轉，病理變化及臨床表現等。詳細 的內容包括心臟血管系統疾病、呼吸系統疾病、肝臟及膽管系統疾病、消化系統及 胰臟疾病、內分泌系統疾病、血液與淋巴系統疾病、腎臟疾病、男性生殖系統疾病、
courseEngAbstract: The scientific focus of pathology is on the etiology of disease, the mechanisms of pathogenesis, and the pathways by which morphologic changes occur. Pathogenesis of diseases will be discussed on the molecular basis to facilitate the understanding of diff

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
1.第二階段加退選，開放修習「環境教育/電腦軟體整合應用/環境永續與資訊科學」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。
 2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。 
3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。
4.上課地點:1-8週S105，9-16週G103
courseAbstract:
本課程為環境永續發展與資訊科學之教學內容，主要在闡述環境永續發展的重要性，提昇學生永續發展的覺知，結合資訊科技的應用，以具備適當資訊應用的能力，培養維護環境永續的行動技能。
課程內容涵蓋環境倫理、環境變遷與防災、節能減碳與能源管理、生態保育、電腦程式設計、結合環境教育主題之資訊應用等主題。教學策略運用做中學、在真實的情境中體驗、合作學習法、運用感官學習、探索環境與結合電腦軟體應用等議題。
courseEngAbstract: This course comprises instructional content on environmental sustainability and information science, primarily elucidating the significance of environmental sustainability, enhancing students' awareness of sustainable development, integrating the application of information technology to possess appropriate information application abilities, and fostering actionable skills for maintaining environmental sustainability.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
1.修課限制：本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生重修生、本系二技進修部、本所本國生、（研究生下修，不計入畢業學分）、學士後。
2.先修課程：生理學。
courseAbstract: 本課程之設計係以護理系學生為授課對象，課程內容著重以深入淺出之方式探討藥物之藥理作用機轉，並介紹與臨床應用有關之藥品動力、交互作用及藥物中毒之解毒等，課程內容包括：藥理學概論、 自主神經系統作用劑、影響內分泌及新陳代謝藥物、中樞神經作用劑、心臟血管疾病用藥以及化學療法藥物等。
courseEngAbstract: The pharmacology is designed to have two credit hours course. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a Wholesome concepts. The subjects i

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在增進學生對自我的認識，進而培養學生溝通與關懷的專業能力，內容包含人與自我、人與社會、人與環境、人與靈命、關懷的藝術、關懷與護理、人際溝通的特質、模式與相關影響因素，知覺與溝通、觀察技巧、語言溝通，傾聽與同理心的應用。課程結構強調自我的省思及使學生能於設計的模擬情境中融合溝通與關懷的知識、技能與態度，展現專業能力。課程內涵以認識自我之關懷心及溝通型態，瞭解他人對自我的看法，進而分析自我的關懷心及溝通型態對自己生活及執行專業角色時的影響，並願意改變過去不合適的溝通型態，展現關懷心及溝通技巧於生活情境

courseAbstract: 本課程旨在讓同學了解生死學的研究與運用現況，從醫學、心理、社會、宗教與倫理的觀點探討死亡歷程，對個人的影響; 認識與死亡相關的儀式及其對社會組織的影響。本課程期使同學建立正向的生死觀，達到生命教育的目的。
courseEngAbstract: This course proposes students can understand current research and application on life and death, explorate the death trajectories from medical, psychological, social, religious and ethic perspections, know death how to affect personal behaviours, ritual about death and its reflection on social organization. The expectation of this course is try to help students have positive recognition on life and death.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技進修部二年級以上、護理學院二技進修部三年級以上、學士後。
2.遠距教學課程、混合式遠距教學。
3.前九周上課，加退選至第二階段網路加退選。
courseAbstract: 本課程主要目的在探討自殺之理論及相關概念包括自殺之定義、影響因素及後續反應，台灣地區與世界各國之自殺防治策略。課程特別強調自殺高危險群、自殺徵兆之評估，自殺行為之處置，自殺遺族之照護，防治策略之探討，期能使學習者獲得自殺防治全面性之觀念與實務性之經驗。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides nursing students with knowledge about suicide and prevention. The major elements include the theory of suicide, definition of suicide and related factor, influence, suicidal preventing strategy. Students are required to identify and e

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技進修部、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、本系學士後、護理學院全。
2.前九周上課，加退選至第二階段網路加退選。
courseAbstract: 本課程主旨在協助學生了解個體壓力與情緒管理之相關理論，經由教學活動的參與，洞察自己壓力及情緒來源、壓力與情緒反應的模式、以及本身健康、工作、人際關係、日常生活受情緒影響之部份，並從中學習良好的壓力與情緒控制管理方法。使學生能在任何情境下，藉由合宜的表達得以發揮潛能、愉快的工作並提昇生活滿意度。教學方法包括:講解、課室活動、經驗分享、角色扮演、實例演練及作業習作。
courseEngAbstract: This course provides students with advanced knowledge and skills about individual sentiment and emotion management. Through the participation of the teaching activities, the students can understand thoroughly the origin of their emotion, the model of the

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技進修部、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、護理學院全、學士後、本所本國生、外所本國生、跨校。
2.前九周上課，加退選至第二階段網路加退選。
courseAbstract: 本課程以性別主流化的概念為基礎，透過個體啟蒙、意識覺醒與行為實踐的過程，將引導學生論述於不同醫學專科領域之性別議題，且能辨識家庭、工作職場、社會福利和醫療環境中的性別平等政策。以期使學生能發展具有性別平等的概念，並應用於健康照護的情境中。
courseEngAbstract: This course is based on the concept of gender mainstreaming. We hope that through the process of enlightenment, awareness and practice that could help student to understand the gender perspective in different area of medical specialties, and to identify the relation for gender concept among family, workplace, social welfare, and health policy. The student would develop the vision and ability of gender analysis, and take action with gender perspective which applies in nursing care.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
courseName: 經絡紓壓按摩理論與實務
courseEngName: The Theory and Practice of Meridian Relaxing Massage
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技進修部、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所、外所、學士後、跨校。
2.前九周上課，加退選至第二階段加退選。
courseAbstract: 本課程以中醫經絡學之概念架構為主，配合芳香療法(Aromatherapy) ，針對長期精神及工作上的壓抑所導致身心方面的疾病，運用傳統推拿的手法，而達到抒解壓力及預防疾病的目的。學習將護理的領域由醫療機構擴展至社區層面，而護理人員的服務對象也由病患擴大至一般民眾，希望透過本課程的學習，能讓學生具有正確的經絡按摩觀念，並且具有實踐及操作的能力，以達成自助助人的目的。
courseEngAbstract: Massage therapy has become an integral part of the health care community. A growing number of medical practices now recognize the healing benefits of clinical massage therapy. By the course of relaxing massage, students can understand the theory of medica

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
1.密集前9週。
2.加退選至第二階段網路加退選。
修課限制：本系二技進修部、本系四技一般生、本系二技一般生、外系二技進修部、外系四技一般生、外系二技一般生
courseAbstract: 生命教育主要是引導學生從觀察與分享對生、老、死之感受的過程中，體會生命的意義及存在的價值，進而培養尊重和珍惜生命的情懷。本課程透過討論，引導學生探討了解自我、熱愛他人、尊重大自然、探索生命的意義，以建立積極正向的人生觀，創造生命的幸福。
courseEngAbstract: This course proposes students can think and reflect the issues on life, explore the meaning of life in thinking about man’s conditions in the life world, issues on destiny, love, knowledge, character, art, religion, dying and death etc. The expectation of this course try to help students have positive recognition and attitude on life by way of many lectures and discussions.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
multipleTeacherName: 陳妙言, 簡翠薇, 涂明香
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部二二甲、本所本國生。
courseAbstract:
本課程目的是培養學生獲得長期照護之整體性基本概念。主要課程內容
包括：長期照護需求、國內外長期照護的發展與現況、長期照護相關政策及
法規、我國現行長期照護體系、長期照護相關議題（含個案管理、社會資源應用、活動設計、另類輔助治療及倫理議題）等。在引導下，學生透過經驗單反思、課室討論與分享、自主學習失能體驗活動等多元教學策略，學習批判性思考，主動展現關懷或同理失能者與其主要照顧者之困境感受，發揮團隊合作完成課室指定之實作，以達成本課程目標。
courseEngAbstract: This course is aimed at integrating basic concepts about long-term care globally. It's designing is dealing with current conditions and social development in related themes and practice about long-term care. Course content include need, status, development and introduction（essences, philosophy, definition and service eligibility）, policy , rules , regulation , and current delivery system in our count, i.e. home care, day care, hospice care, institutionalized care and special topics on long-term care.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
multipleTeacherName: 陳妙言, 簡翠薇, 涂明香, 張書璇, 陳明宜
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在透過長期照護實務實習、觀摩省思等學習方法，協助學生獲得長期照護相關知識、態度及技能。修習此課程學生能評估長期照護體系中病患及其主要照顧者之常見照護問題，並且能應用適當的照護概念及正確、安全、具個別性的介入方案於照護對象，且能運用跨團隊整合照護概念於照護情境中。學生可以體認長期照護體系中護理專業角色功能、倫理困境與分享自我感受。
courseEngAbstract: This course is to help student to integrate the knowledge of long term care to clinical practice that deal with different settings approaches to long-term care. Through this course, they can assess the common problems of the long-term care patients and their families. And apply the relevant care concept to plan and implement correctly, safety and individual intervention. They can also realize the role functions of nursing profession in long term care and share with themselves feeling and role adjustment in long term care setting.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
前九週密集上課2/19-4/15
1.第二階段開放修習護理/高照/醫教/助產/健管/長照/聽語「應用法規導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。前9週，上滿36小時。
courseAbstract: 本課程醫護法學之介紹，使學生對法律結構、法學理念及我國現行法有一整體性的認知，以奠定法學啟發基礎。從醫護正義概念出發，就醫護法規、醫護法制、護理法律責任與訴訟、醫護人員切身法律問題等，深入淺出有系統的介紹，以培養現代醫護人員正確的法律觀。並從醫護業務與法律實務的角度，點出護理人員與其他醫事人員的責任分際、臨床醫護人員與公共衛生醫護人員面臨法律問題的不同、醫病糾紛的預防與處理等，以強化醫護人員處理法律問題的能力。
courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
multipleTeacherName: 張靜芬, 李梅琛, 林梅香, 廖珮宏
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部二二乙、本所本國生，前9周上課。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培養學生運用批判性思考及護理過程技能於臨床照護對象照顧，重點在於增進學生統整運用內外科護理學知識，著重感染控制、慢性疾病照護，進行病人整體需要之評估，分析與確立照護對象的健康問題，並依照護對象的身心狀況及個別需要，提供具關懷態度之專業護理服務。透過小組分組討論方式，培養學生主動學習及與他人合作學習的能力，藉由案例分析學習全人照護、辨識臨床常見的倫理困境、體認護理人員在內外科護理情境中可扮演的角色與功能，並對未來臨床實務發展趨勢進一步認識。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to train the students to apply critical thinking skills and nursing procedures on the clinical practice. The key point is to enhance their skill of integrating medical and surgical nursing knowledge, especially for infection contro

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
multipleTeacherName: 張靜芬, 吳曉雲, 洪珮真, 曾虹齡, 徐珮倚, 王佩珊, 王詩晴, 吳珮蓉
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技進修部二二乙、本所本國生。
2.實習課程、書面選課。實習起訖日期: 113/05/13-113/06/11。
courseAbstract: 本實習課程主要是協助學生整合內外科護理學知識應用於臨床情境中，培養學生運用批判性思考及護理過程技能於臨床病人照顧。實習中學生能評估病人身體、心理、社會調適過程中所出現的不適應行為，確立病人的健康問題，應用所學的知識擬定及執行個別性的護理措施，並針對所提供護理服務進行評值。學生在實習過程中，應主動參與醫療團隊之溝通及合作事項，同時對於內外科疾病情境中，護理人員所扮演角色功能進行批判，並能分享臨床實習之感受與角色適應，以做為未來就業的準備。
courseEngAbstract: This practicum is designed to help students integrate and apply the knowledge in medical/surgical nursing on clinical situations. It also helps students apply the skills of critical thinking in the processes of nursing care. In the practicum, students sho

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 1.第二階段開放修習護理/高照/醫教/助產/健管/長照/聽語「應用法規導論」課程之學生及重修生互相跨班選課。2.全部網路選課，無紙本加選。3.因轉學轉系或修習雙聯學位同學如欲提早修課，經中心同意後，請於第三階段開放其選課，名單會於第二階段選課結束後送交教務處。前9週，上滿36小時。

courseEngAbstract: This subject is taught by way of the introduction of the basic law to let the students to understand the whole outline of the construction of law，the virtue of the jurisprudence and the  present law in Taiwan.  It begins as the teaching of the concept of the professional justice and is succeeded by introducing the medical and nursing law，the institution of the professional law，the responsibility and litigation as well as the professional liability of the member of professional society to ensure the students to know the exact concept of the law and to develop problem-solving abilities .

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note:
修課限制：
1.本系二技進修部、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、外系二技一般生、外系四技一般生、外系二技進修部、本所本國生、外所本國生、學士後、跨校。
2.畢業班課程，14周課程。
courseAbstract: 本課程在增進學生對一般復健護理的認知，透過課程學習培養學生具備以多元化觀點評估照護對象的實務能力，讓學生能瞭解復健護理在臨床上的應用，課程內容包括：復健護理基本概論、復健護理之發展與理論、護理人員如何在復健小組中發揮其角色與功能、各項復健活動包含大小便障礙之復健評估與護理技巧、關節活動之技巧及擺位、失能者整體評估、膀胱訓練、排便訓練、皮膚損傷性復建、特殊照護服務對象之復健護理(如中風、脊髓損傷、截肢及性功能損傷病患等復健照護等)、輔具概論與應用，心臟復健的臨床運用以及物理及職能治療簡介，以及如何協助失能者障礙後的心理及 社會調適。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to improve the knowledge and skills of the students on the rehabilitation nursing, with multiple-cultural clinical competency, which was based on the diverse perspectives. The content of the course includes: the basic concept, the history and development, the theory and practice models of rehabilitation nursing, comprehensive assessment of disability patients, range of motion, positioning and transportation, training of bladder elimination and continence, bowel elimination and regulation, skin integrity. In addition, the course includes the rehabilitation nursing for the client with CVA, SCI, Amputee, and Neurogenic Sexual Dysfunction. The topic of stress and coping, the assistive technology and application will also be included. Teaching activities include lecture, discussing, questioning,skill practice, and report.

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、本系二技一般生、本系四技一般生、護理學院全、畢業班課程、14周課程。
courseAbstract: 本課程旨在培育學生執行反射療護之知識、技能與態度。課程內容包括反射療護之歷史、相關理論、於健康促進之應用及反射療護之技術操作。本課程首重反射療護之實務操作，學生須具有實踐及操作之能力，於課程結束時，通過認知和技術考試。
courseEngAbstract: This is an introduction course of hand and foot reflexology. The aim of the course is to offer students a fundamental understanding of theories and skills of reflexology. The course integrates the knowledge, skills and attitude of reflexology by the means

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
courseEngName: Seminar of Human Health Issue in Media
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、護理學院全、畢業班課程、14周課程。
courseAbstract: 本課程的目的在應用電影具像的媒體，協助學生瞭解並感受全球與在地相關的健康議題，培養其對國際健康議題的基本概念；並藉由具體影像的呈現，引發學生思考與討論的興趣。課程主題包括文化差異、弱勢族群、環境與健康、經濟與健康、戰爭與健康、單親家庭、藥物濫用、失智症、安樂死、醫護倫理與關懷等政治、經濟、社會、文化與健康的重要國際健康議題。
courseEngAbstract: This course is designed to provide introductory content in human health issues which useful for all level of health care students who will be practicing in the era of globalization through the media. The themes introduced several international health foci

department: 二年制進修部護理系(日間班)
note: 修課限制：本系二技進修部、本系學士後、護理學院全、畢業班課程，14周課程。
courseAbstract:
本課程以園藝治療的基本理論為基礎，結合健康照護實務普遍應用的園藝治療課程
設計與技巧，協助學生體悟植物、人與生命之間的關係，以運用於個人之情緒及身體調
適，進而紓解其情緒、學習及生活壓力。課程內容包括：園藝治療基本理論、營造健康
的室內環境設計法、增加五感刺激的園藝治療、舒壓的園藝治療、園藝治療於唐氏症和
自閉症兒童、精神障礙者及老人照護的設計與應用、參觀療癒花園、常用的園藝治療課
程設計與應用包括：種子播種和發芽、扦插和分株、地下組織之再生、劍山插花、壓花
卡片及香草的生活應用等方法、植物與生命故事及成果展示等課程內容。
courseEngAbstract:
The course is based on the basic theory of horticultural therapy, combined with health care 
practice is widely horticultural therapy techniques and methods. The course assists students to 
understand the relationship of life between plants and human, to relieve their life pressure and 
to apply their earn experiences for health care practices The course contents included: 
introduction to basic theory of horticultural therapy, healthy indoor environmental design, 5 
sensory therapy garden design, horticultural therapy for stress release, horticultural therapy 
for Autism and Down syndromes, horticultural therapy for mental illness, horticultural 
therapy for older adults, visit to therapy garden, horticultural therapy course design and 9 
application included: planting, cutting, tissue regeneration, flower arrangement on metal frog, 
herb application, floral embossed cards, sixth sense plant and life story and products show.
